Summary: Randi’s drink selections were amazing. Her personality was warm and charming. She was very engaging and great with the guests. The view was amazing, and very beautiful. We highly recommend the longboard bar, and Randi’s service.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Betty!  We're delighted to hear that you had such an outstanding experience with our team at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Doheny Beach - Dana Point! It's wonderful that Randi provided you with such great service - that's what we like to hear! We'd love to host you again soon for another incredible experience!  Thanks for sharing and have a terrific day!

Summary: Loved this place. Front desk was so cordial and helpful. The ladies in the restaurant, Randi and Chef Julie, were great too. The breakfast burrito was yummy and could easily feed two. The view from our balcony was perfect. I would definitely come back♥️
Manager Response: Dear Perezs71,  We are elated to hear you were able to experience the authentic hospitality from our all star associates throughout the hotel!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble endorsement of the Doubletree Dana Point, it is genuinely appreciated

Summary: Great mai tai!  Best hotel bar yet because Randi was pure entertainment. She mixed great drinks with songs and mind reading (hint my favorite color is blue) and  jokes. Randi was also very knowledgeable of the area and suggested trails for riding and areas to stand up paddle board.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review, Heather!  We're delighted to hear that you had an amazing experience at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Doheny Beach - Dana Point! We appreciate your compliments regarding our hard-working team. We will make sure to pass on your kind words to Randi! We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience!  Thank you again for sharing your review. Have a lovely day!

Summary Heading: Randi Made It All Worth It!
Summary: Came here for a wedding and decided to pre-drink at the rooftop bar. Randi was soooo freakin’ awesome. The drink was divine but honestly, her company was the best. She sang to us, read our minds, and made us giggle a ton.   Wish I lived closer so I could return.
Manager Response: Thank you for the lovely review, Laura!  It's excellent your time at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Doheny Beach - Dana Point was so fantastic! We're thrilled our team took such wonderful care of you. Randi is a treasured member of our team so it's not surprising you felt so welcome and comfortable. That's what we like to see!  We can't wait until your next visit so we can share another amazing experience with you, Laura! Have a splendid day!

Summary: Randi ‘s customer service was spot on. She remembered our order from days ago, and even welcomed us using our names, She was very welcoming, enthusiastic and gave great suggestions.  Definitely a hustler and tried to please all customers. We highly recommend her service, her great hospitality, and our overall existence!!!

She is an important member of our team!  We look forward to hosting you again soon for another fantastic experience!

Summary Heading: Randi and everyone else was great
Summary: I stayed here for two weeks and had great service at the bar downstairs and upstairs both ! The staff were all super friendly and helpful throughout my entire stay. I walked in late to the kitchen one night after getting off work right as they were closing and they still prepared dinner for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing this wonderful review, S6471OEjaker!  We are very pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable experience at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Doheny Beach - Dana Point! We appreciate your praise for our team; they work very hard to ensure every guest feels right at home. We are delighted you felt welcomed and valued during your time with us!  We'd love to share another positive experience with you in the future!

Summary: Randi is the friendliest, nicest, most energetic bartender. She makes the greatest drinks and makes you feel super important. This is the second week I’ve been here for work and she remembered me by name, that’s the kinda thing that makes the difference in your stay.

Randi is a valued member of our team so it's no surprise she took such great care of you. That's what we like to see!  We look forward to sharing another splendid experience with you soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with ocean views
Summary: Had a wonderful stay at the Double Tree hotel at Dana Point, Ca. by the beach. The bar on the top mezzanine  floor with the fire pit is a true delight to experience. Our suite with a balcony view of the ocean was very peaceful and quiet.      Celeste Morelli
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Celeste!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Doheny Beach - Dana Point so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our stunning views and great amenities, but also our quiet atmosphere! Your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience!

Summary: The best thing about this Double Tree is the cookies :-). However, the hotel personnel were all very friendly and helpful. The room furnishings were dated and worn. The bathroom was very large, but the shower was cold.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback, John_Suzanne2023.  We appreciate your input. It's great that you loved our delicious cookies, spacious rooms and friendly staff. However, we'll be addressing your concerns about the condition of our accommodations with the appropriate members of our team.  We look forward to having you back again soon for an even more positive experience.

Summary: This review is solely for the amazing bartender experience I just had; Randi. Her customer service, attentiveness, friendliness, and energy was spot on and really made the meal special. She was incredibly attentive to me, ensuring my cup never ran empty, my food and drink were tasting good, and made sure I left with a smile. Such a nice gal, so friendly. Visit her up at the rooftop bar !

That's what we like to see!  We can't wait until your next visit so we can once again share our high-caliber service with you.

Summary: Randi is an amazing bartender!! She was funny, attentive, beautiful, and even sang for us! Our Friday was extra special and fun because of her service. The drinks and food was delicious! Randi should be a stand up comic! Great servjce!

You can see why we love having her here so much!  We're looking forward to sharing another amazing experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Wow!! Best experience/Randi in the house!! she had the best personality ever! She was awesome!!!!!!! Best bartender!!!!!
Summary: Randi was awesome, best bartender we’ve experienced. Very attentive!! She served multiple families. There is nobody like her!! She was able to handle many tables at one time, maintained her cool, and had a smile the whole time!

Summary: Nice hotel. Our favorite part was the rooftop bar. Lisa is a gem. You’re lucky to have her on staff. We did hope the walk to the beach would have been a little easier but we had an oceanview from our room and watched the sunset from the rooftop bar. Dana Point is a fun area to explore.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us, Jodi. We are so glad you enjoyed the rooftop bar, and that you thought so highly of Lisa. We are fortunate to have her on our team. We apologize that the walk to the beach was not as convenient as you would have hoped. We are so glad that you were able to take advantage of the ocean view from your room and the sunset from the rooftop bar. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed exploring the Dana Point area. We value your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon.

Summary: What a wonderful place this is and you have a gem working for you. Randi was great she gave every guest equal attention. She was fun and went above and beyond for all her guests. She never said no, if she couldn't honor the request she had a solution. The food was delicious and presented beautifully. Thank you doubletree for hiring great employees. Says a great deal of the management. Thanks for the wonderful mini vacation Randi. We will be back because of you.

Summary: Randi was the best bartender ever. She came in and was our hero for the night. She was Friendly, hard-working, had a great personality, and remained calm under pressure. Her drinks were amazing especially the passionfruit margarita. We highly recommend this bar, and highly recommend Randi. Great ambience as well.

Summary: Upon walking into the bar, Randi not only greeted me with a friendly personality, but she had a great smile and greeted everyone else as well! She was funny, made all the guests feel like they were at home, and one of the best bartenders I have ever experienced!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the wonderful review with us, Ranman65!  We're happy to hear that you had such a pleasant stay at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Doheny Beach - Dana Point! Summary: We mostly had an enjoyable stay but it was not  without some issues. We had travelled from Ireland for a family funeral locally and had booked 2 rooms for one week on  recommendation of a family member .  The service in hotel was just ok with Randi in the bar particularly worth commendation.  But we did have major problems on the morning of January 3rd while attending breakfast in the restaurant. We were  in a hurry to the funeral but sadly the staffing levels in the restaurant that morning was poor and breakfast was very slow at a time when we needed prompt service. I raised this with local management who eventually expedited our order but it was not at all satisfactory whenever we were in a hurry for such a sad  The attitude of young male server was just “ whatever “.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.  We kindly ask that you contact us directly at donovan.stephens@hrihospitality.com so that we may discuss your experience further. Thank you.

Summary: I am on a business trip and was having a horrible day until I was served dinner and drinks by Liv and Casey. They were attentive, service was excellent, and conversation was great. They made me feel at home and extremely calm. I will be back my entire stay at the hotel to dine with them.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words! We are so glad to hear that Liv and Casey were able to make your stay at our hotel more enjoyable. We hope that you will continue to dine with us during your stay and that you will have a pleasant stay overall. Thank you for your patronage and for taking the time to write a review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Stayed at doubletree for a birthday weekend with friends. Clean rooms and awesome service. Check out the rooftop lounge and Randi will take care of you with awesome drinks. The margaritas were delicious and good atmosphere. We will be back!

Summary: After a long day of work and travel we found ourselves exhausted sitting at the 4th floor bar. We glanced over the drink menu but nothing really caught our eyes. The bartender Cheryl H. could see we were stuck and offered us a selection of drinks she created herself. We ended up getting her  whiskey mai tai and mermaid water (or merman since my fiancé ordered it). Both drinks were delicious. The whiskey mai tai was sweet and sour but warmed my belly like whiskey is supposed to. The merman water was tropical, fruity and beautiful. The whiskey mai tai was my favorite and needs a regular spot on the menu. Cheryl was friendly, attentive and provided great service making our first nights stay enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review, MsWilson111!  It's outstanding your time at DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Doheny Beach - Dana Point was so fantastic! Summary: Second annual visit in the suite. Pricier than neighboring hotels and the suite was ordinar游but had a nice ocean view with a fireplace. Comfortable beds but wish they will check the pillows to ensure there is no hair oil smell from prior guests. We slept well. On the first evening, we smelt marijuana in our balcony and called the front desk and they sent security to take care of it. It will be nice to have a microwave in the suite since it is the most expensive room. The restaurant food was fantastic. Nice gym and ample parking space. Wish they will remove the $35 parking charge. Great cookies. The hallway fourth floor roof was leaking when it rained, and some panels collapse and we had to inform mgt whom they send someone to insert a container to collect the water. Despite, We

It started when Bartender Randi saw behind my questions that I was really looking for answers to much bigger problems than I was letting on. Causal or serious, you will find what you need here.

The sofa had no support because it was old and the cushions had broken down to nothing. They gave me one night credit, of course the cheapest night. Charged me luxury prices for motel experience save you money and don't stay at this hotel. I will never stay at a Hilton again. Awful experience

Summary Heading: A waterless adventure at Doheny Beach
Summary: We checked in and were NOT told water was off to hotel rooms. 1 grandma and 2 8yr olds were pretty surprised!  Decided to go to beach and return when toilets, sink and shower would be functional. Next problem....heaters/ boilers couldn't get up to speed. 8pm no hot water still. Bedtime salty and sticky. No reduction from hotel for inconvenience.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, OnAir54519217734.  We're disheartened to hear about the challenges you faced during your stay with us. We strive to offer our guests quality service and comfort. It's unfortunate our services were not on par with the high standard we're accustomed to sharing. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced, and going forward we will do a better job of communicating maintenance work to guests prior to arrival. We'll be addressing your concerns with the appropriate members of our team.  Please consider allowing us another chance to provide you with the excellent service we're capable of providing.

Summary Heading: Not up to basic Hilton standard
Summary: If you’re expecting Double Tree standard, let alone Hilton standard, avoid this location. The hotel is very outdated and is in need of much repair. I’m guessing that this was an old property that Hilton purchased and slapped the Double Tree logo on. I booked two Deluxe King Suites and was very disappointed. Some of the issues we had:  1. Blood remnants on the curtains and carpet.  2. Shower door that would not close resulting in wet bathroom floor.  3. Stained and torn bedding.  4. Doors and wardrobe closets were damaged and splintered. 5. Water damage on the ceiling.  6. AC intake vents caked in dust and dirt.  7. AC vents also caked in dust and dirt with mold remnants.   There’s more I can list out but feel this is enough. Please do yourself a favor and avoid this location.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.  We're disappointed that your stay with us was less than ideal. It's unfortunate you've noticed a decline in the quality of our accommodations. We care about the comfort of our guests so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We hope for the opportunity to host you again soon for a more positive experience.

Summary: The hotel is just ok. Only 1 elevator was working the whole time I was there, causing delays. The whole town had a scheduled blackout but neglected to warn any of the guests prior to arrival and only at check in. No generator either. Front desk personnel were only interested in helping the “money” clients. Rooms were just adequate.    Honestly the best thing about this hotel is the Valet personnel. They were polite and knowledgeable and helped me very much. They knew the area and even at the times I didn’t need to tip them, they were complete gentlemen. Bravo to them
Manager Response: none

Summary: The ocean views are the best thing about this property. Everything else is subpar at best and there is better out there for the price so plan ahead and stay in Victoria Beach. The parking is $29 per night whether you valet or not, pool is right at the front by check-in so no privacy, and it’s a small property.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We met Randi at the rooftop bar - longboard - and connected with her immediately!  She worked her magic to make our evening perfect - drinks, laughter, friends and incredible service!  Made our vacation!
Manager Response: none

Summary: One of the two elevators been out for some time. Furnishings in room need updating. Slider to balcony in bad shape. Property being sold and it looks like they have let the upkeep of the property lapse. Location is excellent and that’s the draw. Staff was lovely.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The property has been sold and awaiting renovation.  Absolutely, nothing at this hotel isn't beat up or unfunctional.  Bathrooms are laden with mold, maid service is only an option every 5th day, there is only 1 elevator that workers utilize constantly since the other one has been broker over a year.  Seriously, this place needs to be closed down.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Double Tree Doheny Beach Hotel location was the #1 reason to visit!!
Summary: My family of 6 recently stayed at the Double Tree and loved it!! Location, location, location!! The hotel was right across the street from Doheny Beach. The beach was quite business which was fun but a bit rocky near the shoreline. The next day we visited Strands Beach which was a couple miles down the road. This was a must see beach!! It was gorgeous, well maintained and had a number of lifeguards. It was a bit of a walk down the steps to the beach but well worth it. We went back again the next day. The hotel was somewhat dated but clean. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Again, the hotel location was the selling point. The beds were comfortable, the rooftop bar fun and the breakfast delicious. One morning we were finishing breakfast and our 2 yr old grandson wanted more
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not What DoubleTree use to be
Summary: I've stayed at DoubleTree and Hilton Hotels before. Unfortunately this one did not live up to the reputation. First I have to say I agree with the "Outdated old hotel" reviews. they are spot on so I won't go there. My first night I found out this is a pet friendly hotel because my neighbor kept playing with their little dog and it kept barking and barking. When I called the front desk to tell them about the dog barking, the phone was silent for a second and then the front desk told me they are a pet friendly hotel and is there anything else they  can help me with. Not a sorry we will go talk to your neighbor and they are suppose to keep the dogs from barking. Then the next night PG&E shut the power down. There was a notice that this was going to happen and the hotel would do
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Doubletree Hotel Dana Point this weekend to celebrate our 25th anniversary with friends.  What a great experience. Randi on the rooftop was so much fun, we decided to visit both nights we were there.  Valet staff and front desk checkin was amazing.  We will be back soon, thank you!  Steve and Patrice
Manager Response: none

Summary: Outdated hotel. The Parking garage is dirty, dark and inconvenient. The parking spaces are also extremely small and tight. Pool is tiny and not nice. Bathrooms are tiny. The hotel has a strong smell of cannabis. Rooms also need more convenient outlets with USB ports.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a terrific hotel with wonderful staff. Such a fun place. It was close to everything; beach, dining , shopping etc. the rooftop bar was perfect to end the day. You could look over the water and the staff (Randi) was terrific and fun. I will definitely stay there when I go back in the fall.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great and accommodating establishment with excellent service!
Summary: Great stay at this nice, very accommodating establishment! The service here was incredible! This includes the wonderful waitress/bartender upstairs at the rooftop bar & restaurant (Longboard). Her name is Randi and she is a riot! Very sweet , entertaining and goes over and beyond. Loved the grapefruit basil martini she made and the artichoke dip and tuna tostadas were delic!  In addition to randi’s excellent service, nick at the front desk and Erin in the downstairs restaurant are excellent employees as well who also went above and beyond.  Great place and next time I’m in Dana point, will look forward to staying here again.  P.s. the cookies they give at check in at this place are to die for! 🍪😋
Manager Response: none

Summary: Other reviews surprise me. We loved this hotel. My husband and I booked a room for ourselves and booked a 2nd room as a college graduation gift for my son and daughter in law who both graduated recently. They loved it, too! It's hard to find hotels at this price point so close to a beach in California. Most resorts are way more expensive. The Doubletree has reasonable rates and you are across the street from one of the most famous southern California Beaches-Doheny Beach! We walked to the beach each day. The rooms were fine. We like comfortable beds and they were. We had a balcony view of the ocean complete with chairs. The hotel restaurant was nice. My daughter in law and I ordered the best avocado toast we've ever had and we've tried it everywhere. The chef was onsite. My son
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good location but desperately needs remodeling
Summary: We stayed at DoubleTree Suites over the Memorial Day weekend for two nights. We traveled with our young kids for a sports event in San Clemente.   Rooftop lounge/bar has a great ocean view with a very inviting and pleasant atmosphere. We went there on both evenings, and had a great time. The food menu is limited. When we were there, many items on the menu were not available.  The building and the rooms are generally old and not very clean. The carpet looks very old and dirty.  The bedsheets had stains. Furniture was old and had damages. The exterior of the building has an old look. For a Hilton-branded hotel, this is very disappointing. The bathroom is very small. To further save space, it has a sliding door. In our room, the door wouldn't stay closed, which is unacceptable.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Poor repair, not worth the price
Summary: Boutique hotel in great location, but badly in need of repair & upgrades.  Broken: bathroom door, balcony door, sink, elevator.  Uncorfortable beds.  Stingy amenities - we were told we could only have 2 towels for our family of 5. Also we were given 1 tiny bottle of shampoo, conditioner & body wash to last our family of 5 for a 2-night stay.  Parking is terrible (tiny spots), and elevator wait times to get from the parking garage to hotel are crazy long.  Conveniently located near the beach, but not worth the price tag.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The check in staff was rude. The room had a noisy air conditioner and bathroom fan, shower door would not close, the bathroom door was on a slider and would open while someone was using the bathroom, second TV did not work. Not Hilton quality. Choose another hotel if able.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Visited DoubleTree over Memorial weekend for a wedding. We had some great drinks and appetizers. Our waitress was Randi she is hoot. She took great care of our group. Randi had us all laughing with her jokes. She is an asset to your rooftop bar. The view was awesome too!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fun Stay for a Quick Getaway
Summary: The Doubletree Suites by Hilton at Doheny Beach didn’t disappoint. My family wanted to take a spontaneous getaway and we found this gem. Pros- friendly staff, plenty of amenities, walkable to the beach, fairly local and just what we needed for a quick stay while we explored the area. And good cookies!   Cons- in between busy PCH highway (noise wasn’t an issue for us), somewhat dated interior (I.e. bathroom), and not enough trash receptacles around to throw trash.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Randi and Cheryl are the bartenders at the rooftop bar. They hustle to keep the crowd happy and are friendly to everyone. Definitely stop up for a drink. It’s a nice place to relax before or after dinner and enjoy the friendly service and tasty drinks.
Manager Response: RDice,  Thank you for the wonderful feedback about our Longboard Rooftop Bar. We are always thrilled to hear what a good time our guests have when visiting. We hope that you will come and see us again soon for some more good times!  Regards,   William J.  Operations Supervisor

Summary Heading: Service at the breakfast restaurant is wonderful!
Summary: The wait-staff service at the restaurant was totally above and beyond! Randi was truly outstanding. She made us feel at ease, made excellent recommendations, she was so friendly. It was my daughter’s 18th Birthday, Randi made it even better!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed for a business trip, my bartender the first night I got in was liv. Amazing service. Kind heart, and great conversation. View at the bar was amazing. Also had liv as a server the next morning for breakfast. Had worker with a smile on her face! Food was excellent, room was clean. Staff was very friendly and welcoming. Felt like home, will definitely be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Restaurant service was slow and unorganized.  Staff training is needed.  Pay attention to detail.  Need to review worn out tubs onsite and functionality of the bathroom stall and fixtures. Be sure to have daily inspections of the bathroom fixtures especially and the clenliness of the tub.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A group of us stayed at the hotel for a family event. I’m pretty picky about girls and especially hotel bathrooms.  The rooms were clean, the beds are surprisingly comfortable, the bathroom was fine, albeit the showers are narrow if you are big guy might be a light tight). The hotel has nice amenities like the downstairs onsite restaurant and the rooftop bar which are nice for a hotel in this price range. This is not the Ritz Carlton so don’t expect the Ritz. But it was a good experience for the price.
Manager Response: Ashlash,  Thank you for the wonderful feedback about your stay with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope that you will come back and see us again soon!

Summary: Shabby- needs considerable TLC. Very run down . Would rate it a one, perhaps two, star hotel. It feels neglected as though corporate hasn’t made a visit for a long time.  It even has that neglected smell.  For an area that is definitely a vacation destination one would think Hilton/Doubletree would want to upgrade their offering.
Manager Response: Carole A,  Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback about your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback. We rely on guest feedback to know where we are doing well and the areas where we can improve. We hope that you will give us another chance to win back your business and show you we care.  Thank you!  William J.  Operations Supervisor

Summary: We didn’t want to drive far and staying at doubletree in Dana point was a good option.   We really appreciate how accommodating and informative Shane was.   The breakfast both days were good but the service 2nd was a bit of a wait to order.   The room was a bit small considering it’s suppose to be a deluxe. Otherwise it was fine.   Location was good to get to a local spot to surf.
Manager Response: Ms. TravelBug1970,  Thank you for leaving feedback about your stay with us. It is always a good feeling to hear that guests enjoyed their stay with us. We hope that you will come visit us again soon!

Summary: It’s fine for a doubletree but restaurant was closed, don’t do daily housekeeping still citing Covid and room itself was meh. For $400/night way too expensive. Location was ok but nothing immediately around. Bartender at the rooftop bar does make a mean spicy marg though!
Manager Response: Awaldy,  Thank you for your feedback and I will relay your comments to the appropriate department so we can work on improving the problem areas. We hope to have you back again to show you a better time.  Regards,  William J.  Operations Supervisor

Summary: I called the hotel asking if I could check in 1 hour early because it aligned with my travel time, I was told over the phone absolutely I could check in immediately my room was ready. So I check in, walk into my room and immediately smell sewer smells. Whatever, I inspect the bathroom THERE WERE MULTIPLE dead bugs in the sink, shaved hair, and toothpaste stains all just in the sink. I look over at the pile of folded “clean” towels and there was a dead bug ontop of those. I look in the shower and there was a dead spider. I looked in the fridge, DEAD BUGS. I was horrified at this point. The drawers were all wide open in the room as well as house keeping supplies were on the floor. I Immediately went down stairs and told the front desk worker and showed him pictures I took of the

William Jobin Operations Supervisor

Summary: Our wonderful stay began with a visit to the upper floor Longboard Bar, where we got to experience Randi, the friendliest bartender!  The service and hustle was amazing!  Randi’s knowledge and ability to keep the crowd entertained and happy was wonderful.  On the hotel side our room was spacious with a great ocean view, sitting area and very comfortable beds.  Valet parking and in general the hotel staff was very attentive.  Enjoying our stay very much.
Manager Response: Dear Brian,  Wow! What an amazing review to read. Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback about your stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that your stay was excellent. Summary: Inattentive management and nothing is open (restaurant closes early and rooftop lounge is not open). The noise from the traffic is not comfortable. Parking is expensive at $29 and they still ask you to return to your car to place a receipt on the dash. How inconvenient!!!
Manager Response: Dear Trek624309gggggg,  Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback about your stay with us. I apologize if the management appeared to be inattentive to your needs during your stay, however our front desk staff are more than empowered to make decisions that could have been addressed during your stay. We are in the process of opening the rooftop lounge and invite you to come join us for our opening on New Years Eve! If there is anything further I can do to assist you, please don't hesitate to reach out to me directly at the hotel. Happy Holidays and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Upon reading several reviews prior I will have to agree with some of them.   Long read, stay with me.     We booked this as an escape from Nebraska in December.   We booked two “Ocean View” rooms.   I even called to confirm prior to arriving and the person who I talked to assured me everything would be great.      After an entire day of travel and pure exhaustion we check in.   One of our rooms is ocean view and one of our rooms was a standard king suite.   The person at the desk (who I will name if needed by management) literally told me they didn’t have any of those rooms for us (we had a room for our one adult child one minor child  and one for us - the kids got the good room that we were paying for - ha).   I advised that was NOT what we paid for and was not ok settling.

Summary: Kora is the worst front desk I’ve ever encountered, rude, condescending. We will never return to this location as long as Kora is employed here . This was the worst experience our family has encountered

I apologize that there was an issue with the front desk agent during your check-in regarding an early check in fee. We hope that you will come back and give us another chance to show you a wonderful experience.

Summary: There are many other nicer cleaner options in the area. The only thing quality about this property is the cookies and location. The rooms stink and are dirty. The resort needs to be updated. The restaurant is sub par.

Summary: This location has FANTASTIC staff. No matter how many times I had a question or needed help, they immediately responded. Not only that, but it was always with a pleasant and kind attitude. Our entire group absolutely loved meeting at Double Tree Suites (Doheny Beach) and that is because they did a phenomenal job taking care of us. They posted signs so our group knew where to go, they helped with sound set-up, they set the space up exactly as requested and everyone loved the rooms. We had between 50-60 people in our group and had plenty of space to spread out in the 2 meeting spaces we used. We chose to have a dinner the first night there and the food was excellent! Overall I can't say enough great things about this location. Oh! I almost forgot to mention it's right across the

Summary Heading: Charming beach hotel access to beach‼️
Summary: Great location with beach access, fun surf culture theme , local amenities and harbor available . Peaceful sleep and good value !  Accommodating special needs  fir my 92 years of age mother and support dog We wish we could have stayed longer .
Manager Response: none

Summary: Expect to have noise, older rooms with musty room. I’ve stayed for two weeks. They don’t clean every day. The restaurant isn’t open for lunch or dinner. The roof top bar is not open. You have to go out to the bar or places for dinner.

Summary: I was concerned about booking here after reading the reviews about the hotel smelling and being dated.  We stayed there for 3 days and had nothing but a great experience.  No bad smells, everything was clean, and the sheets were super soft and comfy.  There was a tear in the sofa, so I guess I got the room I read that review about but it didn't have any effect on my stay.  The sofa is really big, with a raised coffee table that lets you eat easily.  There are 2 large tvs in the room... one where the beds are the other in the living area.  The frig was actually COLD and kept our food great.  We got the ocean view room we requested, it was quiet and everything i had hoped for.  It's so close to everything but totally secluded at the same time.  Pool was great, clean, kids loved

Summary: The hotel was dirty  The room was worse. It smelled & had about 20 roaches in the bathroom which hotel claimed were termites !! Disgusting  Had to drive home 295 miles/ 6 hours to get back home. This place should be condemned  No help with baggage or even baggage carts available. Hilton Double Tree but no restaurant available since it was a Thursday
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great for Conferences & to Just Get Away
Summary: Our organization held the annual conference at Double Tree Suites, Doheny Beach. We had never held it at a hotel before so we weren't sure how things would turn out. The entire staff was amazing. The sales team made sure everything was set before we arrived, and even had the maintenance team swap out some lightbulbs that were going to be a distraction. The front desk helped us several times, as they were the closest staff to our conference room. And the group meals were delicious. The muffins for breakfast were soft and warm, the sandwiches tasted like it came from a gourmet bistro, and their Mahi Mahi dinner plate and salad were divine. And they provided coffee, tea, flavored water and bottled water all day. Conference aside, the rooms were very clean, spacious and had two TVs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Right away, the first thing I must say is "WARM CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIES"!!! I am familiar with this hotel, as I have been attending Ohana Festival since 2016 and this hotel is across the street from the festival which is very convenient; however, although you can see a shopping center (Carl's Jr, A's Burgers, etc), it's not easily accessible on foot. Since it's right on PCH, you literally have to walk further down to the paseo (ped bridge)  in order to get there, essentially passing the shopping center and double back. Someone mentioned in their review that you cannot walk through the campground to the beach. I was able to with no issue, but the pictures may mislead people to think the hotel is "on the beach". It is not, but has a good view of the ocean. I was lucky and had
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amazing experience from beginning to end.   Starting with Nicholas, the Manager & the front desk ladies, you all so nice and accommodating.  We also were very impressed with the restaurant, we were pleasantly surprised, the dinner & breakfast we had were so good!  Special shout out to our Server, Randi, truly the best server we ever had.  You just have to go and eat while she's there to experience her one of a kind service.  You won't be disappointed....
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awesome time!  So convenient no $10 bus ride too cool Ohana festival 2021 close to Ritz Carlton pool bar and Starbucks
Summary: Great location for attending the Ohana Festival.  My friend and I drove from Porter Ranch over 100 miles and didn’t want to drive back same evening after seeing Pearl Jam concert.  Literally walked across the street along beach one half block to event.  I was Gold now Silver Hilton Honors and some how hooked me up with $29 Parking fee, great service.  After the concert there was a lot of cool people at the bar and pool having great time from all over including Argentina and bands.  Roof top lookout over the beach and  lagoon to hang out too.  Room had two TV’s one in lounge and another by the sleeping area.  Park right in front valet and check in same price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Also, our stay was very unsatisfactory.  Many issues.  4 guests (with 3 females) and we were only given 2 towels.  Asked 3 times before more towels and shampoo.  Couldn't use my app and digital key.  Booked through hotel.com but reservation was canceled and I have no record of the stay expect from my CC.  When we arrived room was not ready.  No apology or explanation.  It was a busy weekend and only one very slow elevator worked and not stairs to the parking garage.  Most of all, the advertising pictures of the hotel was extremely deceptive.  Pictures showed the hotel on the beach.  Not the case.  It is across the street and behind a campground, that we were not allow to go through to access the beach.  We had to walk several blocks to get to the beach.  Even then, we were given

Summary: My girlfriend and I were excited about a 7 night stay at this hotel, but we were dismayed when we saw the room. For a room billed as a "deluxe king suite", it really resembled a sleazy motel room facing the highway. The bathroom sink was a nightmare to operate. Some of the furniture was crumbling at the bases. And the bed/ pillows were not something to compliment either. The management has been doing a poor job in getting back to me in regards to my complaints. Great location though.

Summary: I booked a room for the third time to attend the Ohana Festival across the street. The location is the best in the area because it is a short walk to Doheny State Beach. However, I am disappointed in the hotel. There was only 1 working elevator and the other was extremely slow. The beds were clean and comfortable enough, but the bathroom was a disaster. The shower door didn't close all the way, so water would leak out onto the floor. The sliding bathroom door has open areas on both sides that doesn't allow full privacy. This is not acceptable when you are traveling with friends and not family. There is not much space for your toiletries since there is just a pedestal sink. The towels were crunchy instead of soft. The room smelled damp at all times. On a positive note, the
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is located in a beautiful area so I expect more. Our room wasn’t cleaned properly we found pills on the floor beside our bed and dresser our bathtub was rusty and our couch had rips in it and we reported it but nothing was done, I had to request for clean towels twice.

Summary Heading: Camping across the street in a tent would've been better!!!!!
Summary: Hilton DIAMOND - not given the room reserved almost a year ago!  Instead given a suite with no air conditioning on the 3rd floor with only one working elevator.  Not offered water upon arriving.   This room was booked for NINE nights, and after the 2nd night of 80 degrees in the room, we asked for another room and offered to be drastically downgraded.  The room smelled so damp and musty, the bathtub was full of mildew and there are sand fleas everywhere.  If you want to pay $300 a night to rough it - this is your place!  We expect more from Hilton!

Summary Heading: Location is great, but don’t expect much more than that.

Summary: We had a great experience at the doubletree at Dana Point.   The room was clean and had a great view of the ocean.  The staff was wonderful, everyone I spoke with was friendly. The concierge very helpful. She was just delightful.

Summary Heading: Beach view = on top of freeway

I called the hotel to see if we can get what we paid for - for this couple to have a view on one of the most special nights of their lives. The girl kept saying "signature view" and I corrected to ocean view. Finally she said this is considered an ocean view. Summary: We stayed at Doheny Doubletree and it was easy to get to and in the middle of everything we needed. Hotel was clean and well taken care of. If you don’t like the amenities at the hotel, you have lots of great options very close.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrible experience!  All my complaints were voiced at the beginning of this review.   As a Hilton Honors member, bookin
Summary: All my complaints were voiced at the beginning of this review.   As a Hilton Honors member, booking and paying for three rooms for my daughters' wedding.  We needed access to food at lunchtime, size of rooms and availability requested.  Nothing was as we expected.  I wish we had gone with our second choice.  It would easily have been better.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The views from the room were ok. We were in front of a group of palm trees which blocked out view of the ocean. The roof top bar was not open. You could tell the bathroom had not been deep cleaned in awhile and there was no hot water when I took a shower. Also, the sheets are scratchy! For the price, definitely not worth the $$$.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The WORST Hotel Stay in the last 10 years.
Summary: I visited this hotel with a 13 year old and a 10 month old. The amenities are laughable - the pool is full of dirt and sand and looks like it hasn't been updated in 20 years or even cleaned. The staff is over run - oh and they didnt clean the room ! they never bothered to tell us that they wouldn't until we realized they hadn't been there on the first day.  Save yourself the money and the disappointment and dont go there!
Manager Response: Dear michaeladosamantes,  The interior of our pool was just recently resurfaced before summer and we can also assure you our maintenance team monitors the overall cleanliness throughout the day although we are not able to shut the pool down completely due to the overall guest popularity in the middle of the day .  Given our hotel's phenomenal proximity to world famous Doheny Beach our pool experiences high demand from guests returning from the beach utilizing the pool to rinse the sand off before returning to their guest rooms and our most sincere apologies this impacted your overall experience with us.  Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back the next time your travels bring you to Orange County.

Summary Heading: the rooftop lounge was a great gathering place for our group overlooking the ocean
Summary: Gloria was our server for our group Sunday brunch and she was excellent! Good food and she kept an eye on refilling, was gracious to all the young ones playing/running around. We were there for a family reunion and it worked out great
Manager Response: Dear H6348QLkarenw,  Welcome to the Doubletree Doheny Beach family and elated to discover you had a phenomenal vacation here in Dana Point!  We will be sure to recognize our all star associates as a result of your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary Heading: This hotel looks nice from afar, but needs a deep cleaning
Summary: I’m the past, the DT at Doheny is my go to spot. I love the location, it’s right across the street from the beach. I belong to their Honors program and usually that comes with perks (top floor rooms). I always upgrade to a balcony room. Upon entering my room I immediately noticed the hair in the sink (not mine) and the dirty bathroom. Ok fine, they’re short staffed My room definitely had sand fleas too. I came home with bites on my ankles, face, back, and arms. I have a strong reaction and get big welts. I wish the room had a microwave. And the carpets need to be cleaned or replaced, they’re dirty.  I don’t know if I will stay here again next time I’m in town.
Manager Response: Dear 293kristi,  From the bottom of our hearts thank you so very much for being a loyal repeat guest to our hotel over the years and being a valued Hilton Honors member.  Our most genuine apologies for your experience and have already contacted our third party specialist to perform a detailed inspection of the room based on your feedback.  While these are challenging times, our team can assure you we are both committed and dedicated to delivering exceptional guest experiences moving forward.

Summary: This hotel should not be included in the Hilton brand. Very misleading information and photos on website.Room overlooked train tracks and freeway. Extremely noisy all night. Room was not clean and bed was horrible. Basically, this was the worse hotel experience ever and was not even able to stay a second night as we got zero sleep. Our little weekend get away was wrecked. Do not recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear M5965DTjudyb,  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and encourage you to reserve one of our signature view or surf side suites on a future visit for the best available sunset views.  Our most sincere apologies we were not able to exceed your expectations on your recent visit and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next trip to Dana Point

Summary Heading: Horrible Doheny Beach property needs renovation. Not qualified as a Hilton property
Summary: -Initially Room 293 Phone didn’t work.  Toilet not clean.  Hair in shower, so that wasn’t cleaned either. In new room 395, vanity mirror light didn’t work. White Pool chairs all had dirty stains. Hair in pool.  A lot was in the pool, obviously it hardly gets cleaned.  Property not well kept.  Expected more from Hilton. Staff not really surprised by my reports.  They must know of the issues.
Manager Response: Dear MisterVegaso,  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and our sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations.  We have already shared your comments with our housekeeping and maintenance teams as a result of your feedback to enhance the guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Things are really kinda tough for all businesses and the Double Tree by Hilton Dana Point is no different. Like many hotels you have to actually ask for maid service and it’s a 24 hour wait to get it. But anything you may need they will help you get it, like towels, trash bags , coffee etc. I gotta tell you for so many businesses they are only as good as their employees. All of the Doubletree‘s staff have been very helpful and pleasant. Erin and Kay as well as Miguel on the night shift at the front desk will do anything for you and are wonderful. Parking in the hotel could be considered pricy ($26 a day) but they have Valet some of the time and that makes things convenient. Remember, this is Dana Point and parking is at a premium. Robert in Valet is a great help. As far as the
Manager Response: Dear Compass19134878072,  Our team is absolutely delighted to hear you were able to experience the authentic hospitality from our all star associates that the Doubletree Doheny Beach is known for over the years.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review, it is most genuinely appreciated and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next vacation to Dana Point!

Summary: It is conveniently located across Doheny  Beach State Park, just have to cross the street (PCH). Service is so so, one elevator not working. Parking garage has some flooding with water leaking with continuous drip from the ceiling pipes. Bathroom needs more cleaning.
Manager Response: Dear Loida R,  We certainly hope you enjoyed your well deserved staycation and genuinely apologize for the out of order elevator as we are in the process of modernizing all of the equipment.  Thank you so very much for your valued feedback and our team looks forward to welcoming you back to the Doubletree Doheny Beach hopefully sooner rather than later.

Summary: I had asked for a front room with a view of the ocean. The reservation agent said this was possible, to be confirmed at checking in. However, the person at the front desk did not seem interested in searching for a better room and assigned a room on the rear side of the hotel, facing a noisy road.
Manager Response: Dear mauricioalbuquerque,  Our signature view rooms are definitely the most popular room types we have here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach and our sincere apologies we were not able to accommodate your request on your recent vacation.  Please kindly let us know if we can assist making a future reservation on your return visit to Dana Point and thank you so very much for being a valued guest!

Summary: Location was good…right across from the beach. However, our room was FILTHY. Clumps of hair that were NOT ours, were in the shower. Luke warm water, and stains on the bedding. I would’ve left but we were there for a wedding weekend and everything was expensive since it was so last minute. The front desk ladies were fantastic though. Super friendly and knowledgeable of the area.
Manager Response: Dear taniakathleen910,  Thank you so very much for your kind comments regarding our rock star associates at the front desk and we have already shared your experience with our housekeeping team.  Please accept our most sincere apologies and genuinely hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience on your next visit to Dana Point.

Summary: We picked this hotel for an informal reunion of high school friends, which was centrally located for most of us. We got a great deal on Travelzoo so it was easier to ignore the one, out-of-order elevator, small bathrooms, and a toilet that required the lid to be removed and the lever to be manually maneuvered to flush... The main reason I am writing this review is to let everyone know how much we enjoyed, Randi, the pool bartender/attendant. She was so funny and personable...she had us hysterically laughing as she shared stories from some of the other jobs she holds. She definitely should look into adding "stand-up comedian" as another job she is qualified to do! If you don't want to spend the night, just stop in for a drink and enjoy the show!
Manager Response: Dear 582donnaa,  Super cool of you to share your service encounters with our all star associate as they are definitely some of the best and most entertaining in the hospitality industry.  We will be to recognize her as a result of your feedback and glad to hear you enjoyed your impromptu reunion weekend here at the Doubletree Dana Point!

Summary Heading: Disappointed & Frustrated w/ Hilton's lack of response
Summary: We recently booked a room for two nights at the DoubleTree Hilton Dana Point. CA. My husband booked the room and was told we would have a partial view of the ocean. When we arrived we were told that there are no more partial view rooms until the following night. So, we agreed to a different room. What we didn't expect was for it to back to a very noisy Interstate. Beyond this, the room was filthy and I took at several pictures of bugs or toothpaste on a shower wall, a dirty faucet in the bathroom, hair in the sink, a bullet hole in the window, and thick cobwebs in the window. I'm not sure the room was cleaned at all after the previous guest. It was truly the dirtiest hotel I've ever seen. Prior to posting this review we have tried on multiple occasions to reach a live person who
Manager Response: Dear Tamara S,  We certainly hear and sense your frustration and extend our most heartfelt apologies for your recent experience.  Please kindly call the hotel at (949) 661-1100 and ask to speak with the manager on duty to obtain some additional information.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: This hotel is a complete dump.  When we checked in, both elevators in the lobby were out of order.  Had to push our baggage cart (no help) through the parking garage to reach another elevator.  Next, when we got to our room, it was totally beat up.  the shower door did not close, and my wife lost her mind when she saw a large yellow stain on one of the pillows.  Not to mention the blue ink stains on one of the sheets.  We switched rooms, and shortened our stay by 1 night.  Lousy location too.
Manager Response: Dear Navigator608232,  We completely own and acknowledge your dissatisfaction regarding the lobby elevators and our team had to make the decision based on putting overall safety first and foremost above anything and everything else.  Our team appreciates your overall understanding and our most sincere apologies it impacted your overall experience with us.

Summary: We’ve stayed at this hotel before and LOVE the proximity to Dana Point.  We came back because of how great our experience was but was really disappointed in the comfort and finishes for the price we paid.
Manager Response: Dear 818wanda,  Our team could not agree with you more about our spectacular location close to Dana Point Harbor in the "whale watching capital of the world as well as our proximity to world famous Doheny Beach!  Thank you so very much for being a loyal/return guest to the Doubletree Dana Point and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Hotel was filthy and neglected. Elevators and A/C broken, disgusting carpets, grime everywhere. Would recommend that the hotel be knocked down, rebuilt and restaffed. Dreaded returning to my room. Just horrible.
Manager Response: Dear spir0a,  As with all things in life, beauty is in the eye of the beholder and our most sincere apologies we were not able to exceed your expectations on your recent visit.  Thank you so very much for sharing your feedback with us and being a valued guest.

Summary Heading: Expect to encounter a run down property
Summary: I was very disappointed with the condition of the hotel and the behavior of the employees. Despite an abundance of signage to wear a mask, Hilton’s statements re: taking many precautions for the pandemic, I did not see ANY employee wearing a mask. There were no guests wearing masks and no enforcements of the rules. I did not receive my complimentary cookie and wasn’t offered one or anything else. Additionally the two main elevators did not work and I was directed to the garage elevator which was very far away from my room, which no one mentioned. While the room was mostly clean (save for the large piece of dark hair on the toilet seat) it was very run down. The shelf the mini fridge sat in was clearly water damaged and old. The bathroom was extremely small and due to the age of
Manager Response: Dear ily171,  The state of California lifted any and all COVID protocols on June 15th and our team is saddened to discover you were still expecting all associates and guests to be wearing masks during your visit.  We definitely hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back the next time your travels bring you to Dana Point.

Summary: We choose this property for our wedding weekend. My wife to stay in the night before and the both of us the night of. We had some issues with room cleaning. We had requested the room to be cleaned and they had even called to confirm. When my wife and I arrived in the room the night after our wedding the room had not been serviced. The phone to call down to the desk was not working I had to use my cellphone to get fresh towels to the room.
Manager Response: Dear chasemdavis,  Congratulations on the nuptials and wishing you and yours a lifetime of happiness together from the entire team here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We extend our most genuine apologies for the miscommunication for you not receiving housekeeping service as requested during your stay with us.  Our team has implemented an enhanced housekeeping tracking system as a result of your feedback in order to prevent it from impacting the overall guest experience moving forward.  Our team  certainly hopes to have the opportunity to celebrate many of your wedding anniversaries with you in the years ahead!

Summary: I can't tell you how disappointed we were in the Hilton Double Tree Doheny Beach.  DO NOT BOOK WITH THIS HOTEL. THEY ARE NOT HONEST AND GIVE ROOMS BOOKED FOR MONTHS IN ADVANCE TO DIAMOND MEMBERS. We booked an ocean view suite for my fathers 91st birthday. Siblings toured the property 2 days prior. Checked in with Dad and they gave him a regular room. No explanation.No reduction in price.  Checked in with desk the following morning. The response was that they had an air conditioning problem and so suites were not available. We asked to see the suites without air. Apparently, there were no suites without air. They were waiting for the DIAMOND member to move to another suite.  Completely lied about the situation. Manager claimed he had no knowledge about the conversation from the
Manager Response: Dear Y7675ZWsandyc,  Our most sincere apologies for the miscommunication and the extenuating circumstances of having to put the room out of order as a result of the air conditioning not working in the guest room.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your feedback with our team

Summary Heading: Decent hotel for the price and location
Summary: The location is a little awkward to get into but close to everything. The rooms were large and had plenty of room for a family. No room service and not stocking rooms with enough amenities was inconvenient to continue to call when ran out of things. Doors slammed very loudly and the hotel is a little run down.
Manager Response: Dear HMJansen,  Our team is elated to hear you had such a phenomenal family vacation here at the Doubletree Dana Point and enjoyed our spacious guest room suites!  We genuinely appreciate your valued feedback and look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights in an Ocean View room (We looked right out on Doheny Beach) ,while some things were still down (Main elevators) we enjoy walking up stairs and we were also by the secondary elevator so it was not an issue. The Staff here has always been very pleasant and helpful! Like others have said  at the restaurant we had Randi as our server and she was wonderful! She was funny but quick and competent and made our breakfast very enjoyable! No issues with our room, clean and comfy bed, clean bathroom but the wifi was a bit sketchy! Overall though we enjoyed our stay in Dana Point with Randi the waitress getting big kudos!!!
Manager Response: Dear Laura S,  First and foremost a very Happy Belated Birthday and there is no better place to spend it then right here in beautiful Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for sharing your four bubble experience with us and hope to celebrate the next life occasion with you sooner rather than later!

Summary: Randi in the restaurant was one of the highlights of our stay. From the moment we walked in she was attentive and very friendly.  She could almost anticipate everything we needed to make our dining experience a delightful one.  She handled every request expeditiously.  She was amazing and patient with our son, who has Autism.I would absolutely dine there again, and would hope to receive the same phenomenal service. I would give Randi 5 stars.  Our overall stay though was a 4.  For these reasons:  *Elevator was broken all 4 days of our stay! This was beyond inconvenient.  We also had elderly and handicapped people in our large group and this made navigating in and out of the hotel a challenge, and additionally dangerous in case of emergency. This also happened at another Hilton
Manager Response: Dear ThisBosB,  We are absolutely ecstatic to hear you were able to experience the authentic hospitality from our all star associates during your recent stay here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our most heartfelt apologies for the major inconvenience of having one operating guest room elevator and that it prevented a five bubble impeccable stay and understand your frustration.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Not getting what you pay for.
Summary: I was hoping for a spectacular room given the location and price but the bathroom has the dirtiest tub and shower . I have never been in a hotel room with a dirty tub. The front desk offered me another room but the tub was just as dirty . I had to buy a cleaner and scrub it myself.
Manager Response: Dear Marjorie W,  Our most sincere apologies the current condition of the guestroom bathtubs significantly impacted your overall stay with us here in Dana Point.  We can assure you that the bathtubs will be resurfaced during our next scheduled guestroom renovation and hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience at that time.

Summary: Very loud through out the night, mold in the bathroom, stained sheets, broken elevators, overall run down. I won’t stay here again and I do not recommend staying here.   Positives were... Rooms are spacious, front desk staff was friendly, and walking distance to the beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked an ocean view, upon arrival I was told the room was no longer available. Instead of an ocean view I had a view of the dirty wash off pch. Room was located next door to storage closet that staff accessed every morning, waking us up an an awful hour. Toilet ran, shower didn’t drain properly and the website says roof top bar but….it was closed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: What more needs to be said. Just avoid this at all costs and given the inflated costs of this place you will have some $ to use elsewhere. Hilton should be ashamed of having this property in its portfolio.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked a suite for my dad's 91st birthday only to have them checked into a random standard room. When we asked why the next day, the front desk people said it was because the air conditioning was broken; when we asked to see the room we found out they had give it to a "Diamond" member. We wasted the better part of a day of the birthday weekend trying to sort it out. The air con was indeed broken, as was one of the elevators. The hotel is in dire need of an update. It is old and tired and the service is terrible. Plenty of MUCH nicer places to stay in Dana Point!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not worth the money! No room service, no bar, no house keeping. For $400/night I wish I would of stayed home. Only one functioning elevator. The location is great but because there are no amenities available, the building is outdated, etc….at best a $100/night MOTEL.
Manager Response: Dear dennisgase,  Our team is glad to hear you enjoyed our spectacular location and amazing panoramic views of world famous Doheny Beach on your recent vacation to Dana Point.  Please accept our most heartfelt apologies we did not exceed your expectations and understand your frustration as our goal is to have all hotel amenities available to our valued guests as soon as possible.  We certainly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on a future visit.

Summary Heading: Poor hotel / room quality & service for the rate
Summary: Poor services / quality of the room rate (~$380/day):  * The balcony door was broken / had makeshift door lock * The room safe box was not working  * Restaurant during breakfast was extremely busy. We were asked to wait to be seated while others were passing us to order food. We eventually left without breakfast  * No daily housekeeping service for fixing the room. * Internet was intermittent and we had to reconnect every 5 mins
Manager Response: Dear amtraveller,  Our most sincere apologies items in your guestroom were not properly addressed prior to your arrival and wish our team had the opportunity to make it right during your recent stay with us.  We genuinely appreciate this valuable feedback and can assure you our maintenance team has addressed the items you shared with us.  Our team hopes to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience on your next visit to Dana Point.

Summary Heading: This place is NOT typical of the Doubletree brand
Summary: No issues with the staff. All the personnel we encountered from the front desk, car valets and restaurant were courteous, engaging and accommodating. But that’s where this experience ends. Im shocked Hilton has placed its brand (At any level) on this hotel. As a Diamond member, we are entitled to an available upgrade.  But we also paid for the top level room.  What we got was a suite with an extra personal balcony/ patio. Ok…Screen doors were broken., patti grimy and furniture is reminiscent of Motel 6 level. We also paid for ocean view. Unfortunately, we have to look through palm trees that haven’t been trimmed in YEARS! Look down and it looks like same for the landscaping of the grounds.  Also, of the 2 elevators available for guests (and staff) only one was working. I
Manager Response: Dear Csheaaz,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a Hilton Diamond member, you are our most valued guest. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. Our team is committed to do whatever it takes to ensure you are satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: We were extremely disappointed as Hilton Doubletree hotels are typically very nice and consistent- not the case here!  This property has a good location but is old, outdated and too expensive for what you get.
Manager Response: Dear jjiacobucci58,  We are thrilled you loved our convenient location to anything and everything Dana Point has to offer although saddened we did not meet your expectations from an overall perception of value for your money perspective.  Our team certainly hopes to have another opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: All was very good except noise and loud speeding cleaning people did early in the morning
Summary: Cleaning people did so much noise early in the morning. And They ware talking so loudly!  People on the desk are very nice and helpful. Room is good especially for 4 guests  The pool is little bit small.
Manager Response: Dear annaghasabyan,  Our team definitely appreciates your five bubble review and elated to hear you had a such an enjoyable visit here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for passing along your observations in regards to our housekeeping team and we will be sure to address it to prevent it from occurring in the future and our most genuine apologies for the disturbance.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County

Summary Heading: Not as good as the pics
Summary: Great location for the price but it’s an OLD hotel— room was clean but the shower still had hair on the walls and mold on the edges.  The air conditioning fan would not stay on and sounded like someone was kicking the door every time it came on and turned off.
Manager Response: Dear JeremyMiller678,  Our team is thrilled you enjoyed our amazing location and panoramic views of world famous Doheny Beach during your stay!  We can assure you your feedback has been addressed with our housekeeping and engineering teams and our most sincere apologies it impacted your overall experience.  Thank you so very much for sharing your comments with us as it allows us to identify our opportunity areas and improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary Heading: Racially profiled, dirty rooms, closed amenities.
Summary: Difficulty getting a room that was ready; paid for the same room as everyone in our wedding party, I was the first one to arrive and was told in a rude manner “room ain’t ready yet, come at 4” within minutes everyone else in my wedding party follower and they all got a room with no issues, they are also all white, when I came back, visibly frustrated I was told there is still no room available, when I said I feel like I’m getting played around with they magically had a room available; bar was closed for no reason, toothpaste all over sink, dirty shower, flooded bathroom on 2nd floor, expensive for no reason, rude staff.
Manager Response: Dear adambianchessi,  Our most sincere apologies your specific room type was not  immediately available well before our check-in time of 4PM and will definitely utilize this as a training opportunity for our front desk team to offer first available rooms as opposed potentially waiting for the specific room type originally requested in your reservation.  We can assure you that  would have resolved this scenario on the spot and prevented your overall first impression of our hotel.  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us as it allows us to enhance the guest experience moving forward.

Summary: The location is great but the overall atmosphere of the hotel is severely lacking especially for the high cost of the rooms. No food or drink service; no cleaning of the rooms; nothing extra offered at all.
Manager Response: Dear olcottn2021,  Thank you so very much for sharing your recent experience with us and glad you enjoyed our phenomenal location in close proximity to everything Dana Point has to offer our visiting guests!  Housekeeping service is available upon request and enhanced food and beverage offerings are available from the hotel gift shop for enjoyment by the pool and patio areas throughout the hotel.  Our team sincerely appreciates your feedback and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Randi is an excellent waitress especially when there are a ton of people pulling and tugging her in many directions. She apologized to us for the delay in our meal and was very friend. Thank u Randi 4 making our day.
Manager Response: Dear kendeef,  Very cool of you to acknowledge and recognize our rock star restaurant team and glad you were able to experience the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Doheny Beach has become known for over the years  We genuinely appreciate your five bubble review and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County

Summary: the room was dirty and not ready on time. others in the group also had dirty rooms. one had to check into 3 different rooms at 10pm at night because of how bad the condition of the room was. overall the experience was not pleasant
Manager Response: Dear omarpreciado1,  Please accept our sincerest apologies you did not have a favorable first impression of our hotel and we will be sure to address your concerns as a result of your feedback when planning our next guestroom renovation.  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Worst Hilton Brand Hotel I have ever stayed in the past 1 0 years
Summary: - Old and dirty room - As a diamont member, assigned a room next to the highway. Asked to switch, and then switch to a room next to the railway... - They forgot to apply the breakfast credit for elite members, and they didn't admit it. Mentioning it is not applicable during July 4th weekend. - Checkout agent was rude and emotional. Yelling at the guest and didn't listen. - Worst Hilton brand hotel I have ever stayed. Really the worst, no exception.
Manager Response: Dear MichaelG5712,  Our most sincere and heartfelt apologies we were not able to provide you a complimentary room upgrade due to our premium suites being fully committed during the dates of your stay and that it negatively impacted your entire experience here at our hotel.   As a Hilton Honors Diamond member you are our most valued guest and genuinely appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton brands over the years.  We certainly hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience on a future visit.

Summary Heading: Run down for a high price
Summary: Hotel is in poor shape for the cost of the nightly rate.  Black mold, stains on furniture, not working highlights of the room (fireplace) and no cleaning during the stay.  Trash sitting in the hallways.  Had to share a balcony we paid extra for with a family of 6 (4 adults & 2 toddlers) screaming and their stuff scattered everywhere.  We did not get to use the patio we paid extra for.  Only good thing about this hotel was the location.
Manager Response: Dear C_dennnnn,  Our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit and that the adjoining guests negatively impacted your overall experience with us.  We certainly strive to deliver a best in class guest experience and will utilize your feedback as a retraining opportunity for our entire team.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your visit with us, it is genuinely appreciated as it allows us to enhance the guest experience moving forward.

Summary Heading: Had a happy 4th in Dana Point
Summary: Things started off a little shaky.  Arrived around 11:30am and was told our room wasn't ready.  No big deal there.  We were hanging out in the harbor anyway on a boat.  Called around 3:30 and still wasn't ready.  OK, was told it would be ready in 15 minutes.  So we headed back over around 4:00.  Didn't actually get our room until close to 5pm.  We are fairly relaxed people, so it wasn't a huge issue for us. The saving grace for this hotel is the staff.  From Dan who works with the valet team, to Chantelle at the front desk, Lisa in the restaurant, and Allison the manager.  They were all very courteous and kind, and made sure we were taken care of.  We were comped some food from the restaurant, and a couple of much needed beers.  Again, we never even complained, this was all
Manager Response: Dear thadden1971,  No better place to spend the 4th of July holiday weekend then right here in Dana Point where the Doubletree Doheny Beach offers panoramic views of the fireworks that has guests returning every year!  Our team is thrilled you were able to experience the authentic hospitality from our all star associates and we will be sure recognize them as a result of your feedback.  Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Miscommunication to start with .  Dirty room  Horrible smell  Poor customer  interaction  Things were closed and not told to us Paid for ocean view and and did not get one Kaye was the only nice and helpful one
Manager Response: Dear courtneywhetstone,  Our most sincere apologies you did not experience a favorable first impression of our hotel and can assure you we are doing our absolute very best to proactively communicate to all guests through the channels available to us.  We have shared your comments with our operations team for their immediate follow up and genuinely appreciate you sharing your feedback with us as a training opportunity for the entire team.

Summary: There is no roof top lounge No room service The restaurant was only open for breakfast  The rooms were nice that had a patio but not much of a view of the beach. My first room was located on second floor which I switched and paid more money. The room on the second floor faced the busy road
Manager Response: Dear Virginia C,  We are also looking forward to expanding our food and beverage offerings throughout the hotel and are getting closer each day.  The team extends our most sincere apologies this impacted your overall stay with us.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and look forward to you returning on a future visit.

Summary: Great weekend at the beach, beach across the street!   and so close to town,  we could walk to our favorite healthy spot “Vibe” and we love Stacked pancakes and Starbucks so close and Denny’s for a grand slam breakfast… great Beachy vibe  .
Manager Response: Dear TrailBlazer313807,  Our team is over the moon to hear you enjoyed our phenomenal "beach house vibe" and our spectacular location close to everything Dana Point has to offer!  We are looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County

Summary Heading: DoubleTree Hotel in Doheney is Triple D and F
Summary: Dated. Dirty. Disaster. F for the frontdesk staff. This hotel falls short of Hilton standards, for the price/points that they are asking for. The 3 stars are for the location - walking distance to Doheney Beach. However, the restaurant selection (within walking distance of 1 mile) is limited. The pool lounge chairs were not cleaned nor disinfected. The bathroom was a disaster - leaking shower door, dirty grouts, clogged bath tub drain. When we first got to our room, we were surprised that the "clean seal" was not attached to the door and we discovered that the maintenance staff were working in the bathroom.The "clean seal" sticker on the door is false assurance. They did not disinfect the area they worked on (good thing we have our own Lysol). Obviously they did not fix the
Manager Response: Dear Crys_CC,  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and our most genuine apologies we did not exceed your expectations during your recent visit.  Your feedback has been shared with our operations team to enhance the guest experience moving forward and certainly hope you will give our team a second chance on a future stay with us.

Summary: We stayed for three nights and our room was never cleaned by housekeeping. We had to ask at the front desk for fresh towels and coffee refills. My husband is a Hilton Diamond member which should allow us to get an automatic upgrade. This was not available at this property. The room was not clean when we arrived. There were random hairs in the shower. The sink faucet had not been cleaned in some time. The comforter had stains. The fabric on the couch was torn. The screen door was broken and off the track.
