The outdoor area was not usable because of the traffic noise.
Manager Response: Dear 314monae,  Our most sincere apologies we did not deliver a best in class experience that you have come to expect as a diamond member during your recent visit with us and can assure you this has been addressed at all levels with our operational leadership team.  Housekeeping service is currently available upon request with our team able to deliver any guest request items directly to guest rooms and due to our sold out status we are truly sorry a room upgrade was not available during your stay.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to provide us with your valuable feedback so we can enhance the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Hotel employees were great, the hotel itself wasn't.  The hotel smelled like smoke and I had to keep my windows closed at night so my baby wouldn't get second hand smoke exposure.  Overall, it was horrible
Manager Response: Dear BTyska,  We are delighted to hear you had such great guest service encounters with all of our amazing team members here at the Doubletree Dana Point although saddened to discover other hotel guests impacted your overall experience.  Our team does our very best to regulate our entire hotel non-smoking policy and will definitely utilize it as a training opportunity for all of our associates moving forward as a result of your valued feedback.  We definitely hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience in the future and genuinely appreciate you sharing your visit with us.

Summary: We had an Ocean view room! Easy access to Doheney Beach.  How ever Covid put a damper on a lot of the extras of Hotel stays.  It we appreciate that contact was kept at a minimum in these  crazy times. The location is the best part of staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Anniversary365,  We could not agree with you more about the gorgeous panoramic views and phenomenal proximity to world famous Doheny Beach here in Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest with us as we all continue to move onward and upward here in 2021!

Summary: The beds were nasty, vent in bathroom full of lent, hole in the wall, stains on couch and much more. I moved rooms, but I lost my double queen and ocean view. Not satisfied. I will not stay here by choice again.
Manager Response: Dear drjamar2021,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your recent visit and we have already addressed your feedback with our housekeeping leadership team.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your observations with us as it allows us to enhance the guest experience moving forward.

Summary Heading: Dohoney beach was beautiful and superb.
Summary: I loved my stay and cannot wait to return!! I loved everything about the beauty of this location. It was stunning, waterfront accent and quiet and peaceful. I would not hesitate to stay again anytime.
Manager Response: Dear kelleyyarnell2021,  Our team certainly values having you as a guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point as much as you enjoyed your recent stay with us so the feeling is definitely mutual!  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement of our hotel and we are already looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I’m pleased with my stay my best friend helped me book the surf side suite for my wedding night he and his wife stay there regularly and I’ve joined them for their stay and poolside fun we are locals and would definitely recommend this location to others.
Manager Response: Dear kaistix84,  We are absolutely delighted to hear you enjoyed your recent "staycation" here with us and welcome you to the Doubletree Dana Point Family!  Thank you so very much for your glowing recommendation, you have no idea how much we genuinely appreciate and value your support.

Summary: The room was nice.That is all  I would have enjoyed it better if the front desk had not lost my gift bag from the Wedding Room Block. It contained things they made especially for their guests who traveled to be there. Bad form.The front desk did not alert me there was a gift bag. I found out as we were on our way to the wedding. I couldn't carry the bag with me to the wedding so I asked them to hold it, they said no problem. When I returned to pick it up it had just disappeared! I waited hours the next morning at check out for them to locate the bag. I finally left and gave them my phone number to get in touch with me.No one ever called me to follow up - its been almost one week.  Hotel room had no glasses to drink from except for 1 plastic cup wrapped in more plastic for 2
Manager Response: Dear Lorelei S,  Our most sincere apologies all gift bags were distributed to guests that were here attending the wedding and genuinely sorry for the impact it had on your overall experience here at the hotel.  As we slowly begin to transition out of the current COVID protocols, our team is more than willing to provide any specific guest requests and service items in order to make all guest experiences more enjoyable in the interim.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and sincerely appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Summary: The room was very clean, no odors, nice ocean view, accessible to the beach, good food from their restaurant, quiet, very pleasant staff, parking was good, easy to change check in and check out. Unhappy that the top floor wasn’t open.
Manager Response: Dear mayeli2021,  The hotel team is thrilled you had an enjoyable visit here at the Doubletree Dana Point and genuinely appreciate you sharing your experience with us!  Our mission is to be the cleanest and friendliest hotel in Dana Point and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: 1. Front desk are not friendly especially the female 2. I called front desk and room service and rang forever like they’re avoiding the call because at some point it was going straight to voicemail  3. Bathroom walls and roof are old and cracking. The tub is rusty.  4. Room itself has not a lot of space and very difficult to walk around with5-6 people in the room 5. Not enough outlet 6. Curtains are dirty  7. Carpet is dirty, my eyes was red the entire stay even with allergy eye drops 8. There was an old pizza crumb on the couch 9. Air conditioning was not well distributed, it was super cold in the bed area but hot in the living space area 10. Hot water took forever to heat up  11. Valet parking was nit staffed. We checked out Sunday morning at 5;30am and was told the valet
Manager Response: Dear annalperin,  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and our most sincere apologies we were not able to exceed your expectations on your recent visit with us.  We will definitely utilize your feedback during our next guest room renovation as well as service essentials retraining for all of our associates  in order to provide an enhanced guest experience moving forward.

Summary Heading: Meh - toilet broken upon arrival - room was weirdly set up especially bathroom.  Noisy.  We did not really fappreciated.
Summary: Meh - toilet broken upon arrival - room was weirdly set up especially bathroom.  Could barely open shower door because it hit the toilet.  Conflicting info from staff.  Noisy.  We did not really feel appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear StevenF25411,  Our most genuine apologies you were not a fan of the layout of our guest rooms and we will be sure to utilize this as a training opportunity for our front desk team as a result of your valued feedback.  We strive to exceed all guest expectations and certainly hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience in the future.

Summary: Stayed here 1 night on our week-long leisurely from San Francisco to San Diego.  We had a 2 room suite with a balcony off the bedroom and a shared patio with the suite next to ours - sliders to that off of our living area.  Comfy bed and large living room with a fireplace.  Huge bath with large freestanding tub and separate shower and toilet in a jumbo sized bath which were separate from the 2 sink vanity counter.  Great location, weather was too cool to venture into the pool.  Would definitely recommend !!
Manager Response: Dear escapefromMichigan,  Sounds like the picture perfect vacation down the California coast and we are forever grateful for your five bubble endorsement of the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County

Summary: Our stay was a great. Staff was great, the hotel was clean. Breakfast was very good. The hotel take all cleanliness  precautions. It was our first getaway  since the pandemic. We will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Dear coconutlmg,  We genuinely appreciate you putting your trust and confidence in the Doubletree Dana Point team to deliver a safe and comfortable guest experience as we all continue to forge ahead here in 2021.  Thank you so very much for your endorsement and we all look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Is this really a Hilton property? Not the one I’m used too!
Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel for years because of the service and location and was always satisfied, however this trip was horrible. When we arrived there was no water for us to clean up after a day of traveling. After we unpacked we noticed a musty smell in the room and asked to be moved. The staff seemed undaunted. I was very confused by that. We tried the pool but my wife wouldn’t get in because the walls were covered in green algae. At this point I became totally disappointed. My breaking point came when after years staying in this hotel with Honors status we were told that a bag breakfast was the only one of two options and and to get a full meal there was an up charge. My wife and I went to the manager but he made empty promises and blamed the horrible conditions on Covid. I
Manager Response: Dear mjnlln,  Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel and the Hilton brands over the years and would like to offer our most heart felt apologies that we were momentarily addressing an urgent water repair upon your arrival here at the hotel.    During your visit we were in the process of professionally cleaning all carpets and furniture throughout the entire hotel and am very sorry this impacted your overall experience.  While we genuinely value you being a Hilton Honors member, unfortunately it is not our hotel's decision regarding Hilton's breakfast loyalty program and encourage you to contact Hilton Customer Care at  1-800-548-8690 to express your opinion as it pertains to the full breakfast upgrade fee.  Thank you so very much for providing us with your valuable feedback and will definitely utilize to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Poorly maintained and just run down.  This doesn’t match the online photos.   Think Days Inn with Doubletree prices plus closest beach access is closed for construction.  Ocean view is past a busy road and construction debris.
Manager Response: Dear StephenZ84,  We genuinely appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and will be sure to address the items mentioned during the next hotel renovation cycle.  As far as beach access goes, there are two different routes to explore to Doheny State Beach and encourage all guests to stop by the front desk so we can best direct everyone to their desired beach location.  We certainly hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I love double tree hotels but this one NEEDS  major renovation. The tub in our room had yellow stained all around that looks like when a tub is clogged and water standing there for a long time. Elevator wasn’t working. Stain on the sofa and carpet. We didn’t feel comfortable at all so we decided to leave and cancel our stay there and booked some where else. Luckily the lady in the front desk didn’t charge us for canceling the same day.
Manager Response: Dear upamz24,  As with all things in life beauty is in the eye of the beholder and our most sincere apologies you did not have a favorable first impression of our hotel.  We can assure you all of our guest rooms go through scheduled deep cleaning and preventive maintenance programs in addition to being inspected by our housekeeping leadership team.  Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us as it allows us to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: We live locally, and faced with plumbing issues at home, we chose to rent a room for one night.  The hotel itself is o.k., but I think I expect much more from Doubletree than what this hotel delivers.  The hotel is located on a very small parcel of land, on a short one-way portion of PCH, wedged between what becomes the on-ramp for the  I-5 South, and across the street from the Doheney beach campground (I'm guessing that few if any rooms have an ocean view because of the trees.)  There's a small parking area at the entrance that was crawling with cars and hard to navigate.  The rest of the parking is in an underground garage.  Did I mention that they charge $29 a night to park?  Our room was located at the back of the hotel, so our view was of the cars passing very close by
Manager Response: Dear chbruce,  The team is disappointed to hear you were not a fan of the physical location of the hotel especially with our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach that is popular with all of our guests.  We will definitely take your feedback into consideration regarding the guestroom bathrooms when planning our next renovation to make it more user friendly.  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience in the future.

Summary: Dirty, rancid and outdated. Room was disgusting. Paid for a view of the ocean and saw parking structure and the valet lot. Room smelled very bad like someone smoking inside and sheets smelled like they were washed with cigarettes instead of soap. Room did NOT meet their CleanStay program promised. Seal to door was already broken and concierge said they ran out of seals so they reused one.
Manager Response: Dear GlobeTrotting743400,  Our most heartfelt apologies you were not extremely satisfied during your recent stay with us and we have reviewed your feedback with our housekeeping team in order to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: This is probably one of my favorite hotels that I have ever stayed at in California. The rooms are still a little dated but overall it is always clean, the staff are cool and you can walk across the street to the beach.   Killer views from most of the rooms. This time I got a cool room with an ocean view, super clean and of course the cookies are the best. Been here before covid when it was slammed and it was still awesome then. My new favorite hotel for work and family play.   The beach isn't very friendly due to all the rocks. But it's cool enough to hang out on for some sun.
Manager Response: Dear shaunbgoing,  WOW absolutely amazing review of our phenomenal hotel, genuinely appreciate all of the shout outs and especially your loyalty to the Doubletree Dana Point over the last year!  Reading your comments absolutely made our day and have shared your review with our entire team to put smiles on all of their faces.  We definitely look forward to welcoming back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary: Bathroom was not cleaned, used towels, full trash bin and soap. Had to pay for parking even though booking with a group stated complimentary parking included. Staff stated Hilton doesn’t provide that service.
Manager Response: Dear riddlelindsey,  Our most sincere apologies our team did not communicate our current housekeeping services during your stay and we would have been happy to provide additional towels, remove the trash as well as provide additional bath amenities as needed throughout your visit.  We most definitely will address this with our team as a result of your feedback and appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Summary: Booked the largest suite for my wedding day/getting ready with my bridal party. When checking in their computers were down, digital keys weren’t working, and card keys were not working. We get to the room and the phone is old and not working. Toilet wasn’t flushing. We had to remove the top and fix it ourselves. Cleanliness was an issue it still felt gross to be in there. Because the room phone wasn’t working we had to walk to front desk to make any requests. We requested 4 chairs to get ready for my wedding day and they never showed. When leaving we went outside to get my valeted car but weren’t told that they don’t offer valet on Sundays. This was was old and dirty. Wouldn’t recommend.
Manager Response: Dear graschwitz,  Please accept our most genuine apologies for the technology glitches with the room keys and telephone systems you experienced during your stay with us.  We can absolutely assure you this will be addressed with our operations leadership team and corrected as a result of your feedback to enhance the guest experience moving forward.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: Stayed at Doherty Doubletree while doing work on home. Nice looking hotel but the room furnishings were very dated, threadbare couch. Extremely small bathroom that required you to actually get in the shower before you could turn it on due to the small room size.
Manager Response: Dear gledwards100,  Our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit and can assure you we will address the items you mentioned during our next hotel renovation.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: Jayson got my new bride Jennifer and I a great start to our honeymoon there. He was able to upgrade to a lovely suite there. He was very cordial and has a good personality and gave us great customer service and directions to the hotels accommodations.
Manager Response: Dear michaelbD9703QM,  Congratulations on the recent nuptial and happy honeymooning from the team here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Quite the honor to celebrate the occasion with you and truly grateful you were able to experience the authentic hospitality from our all star associates and enjoyed our spacious guest room suites.  We look forward to celebrating many future anniversaries with the both of you in the years ahead

Summary: Excellent location. More of a basic room and bathroom was a little tight but worth it for value and location. Went with my two kids (pullout) and hubby and I had King. Was enough room to sleep and shower. Would return.
Manager Response: Dear debrakpower,  Our team could not agree with you more about the Doubletree Doheny Beach's phenomenal location close to anything and everything Dana Point has to offer and our easy access to the beach.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and genuinely appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Great stay, no fuss beautiful ocean view!
Summary: Dana point Double tree is truly an amazing escape for a great value! The entire staff here strived to make sure our stay was beyond pleasant. The beach view rooms are a must & quite silly not to request if your situated beach front. Thank you Dana point Double tree l will definitely be back soon!
Manager Response: Dear barbaralu0581,  Thank you so very much for your rave review and delighted to hear you enjoyed the panoramic ocean views here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We certainly look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County

Summary: Staff was very nice. Check in was easy. Elevator was dirty. 3rd floor had an odd smell. Room was clean however furniture was a little worse for wear. Worn with a coupe noticeable holes. Balcony slider was old and difficult to use.
Manager Response: Dear timothycj5,  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations during your recent stay.  We will be sure to address your feedback with our operations team as a result and be sure to note it during our next scheduled renovation.  Our team certainly hopes to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience on a future visit.

Summary: We returned to this hotel after some years and we were not disappointed!! Everyone treats you like old friends welcoming you to their home!  Special thank you to Krizia, Carlos, Daniel and Jayson who made it extra special! Very clean,well taken care of all around! Can't wait to go back again and again for more special memories!
Manager Response: Dear TORITORREY,  Absolutely awesome welcoming you back since your last visit and we will definitely give some shout out recognition to our all star associates for providing the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Dana Point has become known for throughout the years.  The team looks forward to welcoming you back on your next vacation to Orange County!

Summary: We were trying to celebrate our engagement and booked a suite at this hotel for $300/night. We were told we could check in early at noon, but when we arrived the room wasn’t ready. We went out to lunch and returned around 3pm and our room still wasn’t ready.  It was finally ready at 3:45pm. When we entered the room, it was very clear that housekeeping was rushed; there was hair in the bathtub, cobwebs everywhere, urine on the side of the bathtub and in the toilet seat from previous guests. This was absolutely disgusting and definitely did not make us feel like they cleaned for COVID as well as they claim they do. I couldn’t believer we spent $300/night on this type of hotel.  We immediately called the front desk and they offered us cancellation, so we canceled.  We preferred to
Manager Response: Dear vanessamanfredi,  Our most sincere apologies for the misunderstanding regarding our hotel's standard 4PM check-in time in addition to the suite not meeting your expectations for the occasion.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and we will definitely share your feedback with our housekeeping leadership team.

Summary: The service was terrible and everything was closed. We were not given a room that was close to what we had asked for. It was noisy and the section we were given seemed rundown and unsafe the deadbolt lock on the door did not work
Manager Response: Dear Daveh7373,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your recent visit and wish you had given our team the opportunity to make it right by offering a room move during your stay with us.  As the state of California and Orange County continue to lift the current COVID restrictions our goal is to reopen all hotel amenities safely and as quickly as possible.  Thank you very much for being a valued guest and sharing your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Made our Dana Point Trip 10x Better!
Summary: We've stayed at this gem of a hotel several times. The staff are welcoming and friendly...and efficient. Just minutes away from Dana Point Harbor and all the convenient restaurants/market. Rooms are spacious with enough space for our family of four. Rooms are clean and updated with multiple TVs and our balcony had an amazing view.   Hilton Diamond members receive free cookies and water along with a generous room upgrade.  Breakfast was better than any restaurant option...again with an amazingly friendly staff. Best mini-vacay location from LA/OC/Inland.
Manager Response: Dear LAwoman1540,  So elated to hear you had the best mini spring break trip ever here at the Doubletree Dana Point and genuinely value you being a loyal Hilton Honors Member over the years!  Our team could not agree with you more from our phenomenal panoramic views, amazing location in close proximity to everything Orange County has to offer, the out of this world Doubletree cookie and the incredible friendly service from our team members always willing to go above and beyond for our guests.  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement and can't wait to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: It was our first trip to Dana Point and first trip in a year due to COVID. It was also a mini honeymoon since we got married in November of 2020. When we arrived there was a hiccup with our room, so the staff really hooked us up with an upgrade... surf side view, private patio, fireplace and soaker tub! What a fantastic suite and view... and the staff is wonderful! Definitely going to make this a regular getaway. You won’t regret coming here, I promise!
Manager Response: Dear DFritz1966,  Happy belated honeymooning and honored to be your first post COVID escape trip here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Glad our team was able to make it right for you during your stay with us and our surf side suites are definitely something everyone should experience at least once in their lifetime.  We look forward to welcoming you back and hopefully celebrating all of your future wedding anniversaries here in Orange County.

Summary: Jayson and staff were the best and very accommodating.  Clean and a great location with outdoor seating.  Looking forward to staying there again.  Room was very spacious.  Easy access to the beach and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Springtraveler30,  The team is absolutely delighted to hear you enjoyed the clean and spacious guest rooms as well as the authentic hospitality here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our ideal location in close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach is a fan favorite for both visitors and locals.  Thank you so very much for sharing your five bubble experience with us

Summary: I was on hold for 45 minutes with Hilton reservations with no answer.  One quick call to Jayson and he adjusted my reservation and kept my rate!  Quick, easy and kind.  Thanks Jayson!  We can't wait to stay at the property, we have heard great things.
Manager Response: Dear Nbulock001,  We will definitely share your reservations experience with the Hilton corporate office and happy you received a five bubble guest service encounter with the team here at Doubletree Dana Point!  Our team looks forward to welcoming you to our incredible hotel on your upcoming visit to Orange County

Summary: This place was amazing!!  A must come back!!   Thank you hotel Manager Jayson for your outstanding customer services and hospitality!!! Our room has a beautiful view, the place is clean and beautifully furnished!
Manager Response: Dear K833MIcarlab,  Absolutely spectacular to discover Doubletree Dana Point is your new go to beach house here in Orange County!  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: Jayson and the staff at this location are the best!  Very accommodating and super friendly.  I'd highly recommend this location to my friends and family.  The rooms are comfortable and the views are awesome.  Can't beat the location!
Manager Response: Dear paulcervantes1,  We could not agree with you more regarding our ideal location in close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and our incredibly friendly associates who go above and beyond to exceed guest expectations.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble endorsement of the Doubletree Dana Point!

Summary: This place was AMAZING!! So clean and the hotel manager Jayson was super nice and friendly helped us out with everything. The rooms were super comfortable and we had a great view. Will definitely come back !!!
Manager Response: Dear JasmineSaider,  Genuinely appreciate your amazing five bubble review and elated you enjoyed the gorgeous panoramic views throughout the hotel!  Our mission is to be the cleanest and friendliest hotel in Orange County and thrilled you were able to experience the authentic hospitality the Doubeltree Dana Point has become known for over the years.

Summary: Krizia and jayson are the best above and beyond there always the best customer service number I love this hotel and the both of them make my stay one of the best there always helpful and make my return visits better and better each time
Manager Response: Dear Curiosity532506,  Thank you so very much for your continued loyalty to the Doubletree Dana Point over the years and we will be sure to recognize our rock star associates as a result of your valued feedback.  The team is looking forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary: Never been much for celebrating my birthday but Nick and jayson showed me the error in my ways. I’ve never been treated so special on my birthday!  Truth be told- they treated me better than some of my family!  They gave me lots of treats and a couple mai tais!  You were right. Nick - yummy and strong. Thanks for an amazing birthday weekend. You made it start off just right!  We’ll be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy D,  Welcome to the Doubletree Dana Point family and the team is simply over joyed you had such a phenomenal experience over your birthday weekend!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review, it is genuinely appreciated

Summary: I visited the DoubleTree Doheny Beach this week and had a great experience. After a long say of travel, I was greeted at check in by Jayson and Antonio, who were both very friendly and inviting.   I really appreciated the customer service and the warm welcome.   I loved the ocean front room and the location of this hotel, but I really appreciated the staff.
Manager Response: DeartiffanycZ2301QL,  Thank you so very much for making our day with your glowing five bubble review of the Doubletree Dana Point!  We are absolutely delighted to hear you were able to experience the the authentic hospitality from the team and definitely look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Everything was way below Hilton quality level...
Summary: PRO: Get an OF room as a Silver Honor Member for 2 nights...that is all...  CON: It's a long list...at arrival front desk assigned a not made up room 335, dragged all the luggages back to check in desk to get a new room (328)...hotel ran at 20%, empty parking lot was $30/day...acting mgr. could have comped that...no, I walked half a mile for free street parking....at normal season at full capacity that would have been fine, I get that...more: no breakfast as advertised, which was not even mentioned at check-in...pouring rain for hours in the morning, I asked the front-desk to borrow the guest umbrella (a property minimum, $5 each)....I was looked at like I was from an other galactic...next day requested at noon at least the trash to be removed and replenish the coffees, when
Manager Response: Dear Barnakahuna,  Our most sincere apologies we did not meet and exceed your expectations during your recent visit and will certainly utilize it as a training opportunity for the entire hotel team.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us as it allows us to improve the guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Came here for our 35th anniversary. Originally had a poor beach view but Carlos with the help of Jayson got us an excellent room with a beach view. Carlos went the extra mile and made our stay here memorable. The staff is friendly, professional and caring. Big kudos!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ragoo1981,  A very happy 35th wedding anniversary to you and yours and honored we were able to celebrate it with you in style here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We will certainly recognize our all star associates as a result of your valued feedback and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I came here in need of some much needed R&R.  The manager checked me in and upgraded my reservation.  Beautiful ocean views from the bathroom, living area and bedroom... two balconies... fantastic customer service.  Will be back!!!
Manager Response: Dear carolinesX9792TS,  Absolutely wonderful news to hear the Doubletree Dana Point is now your official go to spot for some well deserved rest and relaxation!  Our picture perfect views and close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach is the ideal spot to escape for the weekend  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your recent visit with our team

Summary Heading: Krizia and Jayson were the best!
Summary: When we checked in Krizia and Jayson made the process so easy and even gave us cookies! The room was great and the pool was awesome! We had an enjoyable stay and the hotel was lovely.  You can tell they took greatly extra precautions for cleaning which we greatly appreciated. This location is very close to the beach and was beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear RCSNV,  So amazing to hear you enjoyed your staycation here at the Doubletree Dana Point and were able to experience the world famous warm Doubletree cookie, pool, gorgeous ocean views and the authentic hospitality from our rock star associates.  Thank you so very much sharing your five bubble experience with us and look forward to seeing you again on a future visit

Summary: My family and I were headed to LAX from San Diego to catch a flight to Houston and we decided to stop and spend the night here. I have to say, Ms. Krizia at the front desk was exceptionally helpful.Made our check-in process smooth and had great recommendations on what to donin the area. This hotel has rooms with awesome beach views and we definitely enjoyed our stay. Will definitely be returning for a longer stay when it gets warmer.
Manager Response: Dear marionner2020,  Thank you so very much for your glowing review of the Doubletree Dana Point and elated you enjoyed the panoramic views of Doheny Beach!  Extremely cool of you to provide a shout out for our all star front desk team and will be sure to recognize them as a result of your feedback.  The team is looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County this summer!

Summary: We were surprised at the location of this hotel. It's literally right off the freeway, and next to the train tracks. We have kids and it's a bit difficult to walk anywhere for coffee/breakfast. The walking view is also not very pretty despite the fact that it is close to the beach, but it's like walking by concrete, fencing, and finding an actual walkway was much farther out.  Also, parking is a whopping $29/night for self park or valet and you have to cram into this slow elevator (during covid) if you self park.  The cost for one night was close to $290 when you include tax and parking and we got a view of dirt and train tracks and heard the train roll at night.  I don't recommend it for location- I think the pictures are misleading- it looks like it's right next to the beach,
Manager Response: Dear Jenniter Chai S,  Our most sincere apologies you were not a fan of our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and that our hotel was sold out of our signature view room types during your stay.  We genuinely appreciate you being a valued guest and for taking the time to share your experience with us.

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay .. the service was absolutely amazing. Both Krizia and Jayson went above and beyond to make our stay more comfortable. The room was stunning and the entire stay was completely amazing. We will definitely be back in the future. Thank you for a perfect stay!
Manager Response: Dear corrinea880,  Thank you so very much for sharing your "perfect stay" with us here at the Doubletree Dana Point and we will be sure to recognize our best in the hospitality industry super star associates as a result of your valued feedback!  We genuinely appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County

Summary: I travel to this area often for work. I always choose to stay here! Krizia, and rest of the staff are amazing, the rooms have a great ocean vibe to them, and you can’t beat the view! Unfortunately due to Covid, the rooftop bar is closed. But they still allow you out there to enjoy the views!
Manager Response: Dear S8856SDmiked,  Quite the honor to receive your "favorite hotel by far" award here at the Doubletree Dana Point with our incredible Pacific Ocean views and guest service friendly associates.    We also look forward to reopening our Longboard rooftop lounge for service when social distancing restrictions allow us to do so safely and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for one of our signature cocktails while enjoying a phenomenal sunset.  Thank you so very much for your kind words and being a valued guest with our hotel throughout the years, it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary: Krizia was absolutely wonderful, she went above and beyond to make our stay one of the best ones ever.  unfortunately due to COVID, the restaurant has limited hours but she suggested we order delivery from a local restaurant, grab a couple drinks from the gift shop (great selection of beers) and enjoy dinner on the sunset deck. The view was incredible!!!
Manager Response: Dear fishguy2u,  Our team is absolutely delighted to hear this was one of your best hotel stays ever here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We could not agree with you more about enjoying the beach/ocean views from our sunset deck with a nice cold SoCal craft beer in addition to experiencing the authentic hospitality from our rock star associates!  Thank you so much for your five bubble review and look forward to welcoming you back to Orange County any time

Summary: First off the customer service at this hotel is amazing! I was greeted by multiple employees before stepping in the door of the establishment and the gentleman at the front desk really helped me with anything and everything from which room is best for me and my family to what restaurants were kid friendly. Now the room.... the room is simply incredible! Amazing view of the ocean, big, spacious, and very clean, I couldn’t ask for a better hotel for me and my family....simply amazing!!
Manager Response: Dear Rylo21,  Thank you so very much for making our day and putting smiles on our faces with your glowing endorsement and five bubble review of the Doubletree Dana Point!  It definitely was our pleasure hosting you here during your visit and ecstatic you were able to experience the authentic hospitality and gorgeous ocean views that our hotel has to offer all guest visiting Dana Point.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County

Summary: My hubby and I decided to do an impromptu overnighter and just started to drive down the coast. We are so glad we ended up here at the Doubletree Hotel!!  The staff was super friendly and helpful.  They got us all set up in a lovely room with a great view.  I'd definitely recommend this sweet place to stay for a quick getaway or a planned vacation.
Manager Response: Dear I5057ERanitab,  The impromptu Pacific Coast Hwy/Hwy 1 road trips up and down the California coast experiencing all of the different beach cities along the way always end up being the most memorable!  Glad you enjoyed your time here in Dana Point and certainly appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: We reside nearby and wanted to have a little staycation with our family so we booked a room at the Double Tree last minute and couldn’t be happier. From the cleanliness to the service to our room with a gorgeous view, the hotel has superseded our expectations. The front desk staff are extremely friendly and helpful and made our experience that much better! Definitely recommend this hotel. We will for sure be coming back :)
Manager Response: Dear kennessed,  Our goal in 2021 is to be the best "staycation" hotel in Orange County and absolutely elated you were able to experience all attributes of our amazing hotel from the gorgeous ocean views, enhanced cleanliness protocols and the authentic hospitality from our associates!  We are look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit the sooner the better!

Summary: What a nice overnight at the Doubletree Doheny! My husband and I just wanted to escape the kids and spend our anniversary together without agenda due to COVID. Before my arrival, I called Nick at the front desk and he was Wonderful! He provided us great recommendations for dinner delivery and greeted me with warm cookies when we checked in. The location was great being right across from the beach which we visited to watch the sunset. We really enjoyed our night in Dana Point. Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear KFHikes,  A very happy anniversary and we couldn't agree with you more about ringing in 2021 with our phenomenal Pacific Ocean views here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for sharing your five bubble experience with us and we will definitely recognize our all star associate as a result of your valued feedback.

Summary Heading: Great service and give Jason a raise
Summary: Upon arriving at your facility I was greeted with professionalism and courtesy, your employees are amazing and very detail oriented. They are doing an amazing job and my stay was amazing. The facilities were very clean and the view was amazing!
Manager Response: Dear michaelwH4821EP,  Our team couldn't be happier knowing you had an AMAZING experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point and you were able to thoroughly enjoy the spectacular ocean views and incredible service provided by our all star associates.  Thank you so very much for sharing your valued feed back with us and can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary: We stayed at the Doubletree in Doheny for 2 nights. The first night we checked in with Jayson and he was very welcoming and gave us a phenomenal room. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. Their famous cookies were extra tasty. We can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear Q8497GEsamanthal and very happy holidays to you and yours!  Our team is absolutely delighted you enjoyed our spacious guest room suites as well as the authentic hospitality provided by our best in class associates here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary: Visited this hotel on a last minute type of deal and was welcomed with great service. Jayson the manager was able to help us out and gave us great service and provided us with an exceptional room for a great price. Even after a bit of a mix up with a different employee the following day Jayson was able to resolve all issues. Thank you very much and I definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear SGAtheDon12,  So wonderful to hear our incredible associates were able to exceed your expectations during your vacation and able to provide you with the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Dana Point has become known for over the years here in Orange County!  Our team genuinely values your recommendation and wish you all the very best this holiday season.

Summary: Staying at the DoubleTree in Dana Point turned out to be the best option for me during this trying time in 2020. The staff was so accomidating and Jayson and Carlos made sure all my requests were met. Any issues with the room were addressed immediately. They even were able to open up to serve breakfast, which was a big deal. Doubletree is one of my favorite Hilton properties, and now the one at Dana Point has been added to the top of the list.
Manager Response: Dear A7064OPterryb,  WOW......our team is over the moon to be added to your elite list of favorite Hilton Hotels & Resorts and genuinely appreciate your loyalty to all of the brands within our portfolio!  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and we are forever grateful for your five bubble review.

Summary: Jayson and Kriza are excellent representatives of the Hilton branch!  Their customer service is second to none.  The hotel is located directly across the beach with great views!    Although I had to travel during Covid I felt very comfortable at this location.  The hotel was clean, social distancing protocols were in place and enforced!
Manager Response: Dear SNH2368,  It was definitely our pleasure to share our spectacular Pacific Ocean views with you during your recent visit and thrilled you appreciated all of our Hilton Clean Stay protocols that we have implemented here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We will definitely be sure to acknowledge our all star associates as a result of your valued feedback and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: I'm very happy with the services I received. The location is perfect close to restaurants and the main street. I highly recommend this hotel and Jayson the manager is very accommodating. Happy Holidays 😊
Manager Response: Dear N5606DOcurtism,  Our team is thrilled you enjoyed our phenomenal location with close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and everything the city of Dana Point has to offer our visiting guests!  Thank you so very much for five bubble review, it is genuinely appreciated

Summary: Doubletree Doheney beach Dana Point hotel is one of the best hotels that I’ve been to great service the front desk treats you absolutely phenomenal and I would refer this to anyone in the area looking for a place to stay, thank you you guys!!
Manager Response: Dear N5606DOcurtism,  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement of the Doubletree Dana Point and absolutely elated you were extremely satisfied with your recent visit!  We genuinely appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and looking forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County

Summary: Stayed here a dozen times and am never disappointed.   Hilton goes above and beyond during this pandemic to ensure a safe stay.   This location is great for a getaway or a business trip.   Try it, lots to see and do here.
Manager Response: Dear zag5150,  Very cool of you to share your five bubble experience with us and genuinely appreciate you being such a loyal guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point!

Summary: Very nice hotel, slight retro feel. Most staff very attentive. Although not a lot of amenities are available at this time due to COVID, there was plenty to do. Due to the construction in the camp ground there is no real easy beach access at this time. Location to do day trips is ideal. Dana Point Harbor is within walking distance with a lot of fun shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear actnowtravel,  We are absolutely thrilled you enjoyed our ideal location and everything the amazing city of Dana Point has to offer visitors while here in Orange County!  Thank you so very much for sharing your four bubble experience with us and looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: Once again, had a fantastic stay at the DoubleTree. Cleanliness is obviously their top priority. Always a plus, however an even greater comfort under current pandemic conditions. While the entire staff is engaging and welcoming, Jayson and Sutton really made it a family atmosphere. I highly recommend the DoubleTree when you are in Dana Point.
Manager Response: Dear ACFSquared,  It puts a smile on all of our faces knowing you had a phenomenal family vacation here at the Doubletree Dana and will definitely recognize our all star associates for exceeding your expectations during your visit.  The team is already looking forward to your next visit back to Orange County

Summary: A super hotel, that is primely located. Our room was huge and had a beautiful beach theme throughout and a balcony with a view of the ocean. There was some construction going on while we were there, but nothing that really affected us. We enjoyed a drink in the bar - Doheny Surf and loved the “Pier Pressure” and “Beach Please.” We were served by Randi, who was absolutely hilarious.
Manager Response: Dear Suzie A,  We are genuinely appreciative for all of your kind words and thrilled you enjoyed the best vacation beach house in Orange County.  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us!

Summary: We have been going to this hotel for 12 years for a month September into October. Despite the virus, the staff was friendly and helpful. We missed seeing many employees who had to find new jobs due to the virus, and we as others at any hotel in the world had to make adjustments. We were and always pleases with the service. The hotel does need some maintenance but it never puts us off. It is always nice when everyone in the hotel is aware of your coming.  We  have made reservations for next year. We rate the hotel excellent because of the service.
Manager Response: Dear CinderC1,  From the bottom of our hearts, thank you so very much for your continued loyalty to the Doubletree Doheny Beach over the years!  Our team definitely agrees there is something special about the Dana Point community as well as being the whale watching capital of the world that brings guests back time and time again.    Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back next year.

Summary: Good location and good staffs. We want to stay one more night, and it was very smooth and well done with staff, whose name Carlos. Love to stay here again whenever we come San Diego. People are all very friendly and always smiles.
Manager Response: Dear Healthy12345,  Thank you so very much for sharing your five bubble vacation experience with us here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our mission is to be the cleanest and friendliest hotel in Orange County and we will certainly recognize our all star associate as a result of your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back on all of your future visits.

Summary Heading: Worst Hilton stay ever- dirty, expensive and uncaring
Summary: I am typically nice, laid back, unless you deserve a poor review, which this hotel deserves. Yes, I am going to be a Karen here! I am a Hilton gold member so this isn’t my first Hilton stay.   In a nutshell, the rooms are run down and not maintained well (photos attached). The staff is by far the poorest I’ve ever encountered.   I had to change the reservation about 2 weeks before the travel date. I added a person to my room and changed to 2 doubles. Called the hotel directly and updated. Come to find out at check-in, the person who I spoke with never actually changed anything! At check-in, that receptionist proceeded to blame me for ‘ordering a king size bed. Nothing was in their system.’ A simple apology and fix would have sufficed, but no acknowledgement as to the extra
Manager Response: Dear heathera482,  First and foremost our most genuine and sincere apologies we mishandled the simple reservation changes you requested and the overall responses from our associate.  We can assure you this was an unfortunate isolated incident and will definitely utilize it as a training opportunity for our entire front office and housekeeping teams.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us as it allows us to provide an enhanced guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Worst hotel internet I've experienced in a long time despite the fact that few people are actually staying here right now. Measured the speed at 0.8Mbps with 1190mses of jitter. That means that sometimes it takes the server just 8 milliseconds to respond (good!), and other times it takes over a second (horrendous!!!). Good luck downloading a text email, and forget about trying to do a Zoom call. Room is kinda musty. The thermostat is set to 68F but the room won't get below 75F. With the high humidity, it's uncomfortable trying to sleep at night.  No microwave in the room.  No housekeeping unless you call to request it. On a positive note, the room was reasonably clean when I arrived, and the front desk clerk was nice.
Manager Response: Dear ndamato,  Our team will definitely investigate the internet service throughout the hotel as it seems to be an isolated incident and genuinely apologize the impact it had your stay here at our hotel.    We certainly hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience in the future and value the feedback you have provided us.

Summary: My gal and I typically spend every other weekend at a local hotel, just to get away and to enjoy a different environment .During these times of Covid  and political unrest, I believe little getaways are a great help for self preservation. Last weekend we decided  to head to Dana Point. We booked a room at the Hilton Double Tree, Doheny Beach.  Upon arrival, the first thing I thought of was , how would a tourist from outside the are find this place??  Its kind of tricky to get to, but being a  local, I already knew this. The front desk staff were friendly  and helpful, the lobby was clean and bright. We were told that both the restaurant and bar were closed.  Please note that the location of this property is on a busy street with nothing nearby, except access to the beach you
Manager Response: Dear hradical,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your recent visit due to the local COVID in door dining restrictions and being of mindful of social distancing throughout the hotel impacted your overall experience.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary Heading: New Go To Hotel in Dana Point
Summary: Stayed here for work event and now will return every time I visit Dana Point. Staff was friendly and extremely helpful for any needs or requests. Hotel is clean and COVID-19 guidelines are easily followed. Great location that is centrally located by everything you would want to do in Dana Point. Awesome rooftop lounge even on a cloudy day still has a beautiful view of the ocean. Looking forward to return in a few weeks!
Manager Response: Dear dpsracer,  Our team is delighted to hear the Doubletree Dana Point is your new go to spot when visiting South Orange County!  Between our ideal location, gorgeous beach/ocean views and the authentic hospitality provided by our amazing associates we look forward to welcoming you back time and time again!

Summary: While making reservations there was an issue with the reservation and the manager Jason quickly fixed the situation. The hotel was clean and the staff was helpful. Also a great location and accessible access to the beach. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear TFCarlos,  Thank you so very much for your understanding regarding the reservation mishap and glad we had the to opportunity to make it right for you during your visit.  Our mission is to be the cleanest and the friendliest hotel in Orange County and thrilled to find out you will be recommending the Doubletree Doheny Beach to others in your circle of trust.

Summary Heading: Great stay at Doubletree Doheny Beach at Dana Point
Summary: Room is very roomy, some have excellent view of the Beach (additional fee).  Beautiful view from the  4th floor at Longboard Rooftop Lounge.  Unfortunately when I was there they are not serving food yet (per Covid restriction) but you are allow to received delivery from near by restaurants and enjoy the beautiful view and surrounding.  Easy to walk to the beach; surfing, running, biking, etc. All staff are very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear eoftcl,  Our team is delighted to hear you enjoyed our spacious guestrooms and the authentic hospitality provide by all of our associates.  We genuinely appreciate you being a valued guest and hope to visit with you again on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Our stay was better than recent reports. Our room was sealed & clean. There was clear communication about limited routine daily cleaning, and the staff responded to our requests promptly and graciously. Front desk staff was very pleasant and helpful. Great location near beach, parking available for guests.
Manager Response: Dear lizz124,  We are absolutely elated you enjoyed everything that makes Doubletree Doheny Beach the go to vacation spot in Orange County!  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement of our hotel and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit

Summary: We stayed one night at this dump. Hotel needs a good scrubbing and remodel. There were cob webs hanging from the ceiling and a layer of dust visible in the bathroom. We disinfected everything ourselves. We were given a room directly across from he ice machine when we asked for a quiet room. The next morning I went downstairs to ask a question and the “security guard” was hunched over the front desk with no mask on. Not only that, he interrupted when I was asking the front desk clerk a question and was rude. The valet and Sutton were nice, but other than that the hotel needs Undercover Boss to come in and get this place in order.
Manager Response: Dear 357kimberlyn,  Our most genuine apologies we did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit and will definitely utilize your feedback as a training opportunity for our entire housekeeping team and security department.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us as it allows us to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary Heading: Who is and is not wearing a mask?
Summary: We enjoyed our stay in our rather  room.  We had booked a deluxe ocean view king bed suite.  We had to change from the 2nd to the 4th floor as there was only a peekaboo through trees of the ocean.  Why did they not put us in that room to begin with?    When checking in, there was someone in front of us,  without a mask and signs everywhere to wear masks.  He got into the elevator with us and I asked him to put a mask on.  He angrily told me he doesnt have to wear one.  We immediately  got out of the elevator!  But the clerk didnt enforce  him to wear one.  When I asked her why she wasnt enforcing the masks she told me she didnt even notice he didnt have one. on!  There were many in elevators and running around the hotel without masks!  Sunset was lovely from our balcony.  Being
Manager Response: Dear Katherine W,  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach and genuinely appreciate you sharing your experience with us.  While we certainly do our best to educate all guests on the importance of wearing face masks getting everyone to comply with doing the right thing, because it is the right thing to do for all is much easier said than done.  Our team certainly appreciates you bringing it to our attention and recognize we have an opportunity for improvement moving forward during these COVID times.  All food and beverage operations throughout Orange County remain under COVID  indoor dining restrictions and our rooftop lounge does not allow for ample social distancing practices and genuinely apologize it impacted your overall perception of our hotel.  Our team certainly hopes to provide you with an enhanced guest experience once all of the COVID restrictions allow us to lead with the full hospitality experience you have come to expect from the Hilton brands.

Summary: The Hotel Staff went out of their way to help us. After having another hotel lose our reservations, we entered Double Tree on a busy  Sat night in Aug. They were able to get us a room and upgrade us the following night. Sutton went out of her way to make sure we were taken care of and got what we wanted. She and Manager Jayson were so friendly and truly made us feel like they were glad we were there. I am so grateful to them for saving our vacation. It was a beautiful experience. Thanks to them. The hotel is beautiful, well cared for, clean and the staff made us feel genuinely cared for.
Manager Response: Dear pamtV3493JU,  Our team is elated you found your new hotel vacation spot here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We will be sure to recognize our all star associates for providing you with the authentic hospitality the Hilton brand has become known for over the years.  Already looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Staycation Almost Ruined by RUDE STAFF
Summary: Booked a 5 day staycation at this hotel.  My only requirement was Oceanview.  The night before I completed checkin on Hilton APP which also included room selection.  I arrive the next day only to be told there was no info. on my checkin.  OKAY.  Arrive to the room and instant disappointment on the Oceanview deluxe King selected for me (see pic).  As I was checking in I noticed a big sign that said if you have any issues please call us.  I did...... only to be met with the rudest hotel manager I have ever encountered in my life.  GREAT WAY TO MAKE A CUSTOMER FEEL WELCOMED HILTON.  As I’m explaining the issue with my room this man/manager HUNG UP in my face.  It only got worse from there.  Never spend your money where you are disrespected.  I checked out (which the manager
Manager Response: Dear denisebY6347LX,  Our team extends our most heartfelt apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your signature view room and the multiple other guestroom options that were presented to you did not meet your expectations.    We certainly appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your feedback with our team

Summary Heading: BEWARE OF HORRIBLE ROOMS AND TERRIBLE SERVICE
Summary: Let me start off with, I am a frequent guest that comes here every month with my family. I enjoyed this property because of its proximity to the beach and the service that has suddenly went down. I was greeted with a terrible attitude and the front desk girl was on her phone. What kind of business is this? There used to be a supervisor named Mia who was 100% amazing at her customer service. She would be the one that used to greet me and my family everytime. The service agent said she left? I wonder why, terrible service! Next thing you know I am booked into a king ocean (393) and there were cob webs cig buds outside the patio and ants!!! When I informed the front desk they were not apologetic about anything nor did it seemed like they cared. The lady said no rooms were available
Manager Response: Dear FairyKim1990,  We genuinely appreciate you being a repeat guest every month at our hotel and are extremely disappointed to hear that a one off experience has damaged your overall perception of our hotel.  Our team sincerely hopes you reconsider your decision and have an opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience on a future visit.

Summary: Quick beach getaway! Steps away from the beach, which made the entire trip even more convenient and breathtaking. Jayson the manager went out of the way to make sure we had everything we needed, above and beyond the Hilton experience. The hotel was busier than expected but very clean and I felt safe under these COVID-19 times. Our room had an ocean front view that was amazing. Hilton is my preferred brand and we are already booked again for the end of this month at this Double Tree.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location - 5 minute walk to the beach!  Friendly staff always willing to help.  We had an ocean front room  (be sure to get ocean front.  Other rooms face back of hotel and interstate). Room was clean and comfortable. Due to COVID no food was served. The Ribjoint Roadhouse delivers to the hotel (Door Dash) and also has outdoor seating.  Amazing ribs and brisket!  Definitely would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear scottmrn,  Our team is absolutely ecstatic you had such an amazing time here in Dana Point and already looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary: We love the DoubleTree!   The staff is amazing! Jayson, and Sutton  the rest of We are SoCal locals and this is our go to spot! We come here at least half a dozen times per year. I honestly can’t say enough good things! Great for families! Thanks for always being Rad!
Manager Response: Dear 279maryannt,  Thank you so very much for the shout out for our all star associates and we will be sure to recognize them as a result of your feedback!  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Dana Point

Summary Heading: Amazing place to take your family
Summary: We have been staying at this hotel for many years and this is by far our favorite Hotel in the area. The hotel and its proximity to the beach (across the street:) is not the only reason why.  They have a lovey pool and beautiful rooms that make the stay enjoyable along with the staff that is always going above and beyond for us and other guests to ensure we have a great stay. Thank you again Staff at Doubletree Doheny Beach (Jayson and Sutton)  Best,  Col. Keith B. Taylor and Family
Manager Response: Dear Col. Keith B. Taylor and Family,  It was an absolute honor to host you and your family during your recent visit and genuinely value you returning to the Doubletree Dana Point year after year!  Thank you so very much for sharing your five bubble review with us

Summary: Here’s what I observed in my four- night stay at the DoubleTree Dohney Beach in Dana Point, CA, at approximately $350 per night: •	No Hilton CleanStay Room Seal •	No towel hooks to hang wet towels on, just a weird ladder that couldn’t hold enough towels •	A screen door that was bent, and easily fell off its rails •	Blanket with holes and tears •	Towel with large worn spots •	A ripped curtain •	No desk (in a high-end suite) •	A chair with disgusting stains on it •	Water pipes with air in them, so that water came out in coughing spurts •	A toilet that did not flush properly and that ran unless I jiggled the handle •	No garbage bags to replace the ones I had to put in the hallway, since I had to empty garbage myself •	An empty wine bottle ln a bathroom cabinet, left behind by a
Manager Response: Dear locationscoutCA,  The health, safety and well being of all hotel guests and employees has always been our number one priority and we remain committed to that mission now so more than ever during these unprecedented times. We are working diligently to regulate the actions and behaviors of all registered guests throughout the hotel in terms of appropriate face mask usage and maintaining proper social distancing in all public areas throughout the hotel.  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied during your recent stay with us and the leadership team has taken immediate action as result of your valued feedback to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: First, tried calling the hotel many times and no answer.  Then we got our room and we walked in only to find out it was someone else's room.  Yes they gave us access to someone else's room with all of their personal belongings inside.  Then the A/C did not work, the T.V. kept going in and out so we couldn't even watch a movie.  They state they are taking extra precautions with COVID.  This is not true.  I wiped down every light switch and there was dirt on them as well as the phone.  DO NOT STAY HERE!!  I thought Hilton Hotels were supposed to be nice.  Waste of money!
Manager Response: Dear Luvangelsbb,  We genuinely apologize we did not offer a more favorable first impression of our hotel and have already reviewed your feedback with our operations team and assure you the overall security and cleanliness of all areas of our hotel are our top priority.  Our hotel was in the process of upgrading our current TV provider technology to all guest rooms and unfortunately experienced some glitches and there is never an ideal time to complete a project of that magnitude in a hotel that never closes.  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and hope to have the opportunity to offer you an enhanced guest experience on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Very dirty place!! Not a normal Hilton property-  Stay elsewhere
Summary: Spent 4th of July weekend at this dump. What a disappointment. First room we stayed in, was dirty and had a colony of ants on the walls. The front desk staff was very accommodating ( Sutton and Alma were great) and offered us a different room, which actually had a view of the water. Unfortunately, this room was just as dirty as the first. Even though this was a room that was supposed to have been cleaned, dirt all over the furniture, all over the floors. Patio so covered in cob webs and dead bugs, could not even go out on the deck until we asked them to clean it. Went up to the "rooftop deck" which was also filthy and covered in garbage. Understand the Covid issues, but to have every amenity closed ( would not even rent us bikes on Monday) while all around was open seemed odd.
Manager Response: Dear N3498PTjasonj,  As with all things in life, beauty is in the eye of the beholder and our most sincere apologies you did not have a more positive experience while visiting Orange County as a result of state and local authority directives that impact the hospitality industry and dictate business decisions here at the hotel.  Our hotel's mission is to focus on the items we can control as we continue to adjust to the new "abnormal" as a result of the COVID pandemic and can assure you our housekeeping cleaning program is our top priority and wish we had more control of mother natures's creatures on the exterior of the building and the weather in between from when the guest room was previously cleaned by our team.    Thank you so very much for your valued feedback regarding your stay and genuinely appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton brands.

Summary: We just checked out.  Worst experience staying at a Hilton property.  First room we checked in had a layer of dust and refrigerator was inop.   View of Highway, and cobwebs/dirt outside of window.  We changed rooms.  Same situation except with addition of ants all over the luggage shelf and in my suitcase this morning.  Our friends had ants in their room too.  Mask wearing not enforced.  Outside deck on 4th floor was filthy.  I think management is doing their best with what they have to work with, structurally, but they need to pick up their act when it comes to cleaning.  Valet guys were great.
Manager Response: Dear FrequentFlier502377,  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent visit with us and our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations.  Your comments have been shared with our housekeeping team and can assure you the appropriate ongoing retraining is being conducted throughout the entire hotel to ensure a more favorable guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Upon check in, no one was wearing a mandatory mask - except the front desk person.  When I asked she said "oh well we ask that people wear them".  We headed to the room and the hallway reeked of pot..  The housekeepers did not have masks on - this was a bit uncomfortable since they were responsible for assuring the room has been cleaned and disinfected for COVID.  Our oceanview room was a back of the hotel view of an old RV - probably 30 or 40 yeas old and clearly someone was living in it and trash everywhere.  The hotel is disgusting and dirty and clearly not following the state of CA mandatory masks.  As a vulnerable individual, I was not comfortable that this hotel was doing what they needed to do to keep guests (and staff) safe.  Where is the management here?  There are so
Manager Response: Dear Deb R,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your recent visit and our team can assure you everyone's health and safety is our number one priority.  The governor of California has mandated face masks are required in all public areas in the state and we have posted signage reminding all guests of the governor's face mask order as well as social distancing floor spacing throughout the hotel.    Our goal is to regulate the behaviors and actions of every single guest to the best our ability during their vacations with us and based on your feedback we have some opportunity for improvement.   Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your visit with us and will definitely utilize this as a training opportunity for all of our associates to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: I really needed some beach therapy to unwind from work and the stress of the current situation.  I will start with the positive, the hotel is across the street from the beach and it is only a five minute walk.  I paid for an ocean view and requested a nice view.  I got a room with a view full of trees instead.  The proof is in the picture, which is the view from room #220.   Upon entering the room, I immediately called the front desk and mentioned the room was not an ocean view as stated on my confirmation.  I was told I would be switched to a better room as soon as it became available.  My husband and I went to the rooftop terrace to wait for a better room.  I called an hour later only to be told I would get a call back immediately.  I noticed completely empty clean rooms on
Manager Response: Dear IlianaB527,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your recent experience over the Memorial Day weekend.  Our team was most certainly doing our best to accommodate as many guest requests as possible during a sold out situation and are devastated we were not able to exceed all of your expectations.  We will definitely review and update our different room type attributes as a result of your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience on a future visit.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and great value in Dana Point!
Summary: Wonderful property for the money in Dana Point. Clean and modern. Extremely friendly staff. Wonderful service. Note you need to request an ocean view room. The other side faces the highway but noise was not bad. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear 924sjrob,  Our Doubletree Dana Point team is delighted you had a five bubble visit and enjoyed our wonderful hotel as much as us!  Our mission is to be the friendliest and cleanest hotel in Orange County and elated you were able to experience the authentic hospitality we have become known for over the years.  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit.

Summary: Very clean  no trash anywhere and it was a great place to stay we will return for another visit the food was excellent the wait time was short and they’re very nice the view was nice to see the ocean and the overall stay was fantastic
Manager Response: Dear antoinettesmith1961,  We could not agree with you more that the Doubletree Dana Point is definitely the hotel of choice for family mini vacations and "staycations" in Orange County!  Our mission is to be the cleanest and friendliest as well as offering magnificent views of the Pacific Ocean and elated you and were able to experience it all!  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and definitely looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: Walking distance to beach, tide pools, marina, restaurants, shops.. Large rooms, balconies w/ view of the ocean and beautiful sunsets.  Great location for families, couples or friends gathering for a fun weekend.
Manager Response: Dear  jp92679,  So glad you enjoyed our spectacular location and everything the amazing city of Dana Point has to offer guests visiting the Doubletree Doheny Beach!  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: Typical old beach hotel. Staff very good. Building very worn. Great location across from beach. No restaurants within walking distance other than lobby restaurant.  Don't want to walk on room carpet with bare feet.  To go coffee is $4.00 in the lobby restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Pinkfreak,  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point and glad you enjoyed our phenomenal location and close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and hope to have the opportunity to  welcome you back on a future visit.

Summary: We stayed here for our wedding for Leap Year. The staff was amazing and friendly. Jayna and  Jessica helped me coordinate the whole trip and made it all a breeze.  We got upgraded to a suite, top floor and two decks. Very spacious room and bathroom. Huge tub, we jumped right in after getting into the room.
Manager Response: Dear hanaglans254,  What an incredible honor to be a part of your Leap Year wedding celebration and thrilled to hear you enjoyed every minute of your visit.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and sharing your experience with us.

Summary: I want to recognize two of the staff who made our most recent stay at your hotel even that much better.  Daniel, who helped park our car and helped us out with our luggage went above and beyond in welcoming us to the hotel.  He was the first person we met and made such a great impression on my family and I.  He greeted us with the biggest smile and remembered our names throughout our stay.  We also enjoyed dinner in the hotel restaurant and Randi made my son feel right at home.  She is so great with kids and paid attention to every little detail.  And, even showed our table a little magic trick.  Way to go DoubleTree!  Both of these individuals and their exceptional customer service made our time in Dana Point one we won't soon forget.
Manager Response: Dear rubyp695,  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your interactions with our hotel superstars and elated you were able to experience the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Dana Point has become known for over the years.  We will be sure to celebrate these associates as a result of your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back on  a future visit.

Summary: This is not a dating website, don’t force customers to enter 200 words.  The property seems as it is falling about.  I’m wondering if there was a change of ownership.  Used to be a great property.  I’m am out of words now
Manager Response: Dear mklpz59,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied on your recent visit and can assure you we continue to maintain the highest of standards maintaining the appearance of the hotel.  Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: Randi, Cheryl and chef Josh were excellent at the restaurant.  The hotel staff was extremely helpful.  Overall great experience. The view of the beach was fantastic.  Very easy to stay there. We will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear tracy k,  Absolutely amazing to hear you enjoyed the phenomenal beach and ocean views here at the Doubletree Dana Point!
