Thank you so very much for recognizing the incredible guest service from our all star associates and we all look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary: Wonderful visit, all due to the staff at this hotel! They were helpful, accommodating, and literally offered to lend me their own items (an umbrella) when we were departing for a wedding and it was raining. The front desk staff remembered my name and were extremely friendly and fun to talk to. I got an upgrade to a room with a balcony/view when I checked in, and they made sure our groups rooms were close to each other. The staff in the restaurant were, again, so friendly and did all they could to make sure we were comfortable. Stay at this hotel...I have stayed at two other hotels in Dana Point and neither compare to the level of service I got here.
Manager Response: Dear vinny960,  Thank you so very much for the awesome shout out regarding our team's above and beyond guest service throughout your entire visit here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We genuinely look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Meia single handedly made our vacation feel special. She offered to walk is to 3 different rooms to see which one best suited our needs. I couldn't feel more welcomed than I did there and recommend this location to anyone who enjoys beachfront views and quick walks to the harbor etc. Thanks for creating our experience!
Manager Response: Dear jasonwP6361MI,  We are truly excited to hear you had a wonderful stay and were able to experience the SoCal authentic hospitality here at the Doubletree Dana Point and enjoyed our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach.  Thank you so very much for sharing your five bubble review with us, it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary: I travel a lot for work, and let me tell you this was the most fun I’ve had on a work trip in a long time! The staff at the double tree was very welcoming and the rooms were a great size for the money! I visited the bar multiple times during my stay and Randi was a PLEASURE! She was super attentive, friendly and fun! Id definitely come back for a real vacation!
Manager Response: Dear Y2251TAellenm,  The Doubletree Dana Point is the ideal location for both business and leisure travelers and glad you had a splendid experience in our Doheny Surf Restaurant.  Thank you so very much for sharing your five bubble review with us and we will be sure to recognize our all star restaurant associate as a result of your feedback.

Summary: Our waitress Randi was the most personable, fun, genuine and amazing waitress I’ve ever had! My husband and I traveled from Utah on a quick getaway to visit Dana Point where we were married on the beach in 2017.  This was our first trip back since our wedding and we decided to check out the hotel restaurant. And I am so glad we did because we met Randi! I will come back to this hotel restaurant every visit we make in the future just to have her as our waitress! She laughed with us, shared jokes, made BOMB drinks and was a multi tasker like no other!!!  This woman is an asset to this company and i feel she deserves the recognition of how amazing she is in her profession. Anyone that is that enjoyable is worth their wait in Gold. She’s a rare gem and my husband and I ate at the
Manager Response: Dear Inkgoddess,  What an incredible rave review of our Doheny Surf Restaurant and our rock star server associate and elated you were able to experience the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Dana Point has become known for over the years.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: The stay was very nice but the additional cost for parking was excessive. Parking should be included in your stay. The room service was tasty, especially the fries. We would stay here again if the price is fair and we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear carrieriedel,  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point and genuinely appreciate your four bubble review of our hotel.  With our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and HWY 1 location parking will always be in high demand and it is essential we regulate it accordingly to ensure all guests have a parking spot during their stay with us.  Our team definitely looks forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary: Great beach location. Rooms were a little dated, but would sleep six comfortably. Awesome restaurant and bar, both food and drinks. Randi and Sam really made our stay memorable. Great breakfast options, so tasty.
Manager Response: Dear Mobile58353996822,  Our absolutely incredible location with close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and spacious guestroom suites are just the tip of the iceberg of what makes the Doubletree Dana Point the hotel of choice when visiting Orange County!  Thank you so very much for your compliments regarding the quality of food and sharing your memorable experience in Doheny Surf Restaurant with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary Heading: We had the most amazing server in the restaurant! All I know is her name was Randi.
Summary: Our server in the restaurant was the most amazing and gifted young woman named Randi. She went the extra miles to take care of us at both meals! Personality plus- and very efficent. We never know when we try someplace off the beaten path if we will find quality servers like her!!
Manager Response: Dear 604kathleenc,  So very kind of you to share your rave review of our rock star Doheny Surf Restaurant associate and overjoyed you were able to experience the genuine and authentic hospitality the Doubletree Dana Point has become known for over the years!  We will be sure to recognize and celebrate her as a result of you sharing your experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary Heading: a little disappointed for an upgraded room!
Summary: Hotel needs to be remodeled, needs better pillow options.  the bathroom really needs work!  tub/glass doors were icky.  Sink faucet was DIFFICULT to operate.  I could go on... Bar area, pool area, and work out area were satisfactory.  the ocean view could be much better with a little landscaping of the hotel grounds.
Manager Response: Dear agarrett2020,  Thank you so very much for providing us with your valuable feedback from your recent guest experience and our most genuine apologies we did not exceed your expectations with your ocean view room.  We will definitely take your comments into consideration regarding the overall bathroom layout when the time comes for our next guestroom renovation to enhance the guest experience moving forward.  We sincerely appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your review with our hotel team and certainly hope to welcome you back on a future visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Like the hotel but overpriced parking
Summary: The hotel is good. Good location. Restaurant is ok, not a lot of choice on the menu but ok. Breakfast is very good. Staff is ok but not really friendly or unfriendly. Just ok. For example passing by the reception in the morning I was not acknowledged at all. I don’t like the over friendliness it a good morning would be welcomed. The breakfast guy was doing the minimum but as I said, not unfriendly but quite indifferent. What disturb me the most is that in a location where you do not have any parking possibility than the hotel, they charge you $30 a day even as an hotel guest. That is not acceptable. I wrote to the hotel but got a probably computer answer telling me that they are sorry they did not fulfill my blah bla-bla-bla.. It was my first experienced with this hotel chain
Manager Response: Dear Nolofinwe,  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel's phenomenal location close to everything Dana Point has to offer as well as the astonishing Pacific ocean views.  Our new executive chef will be unveiling our new Doheny Surf Restaurant menu items in March and it will be sure not to disappoint.    Parking is always at a premium commodity in every beach city up and down HWY 1 due to our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and it is imperative parking is regulated in order to ensure all guests have a guaranteed parking spot.  Thank you so very much for sharing your first time Doubletree experience with us and we certainly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on a future visit.

Summary: We had to find a hotel at the very last minute as our AirBNB did work out for us.  This is a lovely property. Close to downtown Dana Point and the beach.  Staff was so friendly and helpful. Clean rooms.
Manager Response: Dear akimberlin,  We couldn't agree with you more that the Doubletree Dana Point is a billion times better option than an AirBNB!  Thank you so much for your kind words and five bubble review and already looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: This hotel is on a busy road, with a freeway at its back. It has nothing around it. Although across the street from the beach, if you want to walk to a restaurant or shops, this is not the hotel for you. Food is average, nothing special, although the staff is very friendly. Rooms are modern and comfortable, with plenty of room in a seating area.
Manager Response: Dear basia140,  The location of our hotel on world famous Pacific Coast Hwy / Hwy 1 and close proximity to Doheny Beach typically appeals to most of our guests and genuinely apologize it was not the right spot for your recent visit.  Some of Dana Point's more popular restaurants and shops are only a 15 minute walk and a short stroll to the city's gorgeous harbor and marina area.  We are thrilled you enjoyed our spacious beach house vibe guest rooms and the authentic hospitality from our associates and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I don’t ever write reviews or care too much about hotel quality since we are typically in the hotel room for sleep only, but bathing my daughter in a past guests pubic hair is unacceptable. The glass showers clearly got a quick wipe down between guests but nothing was ever actually CLEANED the edges had dirt and build up all around. Past guests used makeup sponges under the couches meaning furniture was never moved to be cleaned. I got “food poising” symptoms the night I used the complimentary ice machine outside of our room (I assume that’s never been cleaned and mold is growing inside) and the terrible farty sulfur water that comes from the bathroom faucet really wakes you up when brushing your teeth in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear ngman1003,  Please accept our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit and genuinely hope you are feeling better and have recovered from your flu like symptoms.  We have conducted the appropriate follow up with our hotel leadership team as a result of your feedback and can assure you all ice machines are properly cleaned and maintained and was not the cause of your illness.  We definitely wish we had the opportunity to make your experience right during your stay and hope you will give us an opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience in the future.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: Helpful staff..clean property. Central location. Bathrooms were a little small but fu criminal. Breakfast food okay. Valet parking was easy and front desk was attentive. I'll stay here again. Close to decent restraunts.
Manager Response: Dear richman6764,  Our hotel mission here at the Doubletree Dana Point is to be the friendliest and cleanest in Orange County and elated you enjoyed your recent vacation with us!  The hotel's ideal location with gorgeous Pacific Ocean views, super convenient access to the I 5 and close proximity to all Dana Point has to offer appeals to both business and leisure guests alike.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future on your next visit.

Summary: I chose this hotel because my regular Beach "Go To" hotel was priced much too high for a quick get away.  Overall the hotel was great... Staff was fantastic from front desk to valet to restaurant/bar.  Love the decor & atmosphere.  Only a few small complaints. I would have liked the patio/rooftop lounge to be open.  I understand when there is low occupancy it isn't cost efficient.  One other little bit of feedback --- On a Monday morning at 8:30am although other guests may already be up, some guests like to sleep in a bit on a Monday off.  For this reason I suggest that you do not have the housekeeping staff have a meeting in the hall with loud voices and/or discussion over the carpet cleaning process.... AND I would also suggest that you DON'T do carpet cleaning at 8:30am on
Manager Response: Dear Airma L,  First and foremost our one and only hope is to become your new "regular Beach Go To hotel" as a result of your recent stay with us here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  While our Longboard rooftop lounge is currently on a seasonal operation the patio and gorgeous Pacific Ocean views are still available and we can certainly provide food and beverage service from our lobby restaurant.  Our most genuine and sincere apologies for the housekeeping disturbance and we will certainly share this feedback with the entire hotel team and understand just how frustrating that must have been for you and want all of our guests to have an enjoyable experience.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: Feel like you’re on vacation even when you’re on business. Great Property close to beach and amenities. Staff is amazing. Clean and updated. Many Rooms have ocean views. Great roof decks for all. Rent a bike or board. I’ll be back every year.
Manager Response: Karen Lynne R,  We could not agree with you more about the Doubletree Dana Point offers the best of all worlds and great for both business and leisure travel with our incredible close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach as your office!  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: This hotel was perfect for us, directly across the street from Doheny Beach. The younger generation was camping and joined us at the restaurant for good food and also the pool. They give you warm delicious cookies and bottled water upon check in. The rooms are spacious and the bathroom tiled. Breakfast is pricey and not included and parking is $29.
Manager Response: Dear Mariann s  We are thrilled you were able to host a mini family reunion with the Doubletree Dana Point as a home base and enjoyed our out of this world chocolate chip cookies!  Our team looks forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Erin at the front desk was incredible with her customer service and knowledge of the area.  The location of the facility and the view was awesome.  We will definitely return to this location again in the future
Manager Response: Dear checoleman15,  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsements of all aspects that make the Doubletree Dana Point the hotel of choice when visiting Orange County!  We will most definitely recognize our all star associate for the authentic hospitality you experienced as result of you sharing your feedback with us and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Dana Point.

Summary: Decent rooms. Had a couple issues but I would go back because of the location. Just across the street from the RV camping at Doheny beach. Parking is expensive. I parked at out families RV spot one night to save $29.
Manager Response: Dear loppnessmonsta,  Thank you so very much for being a repeat guest at the Doubletree Dana Point and absolutely elated you enjoyed our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach.  Our most genuine apologies we did not exceed your expectations and we look forward to providing you an enhanced guest experience on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Good hotel but kind of a strange location.  We needed a car or uber to get around.  The valets were helpful with suggestions for restaurants and trolly info.  The hotel is clean and nice but our room was a little strange.  Our balcony was directly above the two suites below us and smaller.  This led to us and the guests below us to not have any privacy while on the balcony.  While sitting on our balcony, we could look down and see the other guests enjoying food or reading on their balcony.  The breakfast options were good.  The pool and lounging area is next to the parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear lynnetravels2017,  Thank you so very much for your valued feedback regarding the design of our hotel and our sincere apologies it was not exactly the ideal layout for your recent vacation.  We genuinely appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on a future visit to Dana Point.

Summary: The sliding doors do not fit anymore.....too old and tired.   You hear the highway easily which is just feet from the "ocean front" rooms.   Same goes for the suites.....noisy, especially the connecting doors.....you can hear far more noise that is acceptable.  I have liked most Hiltons in the past.   This one is not worth it.
Manager Response: Dear Go786819,  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and our sincere apologies our property did not exceed your expectations.  We will certainly take your feedback into consideration when our next hotel renovation is scheduled and appreciate you being a loyal Hilton guest.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at this hotel today.  We had dinner at the restaurant inside of the hotel on the first floor.  Randi was our server and she was amazing.  Super happy and cheerful and very attentive to our dinner needs.  She explained everything and even suggested a meal.    Make sure you seek her out when grabbing a meal, you will see what I mean.
Manager Response: Dear Lozanolisa11,  Thank you so very much for your kind words regarding our rock star associate and we will be sure to recognize them as a result of your feedback.  We genuinely appreciate you being a valued guest at the Doubletree Dana Point

Summary: The DoubleTree in Dana Point is our go to when visiting friends and family. Close to beach activities, bars restaurants and quaint shops! Walking distance to the DP Harbor. Spring time is excellent for a whale watching tour on the Pacific Ocean.
Manager Response: Dear maretini66,  Our team genuinely appreciates the shout out and are forever grateful for you being a repeat guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We could not agree with you more what an incredible destination Dana Point is and overall the best hidden gem in Orange County!  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: Although the weather when we visited was especially cold and dreary the one true & memorable bright spot was Meia & the great customer service she gave every time we encountered her (and we asked for her service many times over our 2.5 day stay - she did not disappoint us even one time!)👍 We visited over Christmas in 2019. She greeted us when we arrived w/a smile, took the time to show us our room options, answered all our questions promptly & was there to give us a warm farewell!  Well done, Meia! We wish we came across more staff like you in our travels! If we return to Dana Point we will return to this hotel esp. because of staff like Meia! All the best from South Dakota! M&K
Manager Response: Dear MKfromSD,  We genuinely appreciate your shout our for our all star associate and over the moon you were able to experience the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Dana Point has become known for over the years.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and certainly look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travels bring you to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Too much noise for the price
Summary: Property is right on a main highway.  Claims ocean view, but it's obstructed.  Staff put me in an occupied room which never goes well.  To fix it gave me a bigger room which was even louder and a worse view which I paid top dollar for.
Manager Response: Dear donsharp55,  Our most genuine and sincere apologies for the mishap regarding your room and the view from our surfside suite did not meet your expectations.    Your experience has been shared with the front office team as a result of your feedback and genuinely hope you will give us another opportunity to provide you with an enhanced guest experience on a future visit.

Summary: As a family of 4, we had a great stay in a King Suite. Our kids are younger and fit on the pullout couch and the 4 of us had plenty of room in the suite. There wasn’t a door separating the two sleeping areas, but there were two TVs and we could all watch our own shows without bothering the others. We could lightly hear the train horn, but it wasn’t bothersome or during sleeping hours.  We did eat at the restaurant for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. It was nothing special but good nonetheless, if you don’t feel like leaving. At lunch we were able to order and have food delivered to the pool so kids could swim and eat.  The staff was wonderful and so friendly and helpful. The kids loved Joey, the resident Front Desk dog who greeted us.    Though this was a quick stay, we rented one
Manager Response: Dear chilly62,  The Doubletree Dana Point guestroom suites are ideal for family vacations offering a little bit of everything for everyone and elated you were able to experience it all during your recent visit.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary: Hidden gem @ Dana Point, CA. The Double Tree hotel at Dana Point is centrally located with easy access to many local attractions. The Dana Point Harbor is also considered the gateway to Doheny State Park, one of California’s most popular beach facilities. In addition to Doheny State Park, Dana Point boasts several other world class beaches perfect for a day of surfing, swimming, or building sandcastles. This was a perfect place for our family gathering on a deep sea fishing expedition trip. The Double Tree hotel offers an ideal location , walking distance to various restaurants and a quick drive to our dock for the fishing boat. Staff was friendly and wonderful, they provided wealth local info to restaurants and activities.
Manager Response: Dear David4500,  Sounds like an absolute ideal Dana Point experience and your family was able to enjoy all of the incredible outdoor lifestyle activities our amazing city has to offer our visiting guests.  Our team could not agree with you more about our hotel's spectacular location and close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach with easy access to just about anything and everything.  We genuinely appreciate you sharing your five bubble experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back on  your next trip to Orange County!

Summary: My father stayed here Dec 21-24 2019. His secretary upon booking found a Groupon and used it. Before dads arrival I went to the hotel and asked about an upgrade using his HH gold points. I was given a complimentary corner suite. The room was great. Gorgeous, huge bathroom, living room with fireplace and bedroom with king bed.  The first night at 9 pm dad went to front desk because the  TV remote needed a new battery. He was told he had to return to his room and wait for maintenance. It took till 11 pm for them to come in and replace a tv remote battery. Really? Why not switch one with an empty room for the time being? It was not a full booked hotel.  He was told his room came with a free breakfast. Hew ent down the next morning and the waitress told him yes a breakfast was
Manager Response: Dear mzmermaidz,  Please accept our most sincere apologies for the service shortfalls that were experienced during your dad's most recent visit.  We obviously did not put our best foot forward exhibiting the authentic hospitality associated with the the Doubletree brand.  We genuinely appreciate you sharing this experience with us and will utilize it as a training opportunity to improve the guest experience moving forward.

Summary: First, parking is $29/day (valet is the same). They have great roof patios with awesome views. Breakfast was your typical hotel buffet. The room was really nice, however, the bathroom was kinda small.
Manager Response: Dear emptynesterstravelin,  First off, we are huge fans of your screen name and absolutely elated you enjoyed our phenomenal Dana Point / Orange County location and ocean views.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and sharing your experience with us it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary: We hosted an interview event for prospective students of our university, and the event space was great. Jayna and Scott made the process seamless and enjoyable. We would certainly use this space again!
Manager Response: Dear 119treyk,  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and the shout out for our all star associates it is genuinely appreciated!  We definitely look forward to hosting your next event here at Doubletree Dana Point in the future!

Summary: Noisy location with train tracks right behind it. Cramped bathrooms. Unusual room layout that made it hard to move near the bed.   Great service from the staff! The hotel is across the street from the ocean which is great but it didn’t make up for the noise.
Manager Response: Dear rf805,  Our mission here at the Doubletree Dana Point is to be the friendliest and cleanest in Orange County and thrilled you were able to experience the authentic hospitality from our associates.  We will most definitely address your comments regarding the room layout during a future hotel renovation as a result of your valuable feedback.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit.

Summary: I visited the hotel late November very much looking forward to a comfortable stay in quiet Dana Point. The hotel is easily accessible and has a fun beach theme and relaxed vibe. The building and interior look new but somewhat unmaintained, looks like there are a lot of cut corners that make it look older that It already is.   Front Desk: Even though I has already checked in online I still went to the front desk to get an extra for my wife and the famous Doubletree cookie. The transaction was not at all pleasant. I was told that the room I had picked was not ready, I had picked room 312 on the third floor on the front corner of the building. I was given room 301 in the back of the building. My son who was with us really wanted a cookie which I was told they were out. I was handed
Manager Response: Dear nesmore,  Thank you so very much for your extremely valuable feedback and our most sincere apologies we did not deliver a more favorable first impression during your recent visit to Dana Point.  Our goal is to deliver a consistent Doubletree experience with authentic hospitality and we obviously fell short of our own high standards.  We will certainly utilize your comments as a training opportunity for our associates to enhance the guest experience moving forward.

Summary: It's an older property with a fantastic location if you want to go for a bike ride or run - or surfing.  Walking distance to Doheny - the campgrounds are right across the street & fantastic access to beach trail going North towards the harbor & South all the way down to San Clemente with a barrier for pedestrians.
Manager Response: Dear ct_coronado,  We definitely agree with you about our phenomenal location with close proximity to all of the best Dana Point has to offer especially when it comes to outdoor lifestyle activities.  The Doubletree Dana Point-Doheny Beach is conveniently located half way between San Diego and LA with the most convenient access right off of the I5 freeway of any beach city in SoCal.  Thank you so very much for your valuable feedback and hope to visit with you again in the very near future.

Summary: The location is fantastic.  We took our dog and loved that we could walk near the beach and Dana Harbor.  Room was large, clean and we loved the view of the ocean.  Food was excellent. Breakfast choices were great with many options.
Manager Response: Dear Paula R,  Our team is over the moon you had such a phenomenal experience and enjoyed everything Dana Point has to offer!  Thank you so very much for sharing your five bubble review with us and look forward to hosting you again on your next Orange County vacation.

Summary: Great place for a board meeting.  Jayna Prest and Taylor the Banquet Captain as well as Kim and the staff at the Roof top lounge were awesome to work with.  We want to come back next year for our board meeting.  The hotel met all our needs, Dining, Lounging and Meeting space.
Manager Response: Dear Mick G,  We are overjoyed you had a phenomenal group board meeting with colleagues here at the Doubletree Dana Point and already looking forward to having you back again in 2020!  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement and taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Riding the coat tails of location!
Summary: Half the rooms have ocean view, half the rooms face the railroad tracks 25yds away. From the bar to the bed when the freight trains passed the whole hotel shook. The lobby was nice, parking expensive and the room dirty. Dried contact lens stuck to the bathroom floor and hair stuck to the shower walls. Room door allowed both light and sound from the hallway to pass both over and under the door. Front desk and F&B staff were attentive and accommodating but driveway staff, housekeeping and service crews avoided eye contact.
Manager Response: Dear SeanK1625,  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point and genuinely appreciate your candid feedback.  We will certainly make our team aware of the opportunity areas you mentioned to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Gnats, toilet didn't flush three days in a row even though they said problem was "fixed", the hallways smelled like there was sewage issue. I have never experience this issue in my business travel and this was disappointing. Made me want to switch honors programs.
Manager Response: Dear 5252Katie5252,  Our team is devastated to learn of the concerns you experienced during your recent stay and the lack of follow up or offering a potential room move once it was reported to us.  Service recovery and the appropriate follow up to make it right are some of our core principles and unfortunately we missed the mark on all levels.  Please accept our most sincere apologies and genuinely value your candid feedback as we will address it immediately to ensure an enhanced guest experience moving forward.

Summary: My wife and I didn't know what to expect. When we arrived to the front desk we were welcomed with warm hearted ladies with some cookis and water. Our 3 day stay was awesome. Our King suite was wonderful and cozy. Got a chance to decompress and slept well. We will be back
Manager Response: Dear khajr33,  The Doubletree Dana Point is definitely one of the best kept hotel secrets in Orange County and thrilled you had such a wonderful relaxing visit while enjoying the authentic hospitality from our amazing associates!  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and looking forward to welcoming you back on your next vacation in Dana Point.

Summary: Whomever remodeled this hotel was not proficient. The bathroom sink faucet was completely loose, the toilet did not want to flush, the shower faucet was loose.  Internet connection was nonexistent even after telling the front desk. The coffee area was never refilled, even after asking. Room cleaning was always late & slow, although the room itself was clean & comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear artmcdaniel,  We genuinely value all of your detailed feedback and apologize you were not a fan of our last $8 million guest room and public corridor renovation.  Our hotel team will certainly utilize your experience as a training opportunity to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: It is a bit tired and old facility. If you are looking for a reasonable place to stay for a family vacation with small children who are just happy to spend time in the beach, it may be okey place to stay. Nothing special and I would not in hurry to come back.
Manager Response: Dear 29shiho,  Our main goal here at the Doubletree Dana Point is to be the friendliest and cleanest hotel in Orange County while delivering an exceptional guest experience.  We are glad you enjoyed the convenient proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and certainly appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us.

Summary: The hotel is in a nice location near the beach. Access to it is kind of awkward. I recommend rooms with balcony. The swimming pool was too small and there is no hot tub. Drinks are too expensive. parking an bike rental are very expensive (rip off).
Manager Response: Dear maxshahbazian,  We are thrilled you enjoyed our amazing location near world famous Doheny Beach and views of the Pacific Ocean from your guestroom!    Thank you so very much for sharing your four bubble review with us, it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but be aware of added fees!
Summary: Nice hotel with good service.   Be aware that they charge a $29 parking fee. Also, if you opt for room service, they charge over nine dollars for that, on top of you food cost, and  doesn’t include gratuity.
Manager Response: Dear MBethW,  Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and glad you enjoyed your encounters with our service friendly associates and our hotel's beach house vibe during your recent experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Dana Point.

Summary: The staff was very nice... the hotel stay had to comped because when we first got into the room and my daughter jumped on a wet bed due to the leak coming from the ceiling.  She was instantly soaked. I have pictures of the incident. We reserved an ocean view room but due to a needing a different room because of water damage , we ended up with a view of the canal and freeway.  The hallway on the second floor smelled like raw sewage on our way back to the room right after we had an excellent breakfast.  When I went to take a shower and turned the faucet on, hundreds of black gnats came out of the faucet. Very gross....   I have photos.   The AC unit was so noisy it woke me up  every time it turned on through the night.     Also, I was told that I would be given an ocean view room
Manager Response: Dear jamesurias101,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a Hilton Honors member, you are our most valued guest. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we genuinely apologize for the unfortunate incident and the mishaps you encountered throughout your stay. We can assure you it was an isolated incident and not the norm here at the Doubletree Danna Point and the least we could do given the circumstances was comp your room for you and your family. Your comments will definitely help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience moving forward.   We truly appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us!

Summary: I attended a five-day training that was held at this location and the hotel was recommended for accommodations during the week.  The staff was very welcoming and very helpful.  I used our department's hybrid electric vehicle and the staff wen out of their way to accommodate the charging of the vehicle inside the parking garage so that I would not have to wait off-site.  The quality of service was consistent with every staff that assisted me during my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph B,  Outstanding to find out you had a stellar guest service experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point during your recent training class.  We pride ourselves on being the friendliest and cleanest hotel in Orange County and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a vacation on a future visit.

Summary: This is the first time I’ve stayed at this hotel.  I will say this it was Amazing! Not expecting much when I pulled up but really appreciated the hotel theme. (Super Nice)   The room was newly done as well as the hotel. Plus everybody was great.  So! I go to dinner. I had one of the best experiences ever. The Skuna Bay Salmon was incredible, so delicious. But the Mashed potatoes, are better than any steakhouse. (and I’ve been around the world)  Special Thanks to;  Jack: Súper Cool Guy from the valet Mia: Reception.. she spelled my name right Randi and Libby: Restaurant. Can’t ask for more Chef Josh: Creator of Skuna Bay Salmon and the Best Mash Potatoes Ever!  This is a must place to come.... plus it’s on the Pacific Coast Highway, just across the street from the beach.... you
Manager Response: Dear 597eduardoa,  Our team is absolutely elated your recent visit at the Doubletree Doheny Beach-Dana Point was nothing short of AMAZING and you enjoyed our SoCal beach house vibe!  We are even more ecstatic about all of the authentic hospitality you received from our all star associates during your stay and we will be sure to recognize them as a result of your valued feedback.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Double Tree was wonderful to work with as I was booking a large group of rooms and kept changing the number of rooms weekly. Our business group really enjoyed their stay, especially being able to walk strait to and from Doheny where we had an offsite picnic. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Wawntawn,  It was an absolute pleasure to host your group and delighted to hear everyone enjoyed our phenomenal location right across from world famous Doheny Beach.  The Doubletree Dana Point is definitely the hotel of choice for business groups, family vacations and weddings here in Orange County!  We genuinely value you sharing your experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: Great stay will definitely stay again and recommend to family and friends, excellent location, room was clean, the staff very attentive and the food was amazing, directly across digest beach it was an amazing experience
Manager Response: Dear phillipmisick,  While the subject line "Great Stay" and all of your verbatim comments suggest you really had an enjoyable time here at the Doubletree Dana Point, the one bubble review is the lowest rating and suggests maybe you thought a one bubble rating was the highest rating?  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: We forgot items in the in-room safe.  The hotel manager and engineering staff displayed enormous honesty and truthfulness recovering the items for us---the temptation to act poorly must have been significant...they rose to the highest level of integrity.
Manager Response: Dear pistol3322,  It was our absolute pleasure having you as our guest and to return your belongings to their rightful owner.  KINDNESS is contagious and we encourage everyone to pay it forward!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit at the Doubletree Dana Point.

Summary: The bathrooms in the regular rooms are small and impractical.  There is little counter space. There is a useless hook that is in the path of the shower door. If you open the door to the shower, it knocks everything off the hook.  The breakfast buffet is very expensive. The beds are  comfortable. The location is fabulous. The living area has a lot of space.  The staff is helpful.
Manager Response: Dear redsfanlora,  Our team is absolutely delighted to hear you enjoyed our phenomenal location, comfortable beds and friendly associates here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach on your recent vacation!  We will certainly address the concerns you mentioned regarding the overall bathroom layout during our next guestroom renovation cycle as a result of your feedback.  Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: We had a very good experience staying at this hotel for a family week-end. Check in was smooth, valet guy was friendly and helpful. Our room was nice, clean, loved the sitting area adjacent to the sleeping area. There was a mini fridge and coffee maker, no microwave. Our daughter was arriving the next day with her infant daughter, and they arranged for her to be in the room next to us, supplied with a Pack n Play. Loved having the rooftop deck and bar, just a little too much noise late at night since our room was close by. We got room service one night, and it was great. All the staff were friendly and helpful, especially when we were having trouble opening our door (it turned out we weren't pulling hard enough!) My only complaint is the cost of overnight parking at $29.
Manager Response: Dear chefnd,  Outstanding to learn you had an enjoyable family weekend here at the Doubletree Dana Point and genuinely appreciate your four bubble review!  Our clean spacious guest room suites and authentic hospitality from our friendly associates make us the hotel of choice when visiting Orange County.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: We had some minor issues at check-in but we really like the facility. The location is very close to the beach. The staff is pleasant and nice. We had a good stay. This will be a favorite and we will definitely become repeat guests. We shall be back!
Manager Response: Dear Jabtab,  What fabulous news to discover the Doubletree Dana Point is now your favorite hotel to stay at here in Orange County!  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement and already looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed here as a family, and a few things to note.   1: The “breakfast included” is very misleading. AFTER serving us the lamest continental breakfast we’ve ever had at a restaurant (stale pastries, anemic fruit, plastic containers of cold cereal) they told us that only 2 people were included, so we had to pay for our kids. (They’d eaten 1 bowl of cold cereal each).  2: The pool is surrounded by almost bathroom like tiles, and was so slippery the kids fell down just climbing out of the pool. There were also many flying ants floating on the surface. Gross. No hot tub, FYI. 3: Overnight parking was an extra $29 dollars. 4: The room was fine, but the bathroom was one of the smallest we’ve ever seen at a hotel.  I would never stay here again, and I would never recommend it to a
Manager Response: Dear Erin F,  We are deeply troubled by your disappointment and genuinely apologize we were not the ideal hotel for your recent family vacation.  Our team is already researching some of the points and addressing the concerns you mentioned as a result of your feedback.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: Due to a scheduling mishap on our part we had to book two reservations for our one stay. We could not get the same type of room for both reservations so we had to change rooms after one night. We ended up both on the right wing of the property and then in a room in the rear of the hotel. Both were right next to the train tracks. Both rooms were very noisy. We even felt the floor shake when one of the trains went through. There is no hot tub on the property or microwaves in the room and the cost to park is the same for valet or self parking. The staff, however, were nice and moved our bags to the new room for us while we were out.
Manager Response: Dear Roam,  Our most sincere apologies the location of your guest room and the preferred room type was not available for both reservations during your recent visit with us.  We can certainly assure you we do are absolute best to accommodate all guest requests and glad to hear you had very positive service encounters with our friendly associates.  Thank you so very much for your valuable feedback and we hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced experience on your next trip to Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Best place to stay for beach activities!!
Summary: This is a fanatastic hotel with a very beach vibe. Comfortable rooms, nice amenities, fluffly pillows and delicious chocolate chip cookies for Hilton Honors!  Definitely worth it to get an ocean view balcony suite.
Manager Response: Dear jennifern,  We are definitely all about our "beach house vibe" here at the Doubletree Dana Point and ecstatic you enjoyed every bit of your visit with us!  Our phenomenal proximity to world famous Doheny Beach, Pacific Ocean views and located close to the I-5 freeway half way between LA and San Diego makes us the ideal location for both leisure and business guests.  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement of our hotel and hope to see you again on a future visit to Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Quiet vacation for a few days, nice place
Summary: My room (a king bed) had two very large rooms and two very large Samsung TV’s on the wall.  Furnishings and fixtures are updated - I had a water faucet fall off in my hand the first day I was there, but was able to reattach it and use it carefully during my stay.  Housekeeping is excellent but not sure how to tip her because every day I leave more money by itself on the desk, and she never touches it!  My room didn’t have a view of anything except a sand parking lot, a railroad track, and Highway 1.  The rooftop bar is a good place to watch the sunset I suppose, but traveling myself, didn’t really get to experience that.  Staff is knowledgeable about the hotel and the area, and are friendly and easy to talk to.  As with most DoubleTree locations, you’re welcomed with a hot
Manager Response: Dear FITraveler1011,  Glad to hear you had an enjoyable vacation and appreciated our large spacious guest room suites during your recent visit here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We genuinely value your feedback regarding all aspects of your stay especially that you were able experience the authentic hospitality from our associates that we have become known for over the years.  Since not all guests will have cars while staying with us makes it challenging to have parking fees included at the time of making the initial reservation and to your point we proactively communicate our parking charges during the reservation process accordingly to minimize surprises to the best of our ability.   Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and look forward to welcoming you back on your next vacation in Orange County.

Summary Heading: This place is like lipstick on a pig
Summary: Rooms are dated, bed are horrible, sulfur smell lingering? Not sure why they allow me to do this review on trip advisor?  I thought this was the Hilton only review? Hate to be mean in front of everyone, but if it helps them get better than hopefully it will work
Manager Response: Dear Trent R,  Our most genuine apologies you were not extremely satisfied on your recent stay with us and that the overall condition of the guestroom you were assigned fell short of our own high standards.  We will definitely take your feedback to heart to improve the overall guest experience moving forward and appreciate you sharing your recent visit with us.

Summary: The location is amazing but the quality of the staff is even better. Meia Irma were especially helpful in helping us find great restaurants and things to do. Randi in the restaurant was some of the best service we have ever received.
Manager Response: Dear duchirussell,  Ohana Fest is definitely one of the most amazing events here in Dana Point and elated to hear you had some VIP guest service encounters with our all star associates!  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest here at the Doubletee Dana Point and for taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us.

Summary Heading: Good for two days, but hotel could use a makeover
Summary: Room was adequate, but tell tale signs of being very dated and old. Bathroom layout was disjointed and strange...no ants this time, thankfully! I was hoping for more from Hilton! I hope the property will come out shining with updated rooms!
Manager Response: Dear ja409,  All of our guestrooms and public corridors received $8 million worth of enhancements three and a half years ago and our team is equally discouraged you did not enjoy the beach house vibe of the room.  Thank you so very much for your valued feedback and hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an exceptional experience on a future visit.

Summary: We stayed here while visiting family in Laguna Beach & San Clemente. It was so convenient and centrally located. Our room had a beautiful ocean view & the whole property was so clean & bright. Every member of the team we encountered was so genuine and friendly. Housekeeping was incredible with such attention to detail. The restaurant, bar & room service was great.  I definitely look forward to returning with my children in the summer. Thank you for a fantastic week-stay!
Manager Response: Dear Haley M,  Our hotel mission is to be the cleanest and the friendliest and thrilled you were able to experience just that on your recent visit here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We genuinely value your five bubble review and look forward to hosting your next family vacation here in Orange County!

Summary: This hotel is one of our favorites!! We had a room overlooking the Pacific Ocean with a balcony. The service is top notch!!. Location doesn’t get any better. Across the street is the coolest walking path with good restaurants. I recommend anyone this place!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Q2284QBalank,  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement and five bubble review of the Doubletree Dana Point!  We can not agree with you more about our amazing location, close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and everything else our incredible city has to offer.  Our team is pleased you were able to experience our authentic hospitality during your vacation and look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit.

Summary: I have never received such poor service in the restaurant at breakfast. The entirety of our meal (after being seated by the hostess), we were not approached once. No welcome or beverage order. No explanation of options for buffet. Nothing. We had to request beverages twice by chasing an aloof server down who was too busy aimlessly wandering the floor and staring into space at tables nearby. After the second request for a simple hot tea and coffee, it took 15 minutes to fulfill it. Once the coffee was received, it was so horribly burnt and bitter, I couldn’t drink it. After the meal, there was no check offered (since no one ever approached our table) so we ended up telling the hostess we were leaving. As gold members, this was a free breakfast, but I would totally avoid In
Manager Response: Dear staceyl571,  We genuinely understand your frustration and extremely disappointed our team was not able to provide an enjoyable breakfast experience on your recent visit.  Your review has been shared with our restaurant team as a result of your feedback and we will conduct the appropriate retraining with all associates.  Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us as it allows us the opportunity to make it better than it was before.

Summary Heading: Doublletree in Dana Point over priced.
Summary: $29 for parking was gouging. We were supposedly upgraded to the 4th floor, but as it turned out, the room we selected online ahead of time would have had a better view and would have been the same accommodations.
Manager Response: Dear derekm286,  Our parking rates are competitive with other hotels located on Pacific Coast Hwy with close proximity to the beach and guarantees all guests will have access to a parking spot during their stay with us.  A day time only beach access pass across the street at Doheny State Beach is $15 for just a few hours to put things into perspective.  Please accept our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with the complimentary room upgrade you received and the view was not to your liking.  We will certainly look into this and address it with our operations team as a result of your feedback.  Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on a future visit.

Summary Heading: Needs work!  (and parking costs are HIGH)
Summary: This place is an outstanding location, but for the money, i should think the rooms would be a little better maintained.  Also, thankfully there is no "resort fee" but the parking more than makes up for the dreaded resort fees.  And the jacuzzi is GONE!
Manager Response: Dear arizona-mark,  We are thrilled you enjoyed our outstanding Pacific Coast Hwy location and close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach!  Our housekeeping and engineering teams perform regularly scheduled deep cleaning and preventive maintenance programs for all of our spacious guest room suites and our sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your recent experience.  Unfortunately parking will always be at a premium up and down the California coast in every beach city and we need to regulate it to ensure a parking spot for all of our guests.  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and hope to see you again on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: Have stayed here multiple times and I always here when I'm this area. Nice location with comfortable rooms and atmosphere. Make sure to eat at the restaurant where the food is excellent! Even better if you get to meet and be served by Randi or Cheryl. Great service and they treated my husband and I like family! Randi thanks for the laughter and Cheryl love the chat about perfume fragrances 🙂!
Manager Response: Dear Sseemmaajj,  Thank you so very much for being such a loyal repeat guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point over the years!    It genuinely brings smiles to our faces to learn we are your hotel of choice when visiting Orange County.  We will be sure to recognize our all star associates for providing you with a memorable experience and authentic hospitality.  Our team truly appreciates you sharing your feedback with us!

Summary: Was pleasantly surprised by the spacious of the rooms, the friendliness of the staff, the quality of the food, and the cleanliness of the property.  It was across the street from the ocean, so I had a lovely ocean view and could get up early and go for a nice, ocean breeze-filled walk in the morning before my meeting.  Thoroughly enjoyed it and will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear TA091819,  Our team is genuinely grateful you had an exceptional experience on your recent visit here at the Doubletree Dana Point and appreciate your five bubble review.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and taking your time to share your experience with us.

Summary: We stayed here for several days and were satisfied with their service. The size of the rooms are big enough for 3 persons or a family of 4. However, they need to do some updates in their bathroom fixtures, furnitures, room decorations. They a bit outdated and not very clean.
Manager Response: Dear cit63bel,  Thank you so very much for staying with us for several days here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach and glad you enjoyed our spacious guest room suites.  The hotel completed an $8 million guestroom and public area renovation three years ago and are discouraged you were not impressed with the enhancements made throughout the hotel.  We certainly value your feedback and will definitely utilize it in the planning process during our next renovation cycle.

Summary Heading: Double tree by Hilton? (Dont let the name fool you)
Summary: Terrible hotel, don't book here not worth the price. Room was disgusting, looked like it hadn't been cleaned in forever.  There was hair on the walls and in the shower.  Not to mention the biggest spider I have ever seen
Manager Response: Dear danielleariss,  Words cannot even begin to explain our overall disappointment regarding your recent visit and are truly sorry for not providing you a best in class guest experience.  We have personally shared and addressed your observations with our housekeeping team for their immediate follow up as a result of your review.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and hope to have another opportunity to make it right on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: We were not satisfied with the rooms, specially the bathroom (ants and mold). The bed comforter smelled like dog :(  Overall, the look of the hotel is very good. The area and access to beach, good!  Valet and restaurant staff, professional and friendly. The restaurant food was very good.
Manager Response: Dear amendez1994,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your recent visit and appreciate you sharing your observations with us so we can improve the overall guest experience moving forward.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach, Doheny Surf Resaturant and our friendly associates here during your visit.  Thank you so very much for sharing your valuable feedback with us

Summary Heading: Family has been staying here for over 10 years when visiting relatives.
Summary: Consistent, clean, accomodating and within a stones throw of the beach. This place rocks  for price and location when you look a mile or two away and see that they charge $350 night and up. We have been 5 or 6 times over the last few years. It is a sure thing.   On our last visit I threw my back out moving the luggage out of the car. Not the first time. I knew what I did, I knew what I needed to do but I was in a new city. I needed a  chiropractor or or my vacation would be a disaster.   Thankfully the concierge knew who to refer me to. I am  eternally grateful to the staff for helping me and sending me to Life Point Chiropractic down the street in San Juan. They were great, charged me half of what I expected to pay and followed up with me the next day.  Their restaurant is good
Manager Response: Dear adoc4u,  We genuinely appreciate your family being such loyal repeat guests over the years here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Glad our amazing associates were able to provide beneficial local area recommendations and most importantly that you were able to enjoy the rest of your vacation.  Our team is definitely looking forward to welcoming you back and hope to see you again next summer!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Experience at Dana Point Hilton Double tree
Summary: We had booked a block of 60 rooms for 3 days for our guests at Dana Point Hilton Double tree , at my son's wedding events at Laguna Beach. The hotel gave us a great group discounted rate and really took care of all our needs. Our wedding party relatives and guests were very happy with the accommodation, the convenience of this Hotel to the Beach, restaurants and activities.  The staff was very friendly and everyone felt welcomed. The rooms were very spacious since they are all suites . We used the large patios on the 4th floor to hold group parties and there was convenience of ordering food up to the terrace and patios from the Hotel restaurant. Some of the rooms came with large patios and views of the ocean were awesome. The Buffet breakfast at the Hotel Restaurant was
Manager Response: Dear sjayakarmd,  It was our absolute pleasure to celebrate such a momentous life occasion with all of your guests and our team genuinely enjoyed being a part of the festivities throughout the weekend!  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement and five bubble review of the Doubletree Dana Point!

Summary: We had ants in the room. It was a horrible experience trying to find another room. We requested the General Manager to call us and he never did. The manager just threw points at us thinking that would help our weekend
Manager Response: Dear cerveracarlos72,  Our most genuine apologies we did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit and that our service recovery efforts missed its intended purpose to turn your stay around with us.   We will certainly utilize your feedback as a training opportunity for our entire team and truly appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: We chose this hotel for the Labor Day weekend because of its closeness to the beach. Looks like it was recently renovated with the updated room features, which was nice.  Pool was small and crowded because of the holiday weekend.  Food in the restaurant was alright.
Manager Response: Dear alexgP,  Thank you so very much for spending Labor Day weekend 2019 here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We are glad you enjoyed our updated features throughout the hotel and genuinely appreciate your four bubble review.

Summary Heading: My new favorite place to spend a long weekend!  Great hotel, great restaurant, close to the beach.
Summary: The Doheny Beach Doubletree is clean, comfortable, well kept and close to the beach.  Family Friendly!  We opted for self parking underground, but valet is available.  Parking spaces are a bit small, but that's not why I came!  The outdoor pool area as clean, and a bit small, but that's not why I came!  The restaurant has a very nice hot buffet and regular menu items are available all day.  The food quality is very good and the staff are very responsive, friendly and polite.  Special shout out to Gavin, waiter, who stayed beyond his morning shift to wait on us for an early dinner and did so with a smile.  The roof top bar is a lovely place to hang out in the evening.  Finally, the short walk to the beach winds through a nice camping area.  The sand is clean, the surf was active,
Manager Response: Dear U1248NLmarys,  WOW what an absolutely incredible review of the Doubletree Dana Point and definitely puts a smile on the team's faces today!  Receiving feedback like yours reminds us of how fortunate we are to work in the hospitality industry.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: This location is great. It is right on the beach... almost, just across the highway. The staff is friendly. My first room was not acceptable , because it was right next to the highway. They did change it, but they put me on a different road. The good news is that I could at least see the beach! The food in the bar is not great. The breakfast is great.
Manager Response: Dear Judy P,  Our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and friendly associates are only a few of our best attributes here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and your four bubble review, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary Heading: Poor service, poor location, understaffed, poor management response
Summary: Short version: poor location + poor service + poor food value = pick another place.  Long version: Stayed for two nights. Booked as a personal getaway. Check in process went smoothly. Hotel is a clean property, location isn’t the best (bit of a walking hike to nearby beach, restaurants, and bars, also not on the Dana Point Trolley), but it’s shortcomings are in service, food, and management.  To start: I think the staff do genuinely care about guest experience and so shouldn’t be faulted. I work in a service industry myself. The problems I see at this property likely originate from management or higher. Training staff properly and providing sufficient staffing levels when the property is busy, both would go a long way to improving my review. So too would more than a form letter
Manager Response: Dear OCLeisureandBusiness,  Thank you so very much for providing us with this valuable feedback regarding your stay with us and can assure you we are equally disappointed you did not have a favorable experience during your visit.  We genuinely take all of your comments to heart and view the entire guest experience as a direct reflection of ourselves and obviously did not meet our own high standards.  Our leadership team is currently providing above and beyond training for all of our associates geared towards providing best in class service to enhance the guest experience moving forward.  I truly appreciate you taking your valuable time for completing the survey and this review so I can personally address these service opportunity areas moving forward.

Summary: Loved the hotel. Directly across from beach, chairs, umbrellas, towels available for use. We had a great family time. Food very good. Service was great. rooms pretty. Lots of room for different age groups.
Manager Response: Dear minnaseva,  So wonderful to hear you enjoyed our spacious guest room suites and all of the "beach house" amenities we have to offer here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and look forward to welcoming you back on your next family vacation.

Summary Heading: Great beach hotel in Dana Point
Summary: The location was perfect for a volunteer event at Doheny Beach.  The conference room was comfortable for our training and we also had drinks on the roof top.  Very nice decor.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Hawaii,  Our team could not agree with you more about the Doubletree Dana Point being the perfect venue to host an event.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The staff and accommodations of the Dana Point Doubletree were wonderful.  After months of planning a women's retreat assistance from Jayna Prest made our stay and event a complete success.  Every employee we encountered was helpful and happy to assist in any way possible.   Thank you DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Doheny Beach
Manager Response: Dear BucketListCheckCheck,  First and foremost we are huge fans of your fabulous Trip Advisor screen name!  The feeling is definitely mutual and it was an absolute privilege to host your weekend retreat and glad to hear it was an overwhelming success.  Thank you so very much for your kind words and we hope to have the opportunity to host your group again in the future.

Summary Heading: Very welcoming! Clean rooms & quick walk to beach!
Summary: Enjoyed our 2 night stay at this hotel! It was just a quick walk across the street to Doheny State Beach!! Love this area, very calm and not too touristy. Nice, rooftop bar overlooking the beach too!!
Manager Response: Dear Lizzie5683,  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement of the Doubletree Dana Point and thrilled you enjoyed all of the amazing attributes our hotel has to offer.  From our ideal location across from world famous Doheny Beach, friendly associates and pristine ocean views from our Longboard rooftop lounge.  We genuinely appreciate you being a loyal guest and hope to welcome you back soon on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: GREAT HOTEL - STAY AT THIS Hilton.
Summary: This place is the best.  Hidden Gem .  Location is laid back and wonderful.  Great Staff - The restaurant is first class.  Randi - Great waitress - ask for her and tip her well so she will stay and be there next time I go.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony S,  Thank you so very much for the phenomenal five bubble review and definitely agree Dana Point is one of the best hidden gems in Southern California!  We will also be sure to recognize our all star restaurant associates as a result of your valued feedback.  Already looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.........until next time...........Cheers!

Summary: A great experience at the Hilton Doheny Beach - Dana Point. The staff was extremely courteous and attentive. The rooms were clean and well maintained. Would have liked a microwave (my only beef). Will definitely stay my next time in town.
Manager Response: Dear andrewkern,  What wonderful news you had a great experience and elated to hear we will be seeing you again on your next visit to Orange County.  Our hotel mission at the Doubletree Doheny Beach is to be the friendliest and cleanest hotel in Southern California and thrilled we were able to deliver on your recent visit.

Summary: Had a great stay. Staff was extremely helpful and accommodating.  Stayed here and drove up to Laguna.  About a 20-25 minute drive, which was very scenic.  Would recommend this hotel and would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Jeff Y,  A Happy Belated Birthday and our team is ecstatic you enjoyed your recent vacation here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach!  Dana Point is most definitely Orange County's best hidden gem and a much better alternative to the congestion of Laguna Beach.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us!

Summary Heading: Worst doubletree hilton hotel we have stayed in
Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights and totally regretted it. The room we had was on the ground floor, facing the car park and train tracks at the back of the hotel. This is where all the smokers go, so we could not open the sliding doors, which we wanted to do because the room smelled of damp. The noise of the trains was also disturbing. The bathroom in the hotel room was tiny. I have never seen such a small bathroom in a hotel before. Terrible hotel service, from the parking valets who just couldn't be bothered to help you to the receptionists who somehow always looked busy on the computers at front desk but were not actually helpful at all. At check-in at reception, the receptionist confirmed that our reservation included daily breakfast. We were not aware that we needed vouchers for
Manager Response: Dear Sheila W,  Our team is equally disappointed to receive your feedback regarding your experience and genuinely apologize we did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit.  The Doubletree Doheny Beach prides itself on providing best in class service and we unfortunately fell short of our own high standards based on your feedback.   We have shared your review with the entire hotel team and will utilize it as a training opportunity for all associates to enhance the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: We spent a long weekend at the DoubleTree Suites and it was a great experience. After staying in Marina Del Rey the night before, also at a DoubleTree that we paid 2.5 times as much, the ocean-side hotel was a pleasant surprise. There's a nice (but small) pool and they have chairs and boogie boards you can borrow to take to the beach. We had a quiet room with a partial ocean view. There's a bar on the top floor, Longboards, where we had snacks with the kids and played cards.   Erin was the highlight of our stay. We first met her at breakfast and then she was at the front desk the next day. She provided excellent tips on where to go to the beach and some good food choices. Traveling with two kids, our room was large enough and the proximity to the ocean can't be beat!  The valet
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth M,  Thank you so very much for your kind words about our all star associates and elated you had a five bubble experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We genuinely appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County

Summary Heading: The view was nice but.....we had some other issues
Summary: The room decor looked tired and the electrical outlets didn’t work between the beds.   Our in room safe malfunctioned and it took 4 phone calls, a trip the front desk , and over an hour to get it opened.   The upstairs lounge was nice but the soda machine was broken and they had no lettuce for salads.... I expected a lot better from a Hilton property
Manager Response: Dear Jim B,  We are glad you enjoyed the panoramic ocean views and genuinely apologize for the inconvenience regarding items not being in working order during your recent visit.  Our team definitely values your feedback and have addressed the concerns as a result of your review as it allows us the opportunity to improve the guest experience moving forward.  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Don’t get tricked by the pictures.
Summary: Does not merit the “Hilton” name since it does not meet any of the standards. In actuality, it’s “Motel 6” kind of a place - nothing more. Pictures posted on travel  sites do not correspond to the reality.
Manager Response: Dear Grigor-Diran,  Our most sincere apologies you did not experience everything you had hoped for during your recent visit and our team is equally disappointed we did not exceed your expectations.  The Doubletree Dana Point is in good standing with the Hilton Brand Quality Assurance team and the website pictures depict all attributes throughout our hotel.  We truly value your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced experience the next time your travel plans bring you back to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Awesome service by all  employees, good restaurant with great food and service
Summary: Our room was clean and nicely appointments. Every employee we met was friendly and helpful. Great location near the beach and harbor. The restaurant served great food and the service was amazing. Breakfast serve your self spread was great.
Manager Response: Dear BrogansJunket,  Our team is elated to hear you enjoyed all aspects of the Doubletree Doheny Beach on your recent vacation here in Dana Point!  Thank you very much for your five bubble review and definitely looking forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Avoid this hotel.....except for personable staff at the restaurant, entire stay at this hotel was a terrible letdown. From location to room, everything was below par. Hallways had smelly carpets and AC in the room did not work.Complained at Hilton app and was told that they will resolve the issue in 3 days - only to find that the franchise does not even get issues reported on the app.
Manager Response: Dear Sapan B,  We genuinely apologize our hotel did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit although pleased you enjoyed your meals in our Doheny Surf Restaurant.  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us as it allows us the opportunity to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Great location and clean room, but that's about it. I did not feel safe at this hotel, and when I brought it to the attention of the Asst Supervisor, she seemed to care less.  1. The power went out at 5:30am while I was getting ready for an early business meeting, leaving me to get ready in the dark while using my phone flashlight.  2. Staff knocked on my door late at night and woke me up. When I asked though the door what she wanted, the girl said sorry and left.  3. The next morning, a different person knocked on my door then immediately yanked it open, including the chain which is clearly just there for show because the doors open outward into the hallway (see picture). Security problem! The lady closed the door as soon as she saw me, but when I asked what's going on she said
Manager Response: Dear Abb1231,  Our most genuine and sincere apologies for the isolated incidents and guest service shortfalls you experienced during your visit.  We can assure you the safety and security of all of our guests is our number one priority and I have personally addressed these topics with all hotel departments as a result of you sharing your experience with us.  We also encourage all guests to utilize the privacy signs to avoid being disturbed at inopportune times throughout their stay with us.  The local area power outage we experienced was definitely an inconvenience for all of us and we shared your frustration as SDGE worked to repair the issues throughout the city of Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for sharing your valuable feedback with us and hope to have the opportunity to provide you with an enhanced experience on a future visit.

Summary: Although Hilton advertises that this DoubleTree has been remodeled, it is in need of another "professional" remodel.   The hallways smell and are dark; the in-room bathroom is small, no room for personal toiletries, retiled old tub/shower area, glass door on tub is hard to manuever, and toilet runs on and off (we asked twice for maintenance to fix it with no success); pool is very small and located at the entrance, so there is not any privacy. There isn't any pool service, but there is a small snack shop and bar near the pool.  The WiFi is horrible, floors were not swept, ice bucket was not cleaned each day, glasses were not refreshed with clean glasses. Overall, we were disappointed with this Hilton property. -- Hilton Diamond Member.
Manager Response: Dear Chris_Mayfield,  We genuinely apologize we did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit and truly appreciate your candid feedback.    Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve the overall guest experience moving forward. Our promise is to do whatever it takes to ensure you are extremely satisfied and hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.

Summary: We were super disappointed with this hotel. We stay regularly at Hilton properties and felt this one was way below standard. The room was dirty and dingy. There were obvious things that hadn’t been cleaned, including a used washcloth still left in the shower. (Gross!) Front desk staff was great and switched us to a different room. That room did not have as good a view, and had a room next door packed with college guys, blasting music, so we asked to switch back to the other room. At this point we were feeling embarrassingly high maintenance, and let the front desk staff know we were leaving to the beach, so they had time to get the room cleaned with no rush. It never did get cleaned, the used washcloth had been moved from the shower to the counter! The carpet had clearly not
Manager Response: Dear GER4511,  Our most sincere apologies for the housekeeping shortfalls you experienced during your recent visit and can assure you we are in the process of retraining the entire team as a result of your feedback.  Thank you so very much for being loyal to the Hilton family brands and for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary Heading: Double Tree Doheny Beach- Dana Point
