Summary: Our Stay at Double Tree Doheny Beach - Dana Point was very enjoyable.  Everything was great from checking in, room, beds,enjoying the ocean to checking out. We loved the cookies.  We would recommend this Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear gasacarr,  What wonderful news you enjoyed the Doubletree Dana Point guest experience from start to finish and genuinely appreciate your five bubble recommendation!  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us and definitely look forward to visiting with you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Great location for family beach vacation
Summary: We stayed to attend the Pageant of the masters in Laguna and wanted to spend a few days at the beach as well. We were able to walk in 5 minutes to Doheny and play. We used room service to enjoy the room. The staff from Front Desk to Valet were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear ccioffi2018,  Sounds like an incredible Orange County vacation and thrilled you enjoyed your overall experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit

Summary: This hotel could really use a renovation & deep cleaning: shower and sink had mildew, chairs/sofa look dirty, lamps were dusty, sheets look dingy, mattress was very uncomfortable and pillows went flat. Room had a musty odor. The sliding door and screen were filthy. The exterior of the hotel has cobwebs and could benefit from being power washed, patio and lounge areas/furniture are dirty. Walls are very thin!
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca D,  Our hotel completed over an $8 million dollar guestroom renovation three years ago and we are equally discouraged you were not impressed with the overall enhancements.    We can assure you that your feedback has already been addressed with our housekeeping team and truly apologize this isolated incident impacted your overall experience.   Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and hope we have the opportunity to make it up to you on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great hotel if fire alarm stopped going off
Summary: Great hotel if fire alarm stopped going off. Started at 10pm gone off twice and evacuated twice I hope they get this under control as I need to get some sleep. Cookies are free and good but they won’t give you any more bottle water only one time at check in had some lame excuse that they were running low. I mean really keep my family up all night long and can’t give us a few bottle waters. Oh well I guess we just will deal with it. Parking going to set you back $29 bucks a night too. Besides all of that everything else is great !
Manager Response: Dear Eric B,  Our most genuine apologies a negligent guest non life threatening incident activated the hotel's life safety system during your visit and it disrupted a peaceful night's rest for you and your family.  We certainly understand your frustration, but rest assure our number one priority in these scenarios is the overall safety and security for all guests and that we execute the appropriate emergency protocols.  Our team will utilize your feedback to improve the overall guest experience moving forward and certainly appreciate you taking your valuable time to bring it to our attention.

Summary Heading: Good location but hotel is rough around the edges
Summary: Enjoyed the location though non ocean view rooms have steady highway noise and no view at all.  Parking rates are excessive.  Short walk to the beach via adjacent beach campgrounds. Staff is friendly.  Rates can be high during Summer season.
Manager Response: Dear AndyThomsen22,  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our pristine location and close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach.  Our sincere apologies our signature view rooms were not available during your recent visit and the view from your room was not ideal.  Our overnight parking rates are below the Orange County beach city fair market value and helps ensure all registered guests have a parking spot during their stay with us.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back on a future visit.

Summary: This hotel exceeded my expectations! I will definitely be back to stay! Clean, cozy, ocean views, yummy food, homemade cookies, fruit water, pool, 24 hour gym, and wonderful staff! Plus, no bugs!! Loved this place!!!!😊
Manager Response: Dear prplepassion1111,  Such a wonderful review and thrilled we exceeded all of your expectations on your recent vacation here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We definitely agree that our hotel offers just about all of the attributes and amenities any guest is looking for and truly value your five bubble review.

Summary: Just completed a summer team meeting at this property.   The Sales and Catering Manager Jayna was amazing.  Our meeting room was overlooking the beach and was nicely appointed.  F&B service was on point.  The hotel is a cute property overlooking the beach with very nice accommodations.   It has a very cool roof top bar facing the beach for a after work meet and greet.   Overall a great stay and great meeting at the Doubletree in Doheny Beach,CA
Manager Response: Dear tymike,  Absolutely fabulous to hear you enjoyed all aspects of the Doubletree Doheny Beach for both your business meeting needs as well as personal relaxation during your recent stay with us.  Thank you so very much for your shout outs and certainly hope to visit with you again in the very near future.

Summary Heading: Comfortable property with great staff & easy access to beach
Summary: I had a great visit here. Harper was the front desk person who both checked me in and out. She's great. She had a very welcoming personality and was clearly proud of her hotel. She told me all about what the hotel had to offer, and made sure I got my warm cookies. :-) I had dinner in the restaurant and Francisco was my server and he was also really awesome. Very personable and friendly!  In the morning, Gloria P was my server in the restaurant and she also had a great smile and great service.  Definitely look forward to my next visit here!
Manager Response: Dear RobJohnsonUS,  Thank you for all of the awesome shout outs for our all star associates, that is extremely kind of you and we will definitely be sure to recognize them accordingly.  We are thrilled you had an amazing visit and certainly look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Wedding Room Block
Summary: DoubleTree Suites was the perfect hotel to block out rooms for our nearby wedding in San Juan Capistrano. Jayna Prest helped make the process easy and clear, and had great communication skills leading up to the big day. The rooms were beautiful, and the rooftop bar was a great spot to spend with my bridesmaids the night before the wedding. Had a great experience all around!
Manager Response: Dear jacquelynrachel,  Our most heartfelt CONGRATS on your recent wedding nuptials and honored to have been part of such a momentous occasion.  Thank you so very much for your kind words and wish you and your family a lifetime of happiness!

Summary: Enjoyed the beachy feel of the hotel. Nice rooms and amenities. Very pleasant and helpful staff. Great service and food in dining room. Relaxing outdoor space. Nice location and convenient to activities.
Manager Response: Dear cathybJ7202VR,  Outstanding to hear you had a relaxing and enjoyable stay here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Our team is elated to hear you enjoyed the beach house vibe, close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and the authentic hospitality our associates offer all of our guests.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and sharing your experience with us, we genuinely appreciate it!

Summary: This hotel is well located but has its drawbacks. The bathrooms are in need of remodelling, there is no vanity space at all, and when you slide the door to close it, it leaves a couple inch gap. The sheets are pretty rough and the carpet could be replaced. The staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear marykevinlauren,  Our hotel guestrooms received over a $7 million renovation that was completed in 2016 and disappointed you did not find value in our most recent enhancements.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your guest service interactions with our friendly associates and truly appreciate you sharing your recent experience with us.

Summary Heading: Seem nice- long walk to beach
Summary: Was hoping to get a hotel on the beach and thought that I found it but it is a bit of a walk through the campground to get there.  Hotel was nice but tired and staff was very nice.  Not a bad place at all but just not what I expected.  The view of the ocean was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear rodjan5,  We are also discouraged that the Doubletree Dana Point was not what you had in mind in terms of our proximity to the beach.  In fact they're are only a handful of hotels up and down the entire California coast that have direct beach access due to state regulations.  Thank you very much for sharing your valuable feedback with us and we hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations on a future visit.

Summary: Dana Point Hilton Doubletree offers a small beach boutique feel, conveniently located across from Doheny State Park w/easy access. Hilton Honors rooms offer bright, contemporary clean design, ambiance, and conveniences. Considering the hotel’s proximity to freeway and train corridors, one would expect better insulation via dual lanes windows and wall soundproofing. I was shocked to hear an exceptionally loud snorer adjacent to my room.😳
Manager Response: Dear lauracaulk,  Our team certainly values your five bubble review and ecstatic you had an exceptional experience on your recent vacation here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us

Summary: I've been to the newly renovated Doubletree a few times and was dissatisfied with my last visit. It is a cute hotel with decent rooms, helpful friendly staff and a cool rooftop bar. On our last visit we decided to book an upgraded room (pacific suite) based on the websites description. We paid over $100 more for the ocean view suite with large bathroom and fireplace. These rooms are located on the back of the property with a partial view of the highway, no ocean. The bathroom was bigger but had spider webs everywhere and a window that opened to even more webs and no screen. There is no chair and the cozy fireplace is in a corner with a switch that doesn't work. I will post some photos of the room. I contacted Hilton as the front desk advised, about the inaccurate website
Manager Response: Dear destinationaddict,  Our most genuine apologies you were dissatisfied with your recent visit and for the oversight regarding the room description.  We addressed and corrected the content on our website as soon as you made our team aware of the discrepancy and truly appreciate you bringing it to our attention.  We definitely value you being a repeat guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point and promise to deliver a better guest experience on your next visit.  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to provide us with your feedback.

Summary: The hotel want terrible and wasn't great. Lacked attention to detail and customer service, I walked by the Front Desk multiple times while 2 people were working and they were too concerned with their conversation to say hello. Room was fine- could use a bit of a deeper clean and a touch up from the maintenance team. Requested a crib prior to arrival, confirmed upon arrival crib was in room, had to call down and request it because it was not in the room.   Rooftop restaurant/bar has a nice view, again lack of attention to detail. Requested they turn on the heaters and the poor girl couldnt get it to turn on and was having a bunch of issues with the gas tank- husband had to help her and eventually tried another fiddled with that and got it working.  Location is relatively
Manager Response: Dear chrystinepi,  We genuinely value your feedback and appreciate you sharing your guest service observations based on your interactions with the hotel team as it allows the opportunity to enhance the guest experience moving forward.  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share your review with us and our sincere apologies we did not deliver an exceptional experience.

Summary: Friendly staff, clean room, great location!  I travelled with my 2 kids for a soccer tournament and we were surprised to have the nice relaxing space with the couch and living area.  It really made it feel more like home.
Manager Response: Dear Venture,  Our mission statement here at the Doubletree Dana Point is to be the cleanest and friendliest hotel in Orange County and elated you were able to experience just that during your recent visit.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to seeing you again on your next visit.

Summary: Booked a block of 18 rooms for a business off-site 3 day meeting for our team from the west coast and east coast at the Doubletree at Doheny Beach. Julie Nilsen and Jayna Prest helped coordinate and accomodate our group wonderfully and the event went off without a hitch and between the great amenities and the wonderful hidden beach location, my team was so happy and impressed that they said I should handle more company functions there and never go anywhere but the Doubletree at Doheny Beach in DP. It truly is a cool, casual hotel with a great staff and some simple and great amenities. California lodging by the ocean at it's best!
Manager Response: Dear JW222SC,  From one JW to another, it was the absolute highlight of our week to provide an exceptional group experience for you and your colleagues and partnering with your company!  Thank you so very much for your rave review of our all star associates and already looking forward to hosting your next even here at the Doubletree Dana Point!

Summary: The hotel is not far from the ocean. It's a nice property that features balconies overlooking the ocean. Unfortunately, it's located across the street from a RV park/campsite on the beach. I stay only at Hiltons and this is the first time I have encountered a hotel in such an odd location. One of the biggest problems was the overbearing smell of charcoal and propane coming from the trailer park that drifts into the rooms regardless of if your balcony door is open or not. Also, at night if you open your balcony door, dozens of different bugs fly into the room and gather along the walls and pester you throughout the night. Another issue was the street to get to the hotel has no sidewalk, it is difficult to walk down as it has a split street and you need to cross to the other side
Manager Response: Dear Stay,  Our most sincere apologies that one of the most popular State of California Park campground sites and a special event at Doheny Beach had such an impact on your overall experience at our hotel.  We certainly hope to welcome you back on a future visit.

Summary: Our room smelt like straight up urine. When I asked someone about it they said it was a maintenance thing. It wasn’t a smoking room but felt like one for sure. Very old decor. Not the double tree experience I expected.  The cookies were good that they give you at checking though.
Manager Response: Dear ashleyk,  Words will not even begin to explain how genuinely disappointed we are and offer our most sincere apologies for your recent experience and can assure you this was an isolated incident.  Our hotel is 100% smoke free and will certainly utilize this as a retraining topic for our housekeeping team.  Thank you so very much for bringing this to our attention as it allows us the opportunity to improve the guest experience moving forward.

Summary: So, I was reluctant to write a review because my husband says i am hypercritical. However,  i think there are some things that should be noted before anyone stays here.  First, everything I am about to say is not a reflection of the staff or service as most (not all) is beyond their control.   So, when you read that this is a suite hotel you might get the feeling that you will have space....this is not so.  The bathroom in particular was ridiculously small.  The room was not what I would describe as meticulously clean, but there were no major issues (I always clean when I get to a hotel room and was able to correct most cleaning issues).  Additionally, we had neighbors that chain smoked and there is a train that goes by until late in the night.  I am a bit tired today to say the
Manager Response: Dear Hanna R,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your overall experience and wish you were able to share your concerns with our team so we could have addressed them on the spot during your visit with us.  We genuinely appreciate the candor and honesty of your review and certainly hope we have the opportunity to provide you an enhanced experience on a future visit.

Summary: We stayed a week at this great little hotel in Dana Point, CA. The beach themed property took great care and every request was promptly addressed. The staff was professional, warm and friendly. I’ve been with HHONORS since 91 and this will go down in my book as a favorite! We will definitely return here for a future RnR visit.   We had several great visits to the restaurant for one dinner and three breakfasts.
Manager Response: Dear jeffreyj468,  A huge CONGRATS on your recent wedding and glad you were able to gain some much needed rest and relaxation after the celebration settled down.  Thank you so very much for your rave review of the Doubletree Dana Point and what a huge honor to be one of your favorite hotels.  We genuinely appreciate your years of loyalty to the Hilton brands.  On behalf of all of our associates we wish you and yours a lifetime of happiness together and hope to celebrate your wedding anniversary well into the future.

Summary: These rooms are very small. The “queen” beds were not queens. They were fulls. The only reason I would stay here again is if someone else paid for the room. Not worth the money. The only reason to stay here would be for the location across the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Daydream,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your overall experience and did not find value in what our hotel has to offer all guests.  We are also in need of some clarification on where you saw the information stating there are "queen" beds in our guest rooms?  Listed below is directly from our website content providing the description as two double beds.  Standard 2 Double Beds Suite Two Double-sized Sweet Dreams® bed Desk with ergonomic chair Two 55-inch flat screen televisions Mini-refrigerator..  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary Heading: A Stay Of Fire and Ice
Summary: The location overlooks the ocean, trees and surfers. The flames of a fire kept us warm as we had perfect drinks on the deck at night. ❤️ But the ice machine was a bit loud, and popular 🙄 But still 👍🏻👏🏻❤️😁
Manager Response: Dear Dream,  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and glad to hear you enjoyed all aspects of what the Doubletree Dana Point has to offer with our incredible ocean views and fire pit at Longboard rooftop lounge.  We will certainly get you hooked up with an even better room location away from the ice machine on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Looks can be deceiving you will be disappointed!!!
Summary: It was our honeymoon and the hotel put us on the corner looking at the trash cans and freeway,  and right next to the bar so all night was extremely noisy. The elevator was the slowest one I've ever used in my life. The room also did not have a balcony as the pictures led us to believe. During our stay no one ever even acknowledged our occasion.  In the morning, went down to the restaurant and got insulted by the host and then two separate servers forgot to bring us drinks completely we had to finally ask a separate server to bring drinks. The only positive was that your hotel let us change our plans to stay only one night instead of two.
Manager Response: Dear selman 1216,  Our most sincere apologies for our team's oversight of the special occasion you were celebrating here at our hotel.  We are equally disappointed we did not exceed your expectations and will certainly utilize it as a training opportunity to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.  We truly value your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to redeem ourselves on a future visit.

Summary: Love the location and the comfort of the rooms.  The staff are wonderful and the cookies are yummy! Didn't use the pool but sat outside and read.  Its quiet and comfortable.  Loved the variety of channels to watch and no porn!! Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Culture,  We are thrilled you enjoyed our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach as well as the authentic hospitality you received from our associates.  Thank you so very much for being a repeat guest and already looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed Here which was a great location but on top of everything there is lady that make this stay outstanding. Her name is Jacqueline. She is the sweetest host EVER!!! We had breakfast 3 days in a row and she welcomed with big smile and make us feel Being at home and special. Make sure you ask for her on your visit. She is the best and she make your stay with different level of experience in any other 5 star hotels.  Thank you Jacqueline!!! For sure we will be back :)
Manager Response: Dear Bita F,  Thank you so very much for your high praise of the the Doubletree Dana Point and especially the shout out for our all star restaurant associate!  We will be sure to recognize them as a result of your feedback and look forward to visiting again with you in the future on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Accommodations were clean and spacious, the staff was helpful and friendly. We did not use the pool during this trip, mainly because the pool area wasn't very "luxurious". Bar space on the roof was nice and the drinks delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Nomad,  Thank you so very much for your kind words and thrilled you enjoyed your experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County

Summary: A group of 60 of us stayed here on an oceanography trip.  Jayna and the staff were so accommodating and kind to the students.  Great location and really clean rooms!  They even helped us with towels to take to the beach and had a wonderful breakfast ready for everyone each morning.  Nice place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear EducationalDiscovery,  The Doubletree Dana Point truly enjoyed hosting your oceanography trip and our team certainly enjoyed the experience as much as everyone in your group.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary: Very nice hotel across the road from the beach.  Enjoyed my stay and staff was very friendly. Only thing I didn't agree on was the 29.00 a day to park my rental car. Very close to many delicious restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear renaecoraci,  We are glad you enjoyed our convenient location and close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach here in Dana Point!  Unfortunately parking is always at a premium up and down Pacific Coast Hwy this close to the beach and ocean in every community here in Orange County.  The parking charge ensures there are enough parking spaces for all guests during their stay at the hotel.   Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and look forward to hosting you again on a future visit.

Summary: This is a very nice hotel. It sits right off the highway, so it is fairly easy to access. It has a restaurant downstairs. Upstairs is a lovely little bar and veranda that overlooks the near by Pacific Ocean. The staff is very accommodating. The food was delicious. The only odd thing is the layout of the hotel with lots of twist and turns in the hallways.
Manager Response: Dear Judy P,  Thank you so very much for your kind words and thrilled you were able to enjoy all of the amenities the Doubletree Dana Point has become known for over the years.  We genuinely appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit back to Orange County.

Summary: I stayed at the hotel as a stopover before checking into a nearby resort for a conference, and this was a better-than-expected experience. The surf/beach vibe of the hotel is quaint and fun and the perfect SoCal experience. You can watch surfers in the morning or evening catching waves, and the harbor is in walking distance for restaurants. Rooms were very clean and updated, although they had small bathrooms but it was not a problem, and great amenities of Hilton DoubleTree hotels. I would go back for leisure or business. Great value for the experience!
Manager Response: Dear Kelli R,  Your review has definitely made our day here at the Doubletree Dana Point and elated you received the full Orange County surf / beach vibe experience during your recent visit.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and for your glowing endorsement of our hotel.

Summary Heading: Perfect stay with a beautiful view
Summary: Wasn't crazy about slide bathroom door as we were sharing room with another party.  That was only the negative of our stay. Staff was very accommodating and informative with recommendations on the area
Manager Response: Dear kgolas,  We are thrilled you had a perfect stay and enjoyed the magnificent ocean views here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our team hears you loud and clear regarding the bathroom doors and will certainly address it with our designers during our next scheduled renovation as a result of your feedback.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to visiting with you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Nice location. Did not live up to expectations.
Summary: Close to the beach.  Meh. Average to below average for the standard DoubleTree experience.  No real "anything" for being a Hilton Diamond member except being placed on a Hilton Honors floor.  No breakfast coupons.  Single drink ticket with lots of restrictions.   Not sure what the allure is intended to be by management to attract guests.
Manager Response: Dear Jim T,  We genuinely appreciate your feedback and sincerely apologize we did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit.   As a Hilton Honors member, you are our most valued guest and your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience.   Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Three night stay at Double Tree Suites by Hilton Doheny Beach - Doheny Beach
Summary: Recently my wife and I stayed three nights at this hotel. Mandatory valet parking is $29 per night or $15 for day only. Valet service was excellent. We were charge and extra $25 per day for a room with a view of the ocean. This hotel is across the street from a public beach facing west for a perfect sunset view. They have a happy hour on the top floor patio with an excellent view of the ocean. The rooms were comfortable but the bathroom was the smallest I have ever encountered. Good location / proximity to many restaurants which are only minutes drive.
Manager Response: Dear Edward C,  The Doubletree Dana Point's prime location is notorious for some of the best sunset views in Orange County and glad you were able to experience it for yourself from our Longboard rooftop lounge during your stay.  We will certainly address the bathroom size during our next scheduled renovation and our sincere apologies it may have impacted your overall experience with us.  Thank you so very much for your valued feedback and hope to visit with you again on a future visit.

Summary: Beautiful views of the beach, very comfortable rooms, friendly and helpful staff, delicious seafood  restaurants on the marina. I highly recommend this place it's right on pch you can coast up the road and see some spectacular views.
Manager Response: Dear Guide,  We definitely agree with you about how fortunate we are for our incredible location and gorgeous panoramic ocean views the Doubletree Dana Point has to offer!  Thank you so very much for staying with us and truly value your five bubble review.

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and absolutely loved it, the suites are spacious and beautifully. We got upgraded to ocean view room and i thought that was very cool, the front desk who checked us in was very professional, kind and helpful. I believe his name was Samuel he is definitely an asset to this hotel. The breakfast staff were amazing too! Will be back soon!
Manager Response: Dear Mohammedalkod15,  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your awesome experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We appreciate you recognizing our all star associates and have shared your feedback with the entire hotel team.  Looking forward to hanging out with you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: We found this Doubletree Suites Hotel  late at night after arriving  at another hotel in San Clemente which did not meet our needs.  The Doubletree is in a perfect location across from the beach.  The room was beautiful and spotless.  The staff members were so lovely and accommodating, especially our waitresses at the restaurant, Randi B. and Cheryl H.  They were wonderful and waited on us immediately.  They also were like a comedy routine.  We felt like we were getting a delicious meal along with free entertainment.  Randi and Cheryl helped make our trip for a wedding and mini vacation a perfect vacation to remember!  We will definitely look for them the next time we book at the DoubleTree Suites Doheny Beach Dana Point CA. The Giffords from Connecticut
Manager Response: Dear Kim G,  We are over the moon you had a perfect dream vacation here at the Doubletree Dana Point and truly appreciate you sharing your experience with us.  Our outgoing and friendly team members certainly separate us from all other hotels in Orange County with the authentic hospitality they provide to all of our valued guests.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble endorsement and look forward to visiting with you again in the future.

Summary: It was just an ok hotel. Room was a little run down and beds were very uncomfortable and short (and were not tall). The bathroom was too small and had no counter space. The people above us made so much noise that we lost a few hours of sleep. We’ve stayed in better, but it was ok.
Manager Response: Dear Flyer,  Our sincere apologies our hotel did not exceed your expectations during your recent visit since our goal is to deliver a best in class guest experience.  We encourage all guests to notify us when people in surrounding rooms are impacting their stay so we can address the situation appropriately and everyone sleeps in peace.   Thank you for sharing your experience with us and certainly hope you will consider us again on a future visit.

Summary: The staff in Dana Point are always very welcoming and go out of your way to make your stay wonderful! Would highly recommend this hotel! Parking is easy and valet and garage parking are the same cost!
Manager Response: Dear Tour,  Thank you so very much for your kind words and endorsement of the authentic hospitality you received here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Our team members certainly make it a point to go above and beyond for all guests at every possible opportunity and thrilled you were able to experience it for yourself.  We truly value your five bubble review and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary: Hotel was absolutely filthy.  Our first room had bugs in the bathtub, so we refused it.  The next room they showed us smelled of cigarette smoke, so we also refused.  The 3rd room, which we took only out of obligation and exhaustion was still dirty.  Mirrors not cleaned, toilet seat had pee on it and the floor had not been vacuumed.  TRULY DISGUSTING.
Manager Response: Dear Roam,  Our most sincere apologies for your experience and assure you this is not indicative of all guestrooms at our hotel.   The team clearly missed the mark entirely not only from a cleanliness stand point, but also failed to make it right after your initial concern was brought to our attention.  We take your review extremely seriously and will be utilizing it as a training topic for all of the departments within the hotel.  Thank you so very much for sharing your feedback with us as it allows us the opportunity to improve the guest experience moving forward.

Summary: Really appreciated the service and attention received here. Louis and Edgar M. working the Rooftop Lounge treated us like family and made our stay here extra enjoyable. The lounges fire pits and heat lamps extended a wonderful sunset drink into near closing time. Would come back again and again if these two folks were here.
Manager Response: Dear Jonny L,  A very happy belated anniversary to you and elated you enjoyed the panoramic views and authentic hospitality from our Longboard rooftop lounge.  We will certainly be recognizing our all star associates as a result of your five bubble review.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: I am a weekly visitor to this hotel as I am on a long term contract in the area. I love almost everything about the hotels including the staff which is excellent, the amazing fourth floor bar overlooking the ocean, and beach access. The hotel does take care of diamond members very well also in my opinion. My only complaint is you cannot get the full downstairs dinner menu in the bar upstairs. I would much rather eat a steak under the stars on a beautiful night then in a lobby restaurant. I would love to just get a simple cheeseburger while sitting at the bar. I did a special request one night an I almost feel like I got the bartender in trouble for asking, so I haven’t since
Manager Response: Dear Gunzee,  The team here at the Doubletree Dana Point certainly appreciates your loyalty, kind words and five bubble review!  It is an honor to be your home away from home while you are on your extended work assignment here in Orange County.  We certainly understand where you are coming from regarding our food offerings at our rooftop lounge and apologize we disappointed you.  We have experimented serving our full food menu from four floors down out of the lobby restaurant and unfortunately we have just not been able to deliver positive guest experiences from long wait times for food to be delivered as well as the overall food quality being affected due to the logistics.  Thank you so very much for your valued feedback and look forward to seeing you on your next visit,

Summary: This hotel was nice and quiet and we thoroughly enjoyed the spacious room and plentiful breakfast. The hotel is a bit hard to find at first but once you get the intersection thingy, it's easy to drive to.   The beach is right next to the hotel, although we traveled there in December so it was chilly but the sunrise colors were amazing!
Manager Response: Dear not_blufFINg,  Great news to hear you had an enjoyable peaceful and relaxing time here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Both sunrise and sunset colors are phenomenal year round here in Orange County and definitely something everyone needs to experience for themselves.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and for sharing your experience with us.

Summary: Excellent service from the staff and vallet very curtious and helpful. The room was very nice and the views were amazing from the balcony. The beach is very close by and a very nice walk in the evening.
Manager Response: Dear Culture,  We are ecstatic you enjoyed everything the Doubletree Dana Point has to offer and the authentic hospitality our associates display on a daily basis.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review!

Summary Heading: Nice older hotel on the beach
Summary: Stayed the night here because it was close to the Catalina Express boat out to the island. 15 min walk. Even though it is older, they have done a pretty good job of making it up to date and fresh. Had a great view of the ocean. loved the balcony to watch the sunset. Nice breakfast buffet, for a price. Close to good eats and dessert.
Manager Response: Dear JLars34,  We definitely agree you get the best of all worlds utilizing the Doubltree Dana Point as a home base while exploring all things Orange County has to offer from Catalina Island, Disneyland and the half way point between LA and San Diego!  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us, we truly value your feedback

Summary: The hotel service was great  ,. The hotel was across Pacific coast hwy  just a short walk from the parking lot of the hotel  from our room you could see the Pacific Ocean  each room had a balcony of sorts loved the setting
Manager Response: Dear Explore,  Thank you so very much for being a raving fan of our pristine ocean views and ideal Pacific Coast Hwy 1 location here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Elated to here you were also able to experience the genuine and authentic hospitality from our associates during your recent visit.  We certainly look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: The Doubletree is a beachy hotel across from Doheny State Park. We had an oceanview room but bear in mind that it is not a closeup view. There is a highway and camping area between the hotel and the beach. It is a five or ten minute walk to the ocean but there are some homeless people in the area. There is security guard on the property and a card access parking garage.  The hotel itself is a little quirky. All the doors to the rooms swing outward and the bathroom had a sliding door that wouldn't close all the way. There is a mini fridge but no microwave. I did find a microwave in the snack pantry in the lobby. There is a train track next to the hotel, which might bother some people. There is a restaurant in the lobby but there is no free breakfast. The buffet was around
Manager Response: Dear Wanderer,  We are delighted to find out you enjoyed our beach house vibe here in South Orange County and appreciate you sharing your experience with us!  Thank you so very much for your four bubble endorsement of the Doubletree Dana Point.

Summary Heading: The staff made our corporate meeting a HUGE success!
Summary: We brought people in from all over the country for a 2 day meeting. The location was perfect and the entire staff was great. A special thank you to the Sales and catering manager; Jayna Prest. From my first phone call months ago all the way to and through our meeting, Jayna took care of everything going above and beyond with local recommendations, meeting room, guest rooms and much more. On the day of our meeting, Taylor, the banquet captain had everything set up for our meeting and took great care of us through our meeting. A GREAT PLACE to have any meeting!
Manager Response: Dear davida-dema,  Our team certainly enjoyed hosting your recent corporate meeting and elated to find out it was a huge success for you and your colleagues!  Thank you so very much for your "great place to have a meeting!" endorsement, it is genuinely appreciated!  We certainly look forward to visiting with you again on a future visit.

Summary: Great location and friendly team!  We were there for business and our entire group loved the location and the service.  The rooms were very clean and everyone they came in contact with were very helpful.  The view from the rooftop desk is beautiful!
Manager Response: Dear Daydream,  You and your entire business group are welcome back any time here at the Doubletree Dana Point and delighted you experienced the magnificent ocean views and authentic hospitality our hotel has become known for over the years.  It was an absolute pleasure having you here and our team truly values your five bubble review

Summary Heading: Highly recommend! Look no further for a Hilton property in Dana Point...
Summary: Laguna was sold out the evening we stayed here, and this hotel had just a couple of rooms left. We weren’t expecting much with a late arrival, but we were happy to drive a little further to have a Hilton property for the night. We were pleasantly surprised with absolutely everything about this hotel, and we will definitely return. From the moment we arrived to the moment we left, every member of the staff was friendly, welcoming, and seemed happy to be there. We didn’t have to ask for Diamond member perks as they were readily offered. The vibe of the hotel is authentic, relaxed SoCal, and our room was spacious and comfortable. We got a great night’s sleep and awoke to a gorgeous view. The breakfast buffet had something for everyone, and the service was genuinely attentive. We
Manager Response: Dear gottafly2stsomewhere,  We can honestly say this is one of the most rewarding reviews our hotel has received this year and made sure to share it with our entire hotel team this morning!  Thank you so very much for all of your kind words and we couldn't agree more that Dana Point definitely holds its own going toe to toe against Laguna Beach in terms of location and gorgeous views.  We genuinely appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: I cant say enough about your staff and how well they took care of us. we had our daughter rehersal dinner Saturday Night and it was beyond amazing ! The staff went above and beyond that night. The bartender Louis, the servers Suzy and Randy took such great care of us.
Manager Response: Dear Staticgrl,  Absolutely phenomenal to hear you had such a wonderful event and enjoyed your weekend here at Doubletree Dana Point.  We will be sure to recognize our all star associates as a result of your feedback and certainly hope to see you again on your next visit to Orange County!  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us

Summary Heading: Great location- a bit overpriced for the accommodations.
Summary: The hotel is in a great location for walking around the beaches and accessing the marina. Almost everything is walkable. The hotel itself was fine, a little dated, and the bedding was clean but not as plush as I would have hoped. Room service was quick and attentive, valet parking is a breeze and the guys are pleasant and seem to really enjoy being there but housekeeping service was lacking.
Manager Response: Dear Maps,  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point and glad to hear you enjoyed our close proximity to the ocean and world famous Doheny Beach!  Our most sincere apologies you did not find our hotel an overall value during peak spring break season here in Orange County and have passed your comments on to our housekeeping team for their immediate attention.  The hotel's mission is to be the cleanest and friendliest and certainly appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Excellent Service and really nice rooms
Summary: I was so impressed with how helpful everyone was from the guys who parked your car and were ready with directions to wherever you were going, concierge who answered all my questions and made accommodations and to housekeeping keeping our room clean and tidy.  The beds were so comfortable and I slept like a baby.  I wanted to take those beds home with me! The entire staff at the hotel were friendly and went out of their way to make sure you were comfortable,had everything you needed and were having a great time.  The friendly and excellent service was the icing on the cake to an already fabulous stay at the hotel.  The servers at the restaurant were very helpful and did an awesome job serving food. The workout room was great and I used it every day during my stay.  Thank you for
Manager Response: Dear Toni S,  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed all aspects of the Doubletree Dana Point especially the authentic hospitality you received from all associates throughout the hotel.  Thank you so very much for sharing your five bubble experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary Heading: nice room and warm cookies on arrival
Summary: The room was larger than a regular hotel room. The room had 2 large TV's, 2 Queen size beds and a pull out sofa. Other reviews mentioned noise, we didn't have any issues at all with noise. The rooftop lounge was very nice with heat lamps and overlooked the ocean. The room was very clean. We wish there was a complimentary breakfast offered and we couldn't open our patio door to let the fresh air in because we must have been near a smoker and all we could smell was cigarette smoke when we opened our patio. Overall a very nice stay in Dana Point.
Manager Response: Dear 4444Brendah,  Absolutely wonderful to hear you enjoyed our spacious guest room suites and enjoyed our spectacular rooftop lounge during your recent visit at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for staying with us and certainly hope to welcome you back on your next visit to Dana Point in the very near future.

Summary: Unfortunately we didn't know we would need a can of Frebreze.  Our restroom had an odor that permiated throughout our guest suite the entire time we were there.  Simply put, it smelled like a sewer.  We will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Camper,  Our most sincere apologies for this extremely isolated incident and certainly understand how this resulted in an unpleasant experience.  We can assure you we did not receive any other comments along these lines from adjoining guest rooms over the same time period during your stay with us.  We are certainly curious if it was reported to the front desk so we could have remedied the situation to upgrade you to a more enjoyable guestroom given the circumstances?  Thank you for bringing this to our attention and our engineering team has looked into and addressed your concern as a result of your valuable feedback.

Summary Heading: Nice one night stay at the Double Tree in Dana Point
Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Double Tree in Dana Point for a night in March 2019.  My band was the opening act for a show at the Coach House down the road and we decided to make an evening of it.  The location is great, right across the street from a beach campground.  The staff was excellent. We had a mosquito problem in our room due to a sliding glass door that wouldn't seal properly and there was some standing water on the large balcony due to recent rains.  They moved us to a room on a higher floor without issue and were very nice about it and even gave us a free drink!  Was pricey for what we needed but the location is good and it was convenient for our purposes.
Manager Response: Dear Schven,  Very cool and congrats on your band scoring a gig at the Coach House, it is an amazing venue to catch a concert.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our ideal location and everything amazing that Dana Point has to offer!  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying here for six nights last month.  My room was very comfortable and well appointed, and quiet!  The restaurant had very good food, especially the Eggs Benedict which I enjoyed every morning.  Jacqueline and all of the other staff were very attentive, making sure I had everything I needed, as well as being interested in getting to know me (and I them!) and giving suggestions of things to do when I had free time.  If I’m ever back in Dana Point I will stay here.
Manager Response: Dear 14AnnG,  We certainly appreciate your kind words and elated we are your hotel of choice when visiting the gorgeous city of Dana Point!  Our associates will certainly be recognized as a result of your feedback and for delivering authentic hospitality the Doubletree Doheny Beach has become known for over the years.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and already looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Very pleasant and easy check in when I arrived late evening to the hotel. Had a nice room with view of the ocean; Very calm and quiet. Good old fashions at the rooftop bar made by Edgar. Will come back again.
Manager Response: Dear ppuppal,  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your recent experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our team is thrilled we exceeded your expectations and you enjoyed your time at our Longboard rooftop lounge.  We certainly hope to visit with you again in the near future the next time your travels bring you to Orange County.

Summary: Everything about this place is great. The rooms are fantastic- ask for a balcony! The roof top bar is the place for drinks and Edgar will serve you up with great service and smiles.   For the last three years, this is the highlight hotel of my travels! Thanks for the views.
Manager Response: Dear brittlikestotravel,  WOW, thank you so very much for being such a loyal repeat guest  here at the Doubletree Dana Point, it is definitely truly appreciated.  Our team is certainly honored to be the highlight of your hotel travels and truly value your five bubble review.

Summary: My family had a reunion at the Doubletree over a weekend in February. The staff was very helpful re: giving us a discounted room block for all the out of town attendees. There are several outdoor seating areas that easily accommodated our large (30+ people) group plus other hotel guests. One of the patios, on the 4th floor, has a wonderful view of the ocean. There is a bar there where you can order drinks (full bar) and appetizers. they are also willing to deliver room service to the patio. It rained one night while we were there, and the hotel staff offered to let us move our party into one of the meeting rooms. We really appreciated that.  The hotel is sort of wedged in between two major roads (Pacific Coast Highway and Coast Highway). There is a bit of traffic noise during
Manager Response: Dear Shannon M,  The team is delighted to hear you and your relatives had an amazing family reunion while staying with us here at the Doubltree Dana Point!  Our hotel definitely offers a beach house vibe with bright natural light, cool ocean breezes, close Dohney Beach access and our phenomenal roof top lounge.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and certainly look forward to your return visit in the future.

Summary Heading: Double Tree Hotel Danapoint,Ca Longboard Bar
Summary: Had a great visit to the Bar in the hotel.. I visited the hotel to celebrate  St Patty's day and had a awesome  time.  The wait staff was superb in particular Edgar who was very attentive to our party and ensure that our food and drinks were perfect. He should be commended for his attention to detail in getting the drink orders correct with so many drink change ups thrown at him from our party. I would definitely recommend making a stop at the roof top bar with it's great view of surfers in Danapoint harbor.. Thanks Edgar for a great visit .. We will be back for your awesome Jalepenos Margaritas that your mixed for us.
Manager Response: Dear TravelingdudeCa,  Thank you so very much for your rave review of our Longboard rooftop lounge here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  We could not agree more that everyone needs to stop by and check it out while in town and we will also recognize our all star associate as a result of your shout out for the top notch service that was provided.

Summary Heading: 3rd floor room smelled musty and there is no micro wave in the room.
Summary: The location is between the freeway and a major road. The beech is across the street. The staff is very helpful and always pleasant. They did a great job of making feel welcomed. The roof top bar had a great view and there is a patio with a view of the beech on the 4th floor, but the freeway noise is very loud.
Manager Response: Dear 156randym,  Please accept our most sincere apologies the air conditioning was not on when you entered the room creating an unfavorable first impression due to the minimal air circulation.    We are glad you enjoyed our spectacular ocean views and Longboard rooftop lounge during your visit and certainly value you sharing your experience with us.  Thank you for being a valued guest at the Doubletree Dana Point

Summary: When we arrived, at first there seemed to be a problem. I was assured that our reservation was there, but there was an issue with the room. Apparently it had been given to another guest earlier in the day. However, never once did I feel like we were going to get screwed. The front desk immediately upgraded our room, and made sure we were ok with the room. Everyone was so friendly the entire time and the entire hotel was clean and well cared for. Our visit was due to a funeral, but our stay was so comfortable, I never had to worry about the accommodations and was able to focus on our family!
Manager Response: Dear Coastal,  We are thrilled the front desk was able to upgrade you during your recent visit and were extremely satisfied with your overall experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us

Summary: Visited Dana Point for my boyfriends birthday and the hotel was wonderful! Everyone was extremely friendly and pleasant to talk to.  Jac, the night auditor/front desk agent was amazing at check in! She made sure we got the room we wanted and was extremely nice. Hooked it up with the double tree cookies! Edgar, Louis, and Luis at the roof top bar were also amazing! They took great care of my boyfriend for his birthday and always gave great advice on where we should eat/visit while in town.  I highly recommend this location and will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear brennnnnnna,  Our team is over the moon that we were able to deliver a best in class birthday celebration weekend and will be sure to recognize our all star associates as a result of your feedback.  Thank you so very much for recommending the Doubletree Dana Point and we look forward to your next visit back to Orange County.

Summary: Went to the hotel this week for a meeting and was pleasantly surprised!  The rooms were great and everyone was very friendly.  We spent some time outside on the 4th floor bar & lounge and had the pleasure of being weighted on by Edgar.  He took great care of us, even though it was his first day on the job!  Well done Edgar, look forward to visiting again soon!
Manager Response: Dear Blondtigr,  You are absolutely positively correct about the Doubletree Dana Point and our Longboard roof top lounge being the best kept secrets in Orange County!  We pride ourselves on delivering friendly authentic hospitality, offering magnificent ocean views and thrilled you were able to experience that for yourself during your recent visit.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to your return visit in the future.

Summary: Loved the room, the roof top bar.  This was my families first ever trip to Cali.  Walking to the beach and Marina is easy.  Views from rooms and the roof top patios on the top floor are awsome!  We enjoyed our stay at the Doubletree Dana Point.
Manager Response: Dear 882joels,  That is absolutely awesome to hear your first family vacation to Cali was a memorable one and that you enjoyed everything the incredible city of Dana Point has to offer!  Our goal is for all guests to "arrive as visitors and leave as locals"  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and truly appreciate you staying at the Doubletree Dana Point

Summary Heading: there are better places to stay than this
Summary: I have stayed a lot of Hilton properties and The Doubletree at Dana Point is unique. If you are planning on staying in the area I highly recommend avoiding this hotel. I am a Hilton Honor’s Diamond member and I usually get some level of appreciation for that status. Not here. I was not greeted as an Honors member, and I had to show the desk clerk my Hilton Honors number before I was entitled to their continental breakfast. I had to ask for my free water and was not offered a room on the Hilton Honors floor (on a cold winter Thursday when they were practically empty).  I have always received a full breakfast, but here it was an additional charge to get any hot items. Be forewarned – parking is $29 per night. The rooms are remodeled, which is nice, save for a tight bathroom, but
Manager Response: Dear Jay N,  Our leadership team is genuinely discouraged and apologize your Diamond member status was not immediately recognized during your recent visit.   We also wanted to inform you that when you make a reservation with a third party booking channel and not directly through the hotel, it is impossible for us to know your Honors status until you actually arrive at the hotel.   We certainly value your loyalty status to the Hilton family of brands and glad we were able to clear up your misunderstanding that you encountered from when you initially made your reservation.

Summary Heading: Noisy and confusing; ask for upgrade if you are eligible
Summary: Disappointed in my stay here. Multi-year Diamond that booked a stay with parking rate, to a standard room the night before stay (2/28). Upon checking, told that my parking was free, which seemed confusing because may rate included  $22 extra for it than the available rate without parking.  With plenty of inventory available (per website booking), I would have thought that they would have upgraded me to at least a room away from the highway and maybe even a water view.  Nope.  Guess this is one of those hotels where you have to pester them for an upgrade if available, which one clearly was.    Rooms were nice and clean, but the highway side is very noisy.  They were kind enough to give me a room on the top floor, which is precisely level with the highway and noise.  Hope it
Manager Response: Dear mdaecher,  We definitely value and appreciate your Diamond status and continued loyalty to the Hilton family of brands over the years and truly apologize you did experience that during your visit with us.  Our team will certainly utilize your feedback as a training opportunity to learn from moving forward and can assure you this is not the norm here for our hotel.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to assist us in improving the overall guest experience and certainly hope you will consider staying with us again on a future visit.

Summary: I just returned from a 4-night stay here.  It was my first trip to California and, Michael, Randi, Jac, Louis, Jacqueline, Michelle, Luis, Cheryl and Gloria made it that much more memorable.  Their patience and attentiveness was exquisite.  The valet guys were super helpful and friendly as well.  I would absolutely stay at this property again for my future trips!  You guys are the best!!
Manager Response: Dear lulabell219,  We are definitely overwhelmed with gratitude to be a part of your first ever trip to California and Orange County here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We will certainly recognize and share your rave review with our all star associates as a result of your feedback and glowing endorsement of the above and beyond service you received while at our hotel.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and certainly hope to be your host hotel on your next trip back to The Golden State.

Summary: Our group hosted a weekend conference here. The service provided by Jayna, Michael, Taylor, Joshua, Randi, and Julia was incredible. They were friendly, helpful, professional, and accommodating to all of our needs. We had some members who had strict dietary needs and the staff accommodated them quickly and easily. We were made to feel right at home. The location is great as well. There is a beautiful rooftop bar to watch the sunsets and it's an easy walk across the street to the sand. I'd highly recommend the Doubletree at Dana Point!
Manager Response: Dear CLS O,  Our team certainly enjoyed hosting your conference over the weekend and definitely agree we have the best meeting and events team in the hospitality industry right here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for mentioning all of the amazing attributes that make our hotel special from our fantastic associates to our phenomenal location by the Pacific Ocean.  We certainly hope to have the opportunity to host another meeting for your group in the future.

Summary Heading: Great place to host a wedding block!
Summary: We used the DoubleTree as our main landing pad for our entire wedding weekend. We worked with Jayna and she went above and beyond to make sure that all of our guests had rooms close to one another, that they were able to extend their stay as needed, and she made sure that my husband and I had everything we needed to ensure a smooth wedding day and night. All of the rooms were new and renovated and most of our guests were able to stay on the same floor as we were! Following the event, Jayna reached out to us, personally, to ensure that all of our needs were met. I highly recommend this hotel to any bride looking for a fun "home- base" for the weekend!
Manager Response: Dear Lindsay H,  CONGRATULATIONS on your recent marriage and we are absolutely ecstatic our team provided such authentic hospitality over the weekend that you will forever cherish.  Thank you so very much for sharing such a special occasion with us and wish you and your family a lifetime of happiness.

Summary: We booked a last minute conference here when snow kept us from the mountains (our group holds events around the country). This was one of the most excellent and attentive staffs we have ever encountered. Randi, Josh, Michael, Julia, and Taylor all made us feel at home and went above and beyond. We highly recommend the staff and the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear David N,  We enjoyed every bit of our time together and grateful we were able to make your conference a success.  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement of the Doubletree Dana Point and the sentiment was definitely mutual.    We certainly hope to have the pleasure of continuing our established partnership well into the future!

Summary: Went there for Valentine's Day weekend. Heated pool,  great service and the front desk staff are amazing. We plan to stay here again during summer for the beach is just across the street and view from the hotel is inspiring.
Manager Response: Good Day to you ChristopherA,  It sounds like you had an enjoyable weekend with us here at the Doubletree Dana Point and appreciate you staying with us although our team is a bit confused with the one bubble rating since it tells a different story?  Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Wedding Rehearsal Dinner with DoubleTree Events and Catering Team
Summary: We rented the venue for our rehearsal dinner and had a fabulous time (Headlands Room downstairs)!  It was an absolute pleasure working with Jayna Prest, the Social Sales and Catering Manager. She was prompt and always returned my calls and emails quickly and with great information. The catering team, Jacqueline and Michael, the Banquet Captain, were both wonderful to us, they never let our wine glasses get low and kept the room immaculate. The food was delicious and tiramisu was one of the best I've had.  Following the dinner we went up to the rooftop for drinks and it was beautiful. Perfect area for guests to enjoy the view and the fire pits kept us warm.  Thank you to the Double Tree for making our wedding weekend so special.
Manager Response: Dear jckpu,  It was an absolute honor and privilege for our entire hotel team to be a part of your wedding weekend here at the Doubletree Dana Point and elated to hear you enjoyed all of the amazing attributes our hotel has to offer.  Thank you so very much for your kind words and wish you and your family a lifetime of happiness!

Summary: GPS navigational tools will get you here and you will have to see it to believe it. Walk to beach, but why leave the property. They will feed and pamper you!  Plenty of outdoor dining and lounging areas.
Manager Response: Dear carolecmem,  Our team genuinely appreciates your five bubble review and elated you were able to experience the authentic hospitality here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  While the magnificent ocean and  Doheny Beach views are usually the main attraction, you are absolutely right there is no reason to leave the hotel with our Longboard our rooftop lounge and Sunset Deck available to all guests.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Truly amazing place to visit and stay Dana Point as is San Juan Capistrano, the locals make everyone feel very welcome and the weather and outdoor activities are many,  for adults and children alike  fun for all
Manager Response: Dear Frances W,  That is absolutely spectacular you noticed Dana Point's "Come as a visitor, leave as a local" vibe during your time spent with us at your new favorite beach house here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and being a raving fan of our hotel.

Summary Heading: Day at work in Dana Point
Summary: Service was excellent rooms are very clean and comfortable. If you are lucky enough to get a ocean view enjoy the view its spectacular. had dinner at the Doheny surf restaurant which was excellent. Had a good night sleep.
Manager Response: Dear carlp757,  You certainly acknowledged all of the amazing attributes that makes the Doubletree Dana Point the ideal hotel to stay at when visiting Orange County!  Thank you so very much for letting us know our team exceeded your expectations and sharing your overall experience with us.

Summary: Fabulous hotel staff is always welcoming - Its a great spot for business bec/ I feel at homeI love getting up and being able to walk on the beach before I head to the office  Beds are comfy and the food in the restaurant is good and you cant beat the sunset view from the rooftop lounge
Manager Response: Dear Mlannap,  We genuinely appreciate your glowing endorsement of the Doubletree Dana Point and elated you enjoyed the best beach house in Orange County!  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and certainly look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit.

Summary: We came here because it was on my list of AMEX resorts that got a credit through my card. It was fantastic for the location. The breakfast at this doubletree was a lot less than the last one in San Francisco, but it was good overall. Not enough to complain about.
Manager Response: Dear George K,  We are certainly glad you discovered the Doubletree Dana Point utilizing your exclusive credit card perks and had quite the enjoyable time during your vacation with our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach!  Thank you so very much for taking your taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us.

Summary: This was a GREAT hotel for a wedding weekend!  We had a block of 12 rooms for my son's wedding in San Clemente earlier this month.  Everything about the Doubletree Dana Point was GREAT!!  From the initial dealings with Jayna the sales manager, to the front desk staff, to the restaurant/bar staff, to the location, the beach, the VIEWS, the food.  Our entire wedding party had a great time and will return!.  On the first of 3 nights we had a welcome party in the bride's suite, on the 2nd night a Longboard Rooftop happy hour for 30 guests.  Michael from Doheny Surf was so GREAT in helping us with party platters — super helpful and easy to work with.   All the guests raved about the location, the rooftop view, the pricing, etc.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear ioncley,  We certainly enjoyed being part of such a momentous family occasion during the wedding weekend and thrilled great times were had by all here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Our Longboard rooftop lounge is certainly the hot spot to be and genuinely appreciate your glowing endorsement of our amazing associates and the phenomenal location we have to offer.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and look forward to welcoming you back to your new favorite Orange County beach house!

Summary: Staff was great both at check in, during stay, and check out. Each time I encountered a staff member they were very friendly and greeted me. Room was very clean ad although room faced the train tracks/freeway...NO NOISE! Great walking location from beach.
Manager Response: Dear Gabs951,  Our hotel mission is to be the cleanest and friendliest hotel in Orange County and ecstatic our team was able to deliver on all aspects during your recent stay at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for you five bubble endorsement of our hotel and taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: Just stayed at the DoubleTree for a week. Was upgraded at check in to a ocean view. All the staff were great and very friendly. The valet guys were great and very helpful with my bags and getting my car when I had to run out. Great location very quiet place.   Had breakfast almost everyday in the hotel. They had a breakfast buffet most doubletree are free for gold members but here to get a hot breakfast was a $8 charge, not sure what the non gold member price was. One good thing was the up charge included omelette also.   Will be back next month and looking forward to it.
Manager Response: Dear williamh,  Absolutely amazing to hear you enjoyed the ocean views and friendly guest service from our team members during your recent stay at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for being a loyal Hilton Honors member and our team is already looking forward to your return visit next month!

Summary: This is a beautiful location.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  The view is beautiful, the rooms are super clean.  The complimentary internet was great.  The restaurant has many options and is responsibly priced.Enjoyed Dana Point and my stay here!
Manager Response: Dear Culture,  Thank you so very much for sharing your phenomenal experience with us here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We are absolutely elated you enjoyed all aspects of our hotel and the local area.  Our team looks forward to welcoming you back to your new favorite beach house on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary: Hotel stay was good. Check in was probably the hardest. Long line. Lots of fussy people, but not the hotels fault obviously. Maybe could have greeter/refreshments. Was a bit stuffy. Other than that our stay was really lovely. We have a beautiful time.
Manager Response: Dear Jet,  Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and thrilled you enjoyed your stay at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We certainly look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit.

Summary: First let me start with how wonderful some of the front desk staff was and the valet staff was really great. And the beach is right across the street. Luckily we had such a fun time this weekend we were able to over look the lack of housekeeping. We kept finding long pieces of hair on towels, the bed and floor and the tub never got cleaned and you’ll see why. I wouldn’t want to try to clean that either. Once you look through the pictures you’ll totally understand why this remodel was just a clean what you can see and leave the rest like it was.  We stayed here when they were remodeling and they had all the design boards up of what it was going to look like and how beautiful it was going to be. They seriously slapped so make up on her and called good.
Manager Response: Dear algessner,  Thank you so very much for being a repeat guest at the Doubletree Dana Point and our team is troubled you did not find value in the $8 million hotel renovation that was completed in 2016.  We will certainly share your feedback with our housekeeping team and truly appreciate you sharing your observations so we can continually improve the guest experience moving forward.

Summary Heading: Old creepy hotel in bad need of a refurb.
Summary: A 2 star hotel masquerading as a 4 star. Plumbing issues in first room. Air cond broke in second. No one wants to move twice on a week's vacay. Staff was great and tried their best, but the hotel was busy and there was only so much they could do. Dana Point is ok, but not a lot to do. You'll find yourself driving everywhere. Stay in Laguna instead.
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa,  As with all things life, beauty is in the eye of the beholder and our sincere apologies we were not able to exceed your expectations during your recent visit.  We appreciate you acknowledging our incredible associates for the authentic hospitality they provide to all guests that stay with us.  It doesn't sound like you gave the City of Dana Point much of a chance or explore the area like a local.  We are certainly not attempting to compete with the traffic congestion and parking hassles of Laguna Beach that makes Dana Point a much more convenient destination.  Thanks so much for staying with us and taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: Fantastic staff, clean and quiet. Great restaurants. Great views. Intimate and friendly. Good size rooms. Would recommend in a heart beat. Across form the beach. Easy access to close by attractions in Laguna and Dana Point.
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip,  We truly appreciate your kind words regarding your new favorite beach house spot here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and glowing endorsement of our phenomenal location and friendly associates.

Summary Heading: Can you imagine, while out at dinner someone seemed to have entered the hotel room.
Summary: We came back after dinner and found chewing gum on the desk that was placed on the paper glass cover.  It was either put there by a previous guest or by housekeeping.  No matter what the reason, the thought of using a glass were chewing gum was left on the lid by someone on the glass that I just used is disgusting.  I have never felt concerned that someone had been in the room but this property really freaked me out.  BUT the worst part of the stay was waking up to a jack hammer on the the wall behind the beds before 8am.  I had a horrible night trying to fall asleep because of the gum issue, but to then be jolted out of bed early in the morning after expecting a relaxing resort experience, it was a disaster.  I specifically selected this hotel to have a restful and luxurious
Manager Response: Dear klechner,  Words cannot even begin to explain our concern regarding your perception of our hotel and can assure you this was an isolated incident.    As the hotel team immediately investigated the next morning and communicated with you, no other individuals other than the guest rooms keys assigned to you at the front desk were utilized to access the room while you were out at dinner.  The safety and security of all guests at our hotel is of the utmost importance and a responsibility our team takes extremely seriously.  We would also like to inform you there was no construction or maintenance projects scheduled at any point in time during your visit and genuinely apologize we did not exceed your expectations during your stay.

Summary: The staff are really friendly and hospitable here, they make you feel extremely welcome and go over and above. Jac is fantastic and can run the front desk so professionally. Micheal the manager is on top of his game. The property is an old restored boutique hotel and is showing some wear in the bathrooms however the beds are heavenly. I would book again in a minute. My only true negative is the parking fee is a whopping $30, not acceptable for a hotel in this location.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beds are crap, customer service is great. $30 nightly parking.
Summary: Good location to access Dana Point and if u want to avoid the rat race of Laguna Beach. Plenty of restaurants within 5-10min drive. Can't really walk too much due to hills and quirky location off the highway.  Yes, its clean but damn, we're in the Hilton section of the hotel and these beds SUCK. Stiff with huge neck breaking pillows. Dont even bother trying the sofa hide-a-bed, you will be paralyzed. I tried it.  Metro link trains whip by on the hour, not too loud but definitely noticable, so if ur a light sleeper it may be an issue.  It's between two highways, again, road noise.  It huge issue. The staff on 4th floor lounge are great. Hotel desk clerk and cleaning staff are all competent. But if it's cold out, forget sitting at any outdoor lounge, the gas heaters are puny and
Manager Response: Dear 964ea,  We are certainly glad to hear you enjoyed all of your positive guest service interactions with our all star team members throughout the hotel.  We are troubled to learn our guest room beds and pillows were not to your exact liking and our team could have moved you to a different room or delivered less firm pillows upon request.  We certainly agree that Dana Point is a million times better alternative to the Laguna Beach chaos and our location certainly can't be beat!  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and hope to welcome you back on a future visit.

Summary Heading: IF YOU ABIDE BY RULES AND VALUE SLEEP DON'T STAY HERE!
Summary: Staff allowed super noisy people to stay in the pool after 11:00 P.M.  even though the pool closes at 9:00  P.M. I asked the front desk to intervene 2 times, but they obviously never did. The noisy crowd did not leave until well after midnight. Also, the tub did not drain and filled with water every time I took a shower.  Water was warm-never hot. I will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear tranquilsurfer,  Please accept our sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with your recent visit and that other registered guests gave you an unfavorable impression of our hotel.  Our team certainly monitors the pool area throughout the night and do their very best to appease all guests so everyone can enjoy their experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Thank you for sharing your valuable feedback with us, it is truly appreciated.

Summary: Stayed at the Double Tree after a house fire. It was a very stressful time. We can't thank the staff enough for the care and kindness they extended to us. It made a difficult time, more bearable.   The staff did a great job in so many ways! They make this property a winner.   We received a warm welcome our first night, from Trevor. He found a nice room for us with a good view. Jaq's upbeat personality and great sense of humor lightened our mood.  During our stay, we spent time at the roof top bar. Beautiful views of the Pacific. Good conversation, and service from Melanie. The Shepard's Pie was yummy. Also enjoyed watching the sun set from the roof top patio, facing Doheny.
