Wonderful, unobstructed view. Room service was terrific; Randi B. was a stand out. She provided great
Manager Response: Dear TravelPal901,  We are truly humbled by your kind words for the amazing team we are so fortunate to have here at the Doubletree Dana Point and will be sure to recognize all of them as a result of your review.  While we are apologetic for the circumstances that initially brought you to our hotel, we are pleased to hear we were able to provide a comfortable home away from home during your stay with us.  Thanks so much for recommending us to your friends and family and hope to have the opportunity to visit again in the future.

Summary: We stayed here the 3 days after Christmas and will never stay here again. Let me start off by saying that the staff are amazing. Now the hotel is falling apart. The garage (that cost $25 a night to use) was flooded multiple times. Plus we could only park in one of the first stall with our mini van and roof rack as the space is tight. One day while there a pipe broke and we had no water for more than half the day. The bathroom was disgusting as the sink had more hard water deposits than I have ever seen along with the shower door was barely hanging on. One of the couch seats had a iron mark burned in and the other fusion has been torn. The AC/Heat kept Turing on and off even though we turned it off. Don't book a partial ocean view as we got the back of the hotel next to the train
Manager Response: Dear cshahan,  Our most sincere apologies we were not able to meet your expectations during your recent visit.  As you mentioned the fee for parking guarantees all guests will have a place to park and if it is too challenging for guests we encourage everyone to utilize our valet parking services for the exact same price and leave the hassle to the professionals.  During rain falls in Orange County typically result in large puddles that are slow to drain and our parking garage is no exception as all of the wet cars will bring water into the garage and will eventually drain over time.  We  will certainly share your comments with our housekeeping team and utilize it as training opportunity to provide a better guest experience moving forward.   Thanks so much for providing us with your valuable feedback, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: Wonderful, cozy boutique hotel with a cute rooftop bar overlooking the beautiful Pacific Ocean. Staff was incredibly kind and helpful. Extra shout out to Evan and Louis.  Thank you for a wonderful couple of days.
Manager Response: Dear Cornelia,  We are absolutely elated you enjoyed our boutique beach house hotel and especially our Longboard rooftop lounge.  Thank you so very much for you five bubble review and certainly hope to visit with you again in the very near future!

Summary: The first day we were there was great.  Unfortunately, the second night and day were not.  There was a lot of noise in the hallway and our next door neighbors.  Then there was no running water and nothing was offered as compensation!
Manager Response: Dear Escape06999937046,  Our most sincere apologies the guests in the surrounding rooms created a disturbance that impacted your overall experience during your recent visit.  We certainly do our very best during our frequent hotel property walks to monitor noise levels and encourage all guests to report disturbances to the front desk as they occur.  Unfortunately we had to conduct an unplanned emergency plumbing repair due to unforeseen circumstances one morning during your visit that took less than five hours to complete and am truly sorry for the inconvenience.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest at the Doubletree Dana Point and for sharing your feedback as it allows us the opportunity to improve the guest experience moving forward.

Summary Heading: Quick get away in Dana Point
Summary: Stayed for two nights and enjoyed the great access to the ocean - right across the street.  Room was large and had a sitting room and big bathroom.  Two balconies with views of the sunset and sunrises.  Loved the rooftop lounge.  Restaurant was staffed with friendly people and food was excellent.  Would definitely recommend to all and would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear DebbieA1308,  The Doubletree Dana Point is definitely the ideal hot spot for "quick get away" trips and Staycations here in So Cal!  Conveniently located half way between San Diego, LA, only 33 miles to Disneyland and by far the easiest beach  access right off the 5 Freeway compared to any other beach city up and down the coast.  We are elated you enjoyed our phenomenal beach and ocean views from our Longboard rooftop lounge, it is definitely something everyone needs to experience on a regular basis for evening sunsets.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: Enjoying our stay tremendously... View is wonderful... Staff was wonderful.. Kitchen staff went above and beyond everytime we were in to eat Jacqueline, randi, and suzy really made our time there wonderful with there wonderful service.. Making our vaction feel like a home away from home... Randi even took nice pics of us 😄
Manager Response: Dear Krystal T,  We certainly enjoyed spending the holiday week with you and elated you were able to experience the authentic hospitality provided by our incredible Doheny Surf Restaurant team!  Thank you so very much for sharing your gratitude for the above and beyond service you received while here at the Doubletree Dana Point and certainly looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary: Stayed with my family at this nicely located Doheny Beach for the Christmas holidays while visiting family. I've stayed at this hotel before and appreciated the remodel of the hotel. However, they removed the microwaves from the rooms which was very inconvenient and they charge $25.00 per night for parking. That's greedy
Manager Response: Dear Coastal 18871223345,  It was an absolute joy to spend the holidays with you and your family and truly appreciate you returning to the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our most sincere apologies our hotel parking arrangements impacted your overall guest experience during your recent visit.  However, ocean and beach side parking access will always be at a premium in all beach towns up and down Pacific Coast Hwy.  The parking fee is the same for both valet service and self parking and guarantees all guests will have a parking spot here at the hotel for their entire length of stay.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and certainly appreciate your sharing your feedback with us.

Summary: The wait staff at the restaurant on the ground floor -- Jacqueline, Gloria and Lisa -- went out of their way to be attentive and helpful.  We were especially impressed on the last day of our stay, when the number of people in our party kept growing, from four to six to eight.  Jacqueline, Gloria and Lisa teamed up to assemble a larger table, and then move it to an even more comfortable place, all the while keeping track of our food orders and people arrived in shifts.  They clearly understood that we were celebrating an important family gathering, and helped make it even more enjoyable.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear PaulSue625,  We are absolutely delighted you received such phenomenal top notch service from our restaurant team and will be sure to reward them for their authentic hospitality.  Thank you so very much for staying at the Doubletree Dana Point and wishing you all the best in 2019!

Summary: Our family experienced an emergency near Dana Point and we descended on the Doubletree Suites.   I would like to express my thankfulness to the staff  for their caring professionalism, especially Steven Walker during our time with them. The rooms were great, beds comfortable, and with the windows closed you could not hear the traffic.  We had a room facing the ocean and it was uplifting to see the beautiful view each day and relaxing to sit on the balcony.  Our event held at the Double tree was wonderful.  Thank you to Banquet Captain- Sergio Jimenez and his team for a job well done.
Manager Response: Dear onwardhoff,  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and glad our team here at the Doubletree Dana Point could assist making it a brighter day in every way possible during your visit.  We certainly hope you come back to visit us on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary: The hotel is close to the shore line and the rooms on the front have a great ocean view.  The staff were excellent too and very helpful, although the parking was a little expensive for location in my opinion.  If you are sensitive to noise get rooms with Ocean view as the rear part of the hotel is close to the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Wanderlushhhh,  We are absolutely elated you enjoyed the amazing ocean views and the excellent service from our associates here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: The only thing lacking was a jacuzzi,  Everything else was great.  Clean rooms, good beds, we got a great view of the ocean.  The staff was courteous and efficient, everyone friendly, near the harbor, close to go  see the boat light parade
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip27009693540,  Awesome news to hear you thoroughly enjoyed our ocean view suites as well as the clean and friendly authentic hospitality from our associates here at Doubletree Doheny Beach.  Tis definitely the season to visit Dana Point to view and take a stroll through the spectacular holiday light display all throughout the gorgeous harbor and sit by the fire pits at the hotel upon your return.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and happy holidays!

Summary Heading: Diamond Members charged for mediocre breakfast
Summary: As HHONORS Diamond Elite Member I was upgraded to a larger room which was unfortunately on the side of the highway and therefore very noisy (sleep quality was therefore poor). The worst about this hotel is the breakfast. The breakfast is not only very poor (only toast - so do not expect any fresh bread!) but even worse if you want to eat some scrambled eggs, they charge you an extra 8 us$ for a so-called breakfast upgrade (even as Diamond Elite Member!) which is not worth the money. Totally unacceptable, I have never been treated like this at any Hilton hotels worldwide (most offering an extensive breakfast buffet with lot of choice - not the case at this hotel!). Parking is also charged at this hotel. On the positive side the roof top bar has nice sunset views.
Manager Response: Dear Vincent D,  Please accept our most sincere apologies the best available suite you were upgraded to resulted in a less than exceptional night's sleep during your recent visit us.  We truly understand the importance of delivering a peaceful night's rest and equally disappointed that we were not able to deliver a best in class experience.  We assure you that our hotel certainly values your loyalty to the Hilton family of brands and that we are in full compliance in delivering the loyalty rewards program benefits offered to all of our Diamond Elite Members.  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and genuinely appreciate your feedback.

Summary: i spend several weeks a month at the Double Tree Suites Doheny Beach. The staff is wonderful, helpful and friendly. have a lot of interaction (daily) with Banquet Captain - Sergio Jimenez. Sergio is one of the friendliest, and most helpful people i have had the pleasure of working with. Each morning he greets me and my peers with a smiling face and warm "Good Morning". I really appreciate his attention to our program and willingness to go above and beyond to make sure we have all the necessary material, equipment and banquet items (coffee, cookies, ETC.) Sergio keeps everyone happy.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff M,  We certainly enjoy hosting you and your peers and consider you part of the Doubletree Dana Point family for as much time as you spend with us throughout the year.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us.

Summary: I stayed at the Dana Point Double Tree for 3 separate weeks over the past few months for a training class. I wast absolutely impressed with the staff! Every employee I came into contact with from the manager, to the cleaning staff, to the restaurant servers were warm, sincere, and extremely dedicated to providing me the best experience during my stay. I admit I was initially a handful when I checked in (my apologies 😀) and Erin was so kind and patient with me. I had some random requests and she completely accommodated me and never once showed any annoyance with me.... Which she had every right to do. And my favorite server Jacqueline was the BEST! She was extremely attentive and I could immediately tell she sincerely cared about providing me the best dining experience. She even
Manager Response: Dear Jambaggs,  We are absolutely ecstatic to have the privilege of being your first ever hotel Trip Advisor review and knowing the profound impact the authentic hospitality provided by our associates had on you and your other colleagues.  Thank you so very much for your rave review and glowing endorsement of the Doubletree Dana Point!

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay, Wonderful Location and Amazing Staff
Summary: Had a wonderful stay at this hotel. From the moment we saw the super cute "beachy" themed rooms, to the beautiful rooftop bar overlooking the ocean, we knew we had picked a great hotel.  Randi at the restaurant took amazing care of my boyfriend and I, going above and beyond to make us feel welcome :) We then went upstairs for drinks where the great service continued! Evan made us some great cocktails while giving us some wonderful advice of places and things to see while we were in the area. Unfortunately we only stayed one night, but we would definitely return! Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Dear Kimberley T,  We are thrilled you enjoyed your new favorite beach house here at the Doubletree Dana Point and had such positive guest service interactions with our all star associates.  Our team genuinely appreciates your five bubble review and sharing your overall experience with us.

Summary: We were near good restaurants and the harbor for a wine tasting on a boat. The location is near the beach but it doesn't have beach prices. The roof top bar is really nice. We had a catered luncheon for a business meeting and it was outstanding. The food was not meeting food it was 5 star restaurant quality.the location is tough to get to because of the way you have to enter it off of a very busy street. You may miss it and end up circling around again.
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip617688,  It certainly sounds like you had a marvelous time exploring everything Dana Point has to offer during your recent stay with us.  We are pleased you found our hotel such a great value given our close proximity to the beach and will definitely share your raving food review with our talented culinary team.  Thank you so very much for being a fan of the Doubletree Dana Point and look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit to South Orange County!

Summary: Our church group just had our Thanksgiving Retreat last week and we had a great time there.  The location which is walking distant to the beach is so convenient.  The bike rental that the hotel provides makes it all the more fun.  The balcony on the fourth floor overlooking the ocean is simply breath-taking.  The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.  The conference room given was just perfect for the size of our group and we really appreciated the hotel for giving some of our older members rooms adjacent to the conference room and the dining hall, so they didn't have to walk far.  The food was great, not only was it well-prepared but also of good quality.  The service, under the supervision of banquet director Mr. Sergio Caprain, was just superb.  Everybody was so
Manager Response: Dear Paul G,  It was an absolute pleasure spending Thanksgiving weekend with you and your church retreat group here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Our team is thrilled you enjoyed our close proximity to Doheny Beach, spacious guestroom suites and the especially the fact that our associates were able to make this the best retreat ever for your church group.  We certainly hope to spend many more Thanksgivings together with your group in the future.

Summary Heading: "The Banquets, service and Foods are superb,spacious rooms and friendly staff members"
Summary: Sergio our Banquet Captain took care of our large group needs to the details. From start to finished our experience were superb from all staff members. Thank you Jayna, Sergio, Ramero and our best Chef for DoubleTree Dana Point. You guys service and attention to detail more than what our group expected. We couldn't asked for a better experience for our Event. Thank you from the bottom of our heart.
Manager Response: Dear BigGroupM,  Thank you so very much for hosting your recent banquet event with us and delighted you had a superb experience with our all star meeting and events team here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We certainly hope to have the opportunity to host your event again in the future and wish you a happy holiday season.

Summary: This hotel has easy access to the beach. It's a family friendly and dog-friendly place. The staff is friendly, welcoming, and accommodating. The rooms are spacious and clean. We enjoyed our stay over the long Thanksgiving weekend.
Manager Response: Dear ClaireH4323,  We genuinely enjoyed spending the Thanksgiving holiday weekend with you and absolutely elated you had a phenomenal experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: I couldn't have asked for a better experience!
Summary: We got married down the street at the Dana Point Yacht Club last month. We needed a hotel close by that we could recommend to our guests. Boy did we get lucky coming across the Doubletree! My contact person was Jayna Prest. She was amazing!! She responded to all of my emails in a timely fashion and was so helpful organizing our 10 plus rooms that we reserved. She followed up with each guest and made sure they had the rooms that they needed. We also requested 2 rooms to be adjoining as well as an early check in. She helped facilitate both those requests. We showed up on our check in day to the friendliest people at the front desk. It did not hurt getting warm chocolate chip cookies handed to us! But the biggest surprise of them all was finding out they gave us a beautiful suite
Manager Response: Dear brownietravels2,  It was an absolute honor and privilege to be a part of such a momentous life occasion along the way and during your wedding weekend!  The Doubletree Dana Point is definitely the ideal full service wedding venue with our professional and experienced wedding planners there with you every step along the way.  Thank you so very much for sharing your wedding experience with us and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back on your wedding anniversaries in the future.

Summary: I was never addressed as a Hilton Honors member. The room I was given was on the side of the freeway so there was noise ALL NIGHT LONG!!  The cleaning crew starting knocking on our door at 8 a.m. and every 45 mins there after.  This was awful!  Upon checkout the young lady never said hi, didn't ask how was my stay or anything of the sort.  She simply asked did I want a copy of my bill.
Manager Response: Dear Culture47122,  Please accept our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations during your recent visit with us and the service encounters you experienced.  We offer multiple different suite types and assure you our signature view room suites do not disappoint.  We will certainly address the morning disruption with our housekeeping team and we encourage all guests to utilize the "do not disturb" notifications provided in each suite to avoid unwanted disturbances.  Thank you for your continued loyalty to the Hilton brand and truly appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Summary: Great location, clean, comfortable, good food options.  Just a short walk to the beach.  Acceptable walking distance from the harbor for shopping or other dining. Wonderful staff, friendly and professional.  Overall wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Dear Culture50513236373,  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and it truly makes our day knowing you had an exceptional vacation here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We genuinely appreciate you sharing your experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Breakfast vouchers misleading. Told mandatory 2  tonight stays for Saturday night Holy to see another couple book just Saturday night.  Bell hops made us get our own cart, Od and unload our own luggage and return the cart.Only good thing was the location and virw.
Manager Response: Dear LightPacker585550,  Please accept our most sincere apologies for the service shortfalls you experienced during your recent visit and can assure you this was an isolated encounter with our team.  Our goal is to provide a best in class guest experience and disappointed your overall stay with us was impacted as a result of us not delivering on that promise.  Thank you so very much for providing us with your valuable feedback and will certainly utilize it as a training opportunity for our entire hotel team to improve our guest experience moving forward.

Summary Heading: Great place by the beach - Awesome staff
Summary: This hotel does not look like a Double Tree Hotel but rather an old style motel by the beach with Blue and white paint and an understated entrance. However, it has personality and it knows how to make a guest feel welcome. Jac at the front desk was a gem, extremely helpful and a wealth of knowledge on local attractions and restaurants. The rooms are well appointed (small bathrooms but nice balconies). Rooftop bar with plenty of room to enjoy a drink while watching the sunset.  A reasonably priced hotel with character.
Manager Response: Dear T575M4serra,  You are 110% correct, we are definitely not my grandparents Doubletree here in beautiful Dana Point-Orange County!  Our hotel personality is a beach house vibe offering both charm and character to all of our welcomed guests to enjoy gorgeous sunsets over the Pacific.  Thank you so very much for visiting with us and certainly look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit.

Summary Heading: Great location across the street from the beach.
Summary: Stayed 3 nights and had a wonderful, relaxing time for a wedding we attended in Dana Point. The staff was excellent and Robert the young valet was on point for us. He went above and beyond to make sure our bags were taken care of, the car ready in minutes and so helpful suggesting please to check out. So was the Jack the female night clerk. Those two helped us find so many good places to check out while there. To the hotel mgmt, those two staff people are keepers, they make your hotel shine.
Manager Response: Dear Thebigbandwolf,  What a phenomenal review to receive and elated to hear you enjoyed your relaxing weekend here in Orange County's best hidden gem city, Dana Point!  We genuinely appreciate you acknowledging our rock star associates and we are so very fortunate to have some of the best in the business here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and certainly hope to visit with you again in the near future.

Summary: Excellent place to stay with Great views of the ocean. Check in was a smooth process. The roof top bar area was nice as well because you can see the sun set over the ocean. Definitely will have another trip and stay here.
Manager Response: Well said RN6219 and we could not agree with you more!  Our AMAZING panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean and Doheny Beach makes us one of the most popular spots to visit in Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and we look forward to hanging out with you again on your next vacation here at the Doubletree Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Double Tree Suites Doheny Beach Dana Point
Summary: I have stayed at this Double Tree twice now, once I discovered it. Each staff member I have encountered has been friendly, professional and courteous. In particular, my experiences in the restaurant and rooftop bar have been exceptional. My server, Evan, worked with me to meet my dietary needs and to ensure my experience was exceptional. Also, Michael, who I think is the manager of the restaurant, made sure I was satisfied and comfortable with my dining experience. And even better, they remembered me upon my return trip which, when one travels a lot, is really nice. Front desk staff have also been very courteous and helpful - as well as the valet attendants. I will continue to stay at the Double Tree Doheny Beach and appreciate the kind and excellent service I have received. I
Manager Response: Dear Vacation30093673828,  We are forever grateful for your loyalty and especially referring your colleagues to us here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for your kind words about our incredible associates and we will be sure to recognize them for providing the authentic hospitality you deserve during your travels.  Our team looks forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County

Summary: The DoubleTree, like many of the Hilton properties I've stayed in recently are adequate, but in need of upgrading.  Since I arrived late, I ate in the Hotel's restaurant and had a $17 poke bowl, it tasted good and was quite filling.  My room had a sitting area but the space with the two double beds was quite tight and one of the beds was sort of a tripping hazard for middle of the night trips to the bathroom. The hotel was fine for purposes of my limited stay.  I would not stay there for a longer period or if I was there with family for a vacation.
Manager Response: Dear Wkins,  Thank you so very much for being a recent guest at the Doubletree Dana Point and thrilled you enjoyed Chef Manny's delicious poke bowl that is extremely popular with the locals.  Our goal is to provide best in class accommodations and authentic hospitality to all of our guests and saddened to hear we did not exceed your expectations during your visit.  We genuinely appreciate your feedback and taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: We checked in late and they were very friendly . The room was great and always clean . A little noise next door from a family that doesn't get along , but we mentioned it and the hotel did their best to quell it . All - in -all it was a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Explore28671581007,  The team's mission here at the Doubletree Dana Point is to be the friendliest and cleanest hotel in Orange County and thrilled you were able to experience that authentic hospitality in action during your recent stay with us.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and certainly can't wait to welcome you back to your new favorite beach house on your next visit.

Summary: I thought the folks working at this hotel were very helpful and thoughtful, very nice people.    Now the hotel... it's a mess.   Rooms are small and very oddly decorated.  You better be under 100 pounds to squeeze into the shower.  My room had a large water stain on the ceiling along with several small stains. The workout room is a bit laughable.  I traveled 20 years for business and my hotels were mostly always Hiltons.  I only travel now for leisure and i sometimes use points as well as cash depending on hotel rates.  I'm never offered an upgrade from any Hilton hotel anymore. When I use points I always get some room that faces the garbage cans or parking lot. Years ago I use to stay at this Doubletree and always got a nice upgrade with a little ocean view.  I paid cash for
Manager Response: Dear BPG77,  Thank you so very much for your kind words regarding our incredible team members here at the Doubletree Dana Point and truly appreciate your loyalty to the Hilton brand over the years.  We are saddened to find out you were not a fan of our guest rooms and the overall view as both of these attributes vary by the room type selected during the reservation process.  Our team genuinely appreciates your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience during your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: Jayna Prest & Wesley Oplustic were amazing in helping to organize our event's room block.  They made it very easy to manage and all of the attendees were very happy with the accommodations and the location was perfect.
Manager Response: Dear sdouglas799,  We are thrilled you had such a positive experience with our sales team and enjoyed your event here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and look forward to hosting another event for you in the future.

Summary: I visited the Double Tree last Saturday 10/20 and had a nice stay. I stayed for one night with my family and visited some close friends in the area the following day and returned early enough for drinks. I was helped by Evan during my visit to the rooftop bar and was thrilled with the customer service provided! Evan was so helpful and answered all of my questions about the bar selection during my stay. I tried to ask a few questions to the other bartender in the area, I think her name was Michelle. She seemed too preoccupied to answer my questions and continued to walk past my chair and did not make eye contact with me when I was trying to ask her a question regarding the Doheny Sunrise. That's okay! She was probably too busy and didn't see me. Evan immediately came back to my
Manager Response: Dear killamm522,  AWESOME to hear you are a raving fan of our Longboard rooftop lounge and the signature cocktails we serve!  While the panoramic ocean views and sunsets are well worth the visit, we firmly believe that our all star team members truly create the memorable guest experiences here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and we look forward to hanging out with you again in the very near future.  CHEERS!

Summary: People here are great from the front desk to the restaurant and bar. The unparalleled view of the ocean from the rooftop bar gets matched perfectly with their propane heaters and fire after dark. The only thing that can beat the view is the people. The entire bar staff is excellent and I specifically have to mention Louis, Evan, Luis, and Sophie for always being kind and taking their time to take care of their customers.
Manager Response: Dear Matthew M,  While the view from our Longboard rooftop lounge is quite spectacular, we could not agree with you more that it is definitely the associates that truly create a memorable guest experience here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for visiting with us and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: From the valet parking attendants, to the front desk, to the rooftop bar, and the full service restaurant, everyone I’have met has been up beat and professional. I think they all must be proud of this hotel and their place in it. Special shout out to Evan Pugrad in the restaurant. He’s genuinely proud of his work and wants to share the good vibes with guests.
Manager Response: Dear Jana B,  This by far is one of the most rewarding reviews our team has ever received and we are over the moon you were able to experience the authentic hospitality vibes our incredible team provides to all of our valued guests.  Reading your review definitely made our day here at the Doubletree Dana Point and we will be sure to recognize all of the hotel department teams that were mentioned.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and certainly hope to see you again on your next visit to Dana Point!

Summary: I booked six rooms for my family and friends in this hotel.  All the staff are friendly and accommodating including the restaurant staff. Clean hotel and has some view of the ocean in front. Smaller rooms though.  Some of the rooms have the ugly view of the back and the freeway . This hotel should landscape the back, because some of the rooms has this view.  We had a discounted rate for my son’s wedding in a church nearby and this hotel is nearer.
Manager Response: Dear Marivic O,  We certainly value having you as our guest and hope your family friends had an amazing vacation here in beautiful Dana Point!  Our mission is to be the cleanest and friendliest hotel in Orange County and extremely pleased we were able to deliver on our promise during your visit.  Thank you so very much for your input and we definitely look forward to welcoming you back to the Doubletree Doheny Beach on a future visit.

Summary Heading: Where are the breath taking views?
Summary: We enjoyed the hotel and Dana Point but the room description is misleading.  The web site promised tranquility and breath taking views of the Pacific Ocean. Our first room had a view of parking.  Our second room looked out at the Pavific Coast Highway and a little ocean. We had great expectations and were very disappointed.  I would like to give a shout out to valet parking; they were very friendly and helpful.  Photos of our views attached.
Manager Response: Dear MonteRSh,  Our most sincere apologies as the ocean views from our guest room suites vary by room type booked during the reservation process and we are equally disappointed it impacted your overall visit with us.  We genuinely appreciate you sharing your experience and photos with us and certainly hope to have the opportunity to provide a better experience on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I wanted to drop a quick note to say Evan and Cheryl could not be more accommodating and friendly.  Old school customer service values,  I gave 4 stars to the property.  Decent place right on the beach but rooms are a little small for a suite.  Customer service and location are a 5 start and shout out the Cheryl and Evan who were All Stars in the bar/restaurant.   Jeff Litchfield Park, AZ
Manager Response: Dear jaherb66,  Thank you so very much for the shout out to our all star associates and we will be sure to recognize them as a result of your feedback.  We sincerely appreciate your four bubble review and truly value your business here at the Doubletree Dana Point.

Summary: This hotel has a great location right across the street from the ocean. The property is easy to get too and has access to shopping and food very close. Property is clean and staff is great. Id return.
Manager Response: Dear PTycz,  Our mission is to be the cleanest and friendliest hotel in Orange County and our team is elated you were able to experience our incredible location as well as the local Dana Point vibe during your recent stay with us.  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Doubletree Doheny Beach.

Summary: A nice hotel in good condition and just steps from the beach in San Juan Capistrano.  Access is challenging when first arriving but well signed on the roads adjacent to the hotel.  Amtrak train tracks run right behind the hotel but not that much traffic - probably 10-20 trains per day.
Manager Response: Dear Iggywine,  We are thrilled you enjoyed your recent visit to world famous Doheny Beach and were able to experience the best beach house in Orange County.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point!

Summary: This hotel has a vibe that they do not like their guests.  They have that " Sorry Can't do" attitude.  They give a bottle of water upon check in and any bottle of water after that is like asking Congress not to think of re-election. The staff is simply aloof , not having a clue what the hospitality industry is all about. The rooms are clean but the pool is very small. It has a good location to the beach. The Best Western a few yards down the road is a better deal with free breakfast and the staff is light and give an atmosphere that they want you to enjoy your stay. Plus the parking is free. This Doubletree charges a college semester for parking.Stay Away from this Doubletree hotel.
Manager Response: Dear gergalv,  Our team is sincerely disappointed to hear we did not exceed your expectations on your recent visit and can assure you the hospitality spirit is alive and well for all guests to enjoy here at the Doubletree Dana Point and offer our most sincere apologies you did not experience that vibe during your stay.  We do our absolute very best to communicate parking and breakfast charges on our hotel website and during the reservation process to avoid catching our guests by surprise and discouraged this step was missed prior to your arrival.  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience and truly appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: Meeting at Doubletree Suites Doheny Beach-Dana Point
Summary: We just held our Women’s Church Retreat at the Doubletree Doheny Beach-Dana Point. A cute boutique hotel styled in a beach motif. The meeting space was perfect for our group and the Banquet Captain, Sergio and his team were great! The chef prepared delicious meals to meet our group’s needs and budget. All attendees of the Retreat had a great time! A great place to hold a small to mid-sized intimate group event!
Manager Response: Dear Anita V,  It was an absolute privilege to host your Church Retreat this past weekend and thrilled you enjoyed the best beach house in Orange County here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We will be sure to recognize our food and beverage team members you mentioned and genuinely appreciate your kind words.  Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and hope to welcome your group back on a future visit.

Summary: Great Hotel by the beach nice large rooms for family a seating area as well as the dabble beds the view and the beach was excellent staff very nice and helpful I would tell other travelers about this great place.
Manager Response: Dear Mary G,  We could not agree with you more about Dana Point being a world class beach destination and elated you were able to experience the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Doheny Beach has to offer all of our visiting guests.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and sharing your feedback with us!

Summary: Nice location with easy access to beautiful oceanfront park and marina.  That, is unfortunately, where it stops. Overpriced and constantly charging you for extras. Parking - $25 per day. That's not valet. That's self park. Hot breakfast used to be included. Not anymore. Which is shocking because for a year I have come to this hotel even without a real restaurant as it was being remodeled. Our loyalty was rewarded with a charge for breakfast that they used to include.  In my last 4 stays, I have had to change room twice to get an internet connection.   Why do I keep coming back? The location. But that is over. Like I am going to be doing going forward, I would recommend that you look elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear J Steve S,  Thank you so very much for your loyalty to our hotel over the years and truly value having you as our guest.  Our hotel offers both valet and self parking at the same rate due to our close proximity to the beach since parking is always at a premium along Pacific Coast Hwy.  Even the state beaches and parks across the street charge $15 to park for just a few hours.  We are currently in a holding pattern in terms of upgrading our internet hardware until Hilton rolls out their new technology platform to all hotels in their portfolio sometime in 2019.  On behalf of all of our associates here at the Doubletree Dana Point, thank you very much for sharing your experience with us.

Summary: This hotel has so many memories for us as a family.. The food is excellent, the staff are very kind and outgoing.. The location of the hotel to beach activities is close and safe for children.. The environment and upper level cocktail lounge is relaxing in the evenings.. Only negative is I’ve said for years they need a hot tub addition.. Especially for the cool nights!
Manager Response: Dear markcrau,  Words cannot even begin to explain how appreciative and grateful we are to be your "family favorite" hotel over the years and for being such a loyal repeat guest to the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and already looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: Tough to complain about the location. The beach is right in front and access is incredibly easy. The front desk is very friendly and they do their best to be accommodating. The downside is the rooms are worn out and certainly doesn’t reflect their price. The restaurant is hit and miss and is overpriced, even for a hotel. I had perhaps the worst omelette ever,  it was so bad the waitress apologized and refunded it from our bill.
Manager Response: Dear yogiacomo,  We are elated you enjoyed our close proximity to Doheny Beach and Pacific Ocean as well as the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Dana Point is known for here in Orange County!  Our most sincere apologies our hotel did not exceed your overall perception of value when our hotel room rates are always comparable to local market prices in the area and given our hotel just completed an all guestroom suite renovation two years ago.  We will certainly forward on your comments regarding your breakfast experience to our executive chef and appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: The hotel is in a good area.  It is starting to show its age.  The rooftop bar needs a renovation and a major upgrade in order to feel relaxed and just chill.  It was dirty small no beer on tap.  Lines being redone or something.  I felt like I was sitting in the wash area of a commercial kitchen.  I went up once for 20 minutes then just resorted to a six pack in my room.
Manager Response: Dear Joeblow990,  Great news to find out you enjoyed our ideal Dana Point location and close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach!  We are troubled to hear you did not enjoy the outdoor beach and ocean views from our rooftop lounge and will certainly share your feedback with our food and beverage team to upgrade the guest experience as a result of your feedback.

Summary: Look somewhere else. expensive for quality of the hotel. Old run down. Rooms not clean. Lobby is good parking is additional cost. Breakfasts only includes 2 people for the room even though you check in as 4.
Manager Response: Dear childsplay911,  Our hotel completed an $8 million dollar renovation of all of our guest room suites and hallway corridors two years ago and saddened to find out you were not impressed with the overall design package.  Beach front parking is always at a paid premium up and down Pacific Coast Hwy and we do our absolute very best to communicate that information on our website as well as during the reservation process.  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary: The Doubletree at Doheney Beach had some nice assets and two terrible liabilities. The location is awful! PCH south ran directly in front of our room; just to the south of it, the Amtrak rails that service Amtrak and long, noisier cargo trains. Access is awful as you can only access it from the north and leave south. Other than that, the staff is nice and the food is good but room design makes NO sense.
Manager Response: Dear Jack W,  We are deeply troubled to hear that our magnificent ocean views, close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach, spacious guest room suites and authentic hospitality from our associates did not off set the location and physical logistics of our hotel during your recent stay with us.  Thank you for sharing your experience with us and appreciate the compliment regarding our incredible team members here at the Doubletree Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Rooms not as they looked online.
Summary: Luxury king suite was anything but. I thought I chose the continental breakfast but was told because I was a Hilton member, that it was not included. One day it was after 4 before they cleaned our room.
Manager Response: Dear mkrecklow,  We are extremely interested to know how you booked your reservation since the suites listed on our official Hilton website do not contain a "luxury king suite" description and we assure you pictures of all of our room types are exactly as advertised.  Our most genuine apologies your confusion regarding breakfast options when you made your reservation resulted in a less than perfect experience during your visit and our housekeeping team would have been more than happy to refresh your room before a certain time each day if it had been requested.  Thank you for sharing your experience with us and providing our hotel team with your valuable feedback

Summary Heading: In all my travels this is the first time we felt we left family.  Amazing and accomodating staff.
Summary: I must point out people that went above and beyond.  In the restaurant...Jackie and Lisa.  Even when busy took time to give us helpful tips with a smile.   Front Desk...Jak, John, Joe and Jocelyn.  Again over and beyond what I've experienced in "resort" hotels.  Rooftop lounge...the best staff.  Louis, Luis, Sophie, Michelle.  Attentive, friendly and always helpful.   Honestly I've never had this experience in other more upscale hotels.   I would recommend to others and come back again.  And finally, the valets were so friendly and helpful with directions. I kept getting lost and they helped.   Don't miss this jewel and staff.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy K,  What a wonderful review for our team to read and thank you a million times over for recognizing our all star associates that are the heart and soul of everyone's favorite beach house here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  We truly appreciate your glowing recommendation and endorsement of our hotel and look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travels bring you to Orange County.

Summary: I had a one night stay in Dana Point for the last day of summer, the staff was very friendly, the restaurant breakfast was great, but it is very expensive. The rooftop bar has limited options in terms of food I wish you could order full menu upstairs at the bar.  The room was beautifully decorated and I loved the view I had! Close to the beach and downtown Dana Point.
Manager Response: Dear destinydreadful,  Talk about going out in style here at the Doublettree Dana Point and what an incredible way to wind down another summer season here in Orange County!  Our team is elated you enjoyed our pristine guestrooms, panoramic ocean views, delicious breakfast and the overall authentic hospitality our hotel provides to all of our guests.  Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: Most DoubleTree hotels I have stayed in are of reliable quality - fairly basic and clean.  This one.. not so much.  First, the webiste pictures are misleading - NONE of them show the campground (with lots of tents, campers, etc) and the highway (PCH) that is situated between the hotel and the beach!   Second, the property  itself is old and dingy (the rooms are not bright and clean like the pictures!)  Also, the walls are PAPER thin - so you hear EVERYTHING. That said, there were three very good aspects of my stay: 1) the valet staff was excellent - efficient, friendly and prompt;  2) the front desk staff was great - friendly, efficient and responsive; and 3) the bed was comfortable.  That is about all I can say that was good.  The restaurant was just a bizarre experience - so
Manager Response: Dear Nanachelle,  Thank you for sharing your positive guest service encounters with our phenomenal front desk and valet associates here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  We are equally troubled our hotel did not meet your expectations and can assure you our website photos are an accurate representation of vantage points within our hotel and guestroom suites.   Our team appreciates you taking your valuable time to share your observations with us allowing us to enhance the overall guest experience moving forward.

Summary: I have a food allergy and you would of thought I had three heads and was asking them to run the Boston Marathon with the reaction I got! Not a good way to start your morning. It took them 10 minutes to get my daughter ketchup and another ten for my tea. A very disorganized staff and to top it off the line cook or chef had no clue what ingredients he cooked with!!! How does that happen?? I hold Hilton to a higher standard as I travel a lot and we are Hilton Club Owners. A very disappointing experience! My omelette dis not look very well either!
Manager Response: Dear 400mag,  Our most sincere apologies an isolated encounter during your breakfast resulted in you not being extremely satisfied with your overall visit at our hotel.  We will certainly address it with our food and beverage team to make the necessary improvements as a result of your feedback and truly appreciate you bringing it to our attention.

Summary: Casual place to go by yourselves, or with family. Close to harbor and town. Newly decorated w2ith California beach theme, casual restaurant and roof top bar with ocean view. A little hard to get in & out of though.
Manager Response: Dear terrelc,  Your title tag line sums up the Doubletree Dana Point quite nicely.............our bright ocean beach themed lobby and friendly welcoming team members make us one of the most popular hotels in Orange County!  Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and look forward to visiting with you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Average, weird, overpriced, next to the sewer treatment plant....
Summary: This is one of those weird places you stay when all else was full. The location is the easiest misrepresentation of a beach front hotel I've ever seen. No easy entrance without multiple u turns tells you this plac was an afterthought. Now painted bright white with blue trim and striped blue and white awnings it looks like a poor attempt at a Greek vacation spot. Across a busy street ( Pacific Coast Highway ) tourists run with their inner tubes and beach chairs like little icons in a video game awaiting a direct hit from a speeding vehicle. The rooms are corporate esque hotel on the old side and the food is typically overpriced and just fair. Most people are afraid to venture out into the one way street that requires a jig saw puzzle of traffic lights, overpasses and a U turn to
Manager Response: Dear cap10paul,  Our most sincere apologies you were not a fan of our hotel's location and logistics although a bit of an embellishment on your part based on your description.  World famous Doheny Beach has put Dana Point on the map and with a dedicated traffic signal/cross walk at the front of our hotel makes for safe easy access for beach goers to cross Pacific Coast Highway to get to the ocean.  We truly value your feedback and appreciate you being a guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel over the past weekend, and it was MISERABLE. The air conditioning did not work in the room; we had service come in to repair the unit, took about 30 minutes and then it stopped working half way through the night. We were so hot our room temperature was 82. I think it's a centralized unit because the entire hotel was stifling hot. I called in the morning about 10 am to complain again and request a fan, then all the sudden the A/C came on.  Wait, it get's better. The refrigerator also did not work; we had to take the tank lid off the toilet to flush on three different occasions. We attempted to watch TV, and the television picture continually faded in and out. When I mentioned conditions of our room, the attendant seemed less than concerned
Manager Response: Dear Desiree M,  As an entire hotel team we are disappointed with the maintenance shortfalls you experienced during your recent visit and certainly offer our most genuine apologies.  Our engineering team clearly overlooked theses items on their checklist when last servicing and inspecting the room and will follow up with them accordingly.  Sounds like our front desk team could have addressed your concerns in a more friendly and hospitable manner and we will definitely utilize this as a coaching opportunity for our teams in all departments as a result of your feedback.  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: This hotel is a favorite staycation for my family. Access to beach, shopping, and food is visible from the hotel. This hotel takes excellent care of their clients. There have been no issues with the services we use. They have rental items (bikes, surfboards, ect.) available, with quick checkout/in. Thanks again for another great stay!
Manager Response: Dear DonDoJo,  We cannot thank you enough for being such a loyal guest to Doubletree Dana Point and spending your family "staycations" with us!  Our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach and impeccable service from our top notch associates definitely make us the ideal choice when hanging out in Orange County.  The team definitely appreciates your five bubble review and we certainly look forward to seeing you around town.

Summary: This place is not your normal Doubletree.  The decor is modern funky, but I like it.  The rooms are big, the shower was huge and across the tracks from the beach.  Most rooms have a balcony so you can see the ocean and watch a nice sunset.
Manager Response: Dear Brian S,  You are absolutely correct my friend, we are definitely not my Grandparent's Doubletree here at Doheny Beach and pride ourselves on our laid back California beach house vibe!  We are thrilled you enjoyed our incredible sunsets and ocean views and look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Dana Point.

Summary: I was so hopeful, the photos made this hotel very promising, however that was just not the case. There was a mismatch of help, the front desk person tried his best to get a room that worked for us, we could not find one to fit us and as weird as it sounds the biggest room only has a king bed option. I kid you not, the cleaning people could not get to out room due to the fact that they clock out at 5pm that was his response as to why the room was not cleaned when we returned from our day out. So we past on the option to sleep in an un-kept room the second night due to that fact... oh and yes we were charged the full rate. Don't call room service at 7:00am apparently no one is available that early. The experience was awful in a surreal sort of way.
Manager Response: Dear frank2rre,  While our goal is definitely to provide an excellent guest experience it seems like we may have missed the mark on your recent vacation with us.  Our sincere apologies our premium suite room types did not meet your exact needs and housekeeping service should have been made available at your request and we are disappointed with the response you received.  We will certainly utilize it as a coaching opportunity with our front desk team.  We certainly value your feedback and appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Summary: Room was small-bathroom was tiny-AC unit rattled all night-ocean view was obstructed-only positive was the staff, front desk and restaurant staff were very polite and helpful - expectations were high but room was very disappointing.
Manager Response: Dear nsavkohere,  We are all extremely happy to hear you enjoyed our overall hospitality and positive interactions with our amazing associates during your time here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our team is equally disappointed you were not extremely satisfied with the physical attributes and views from your guestroom and will certainly work diligently to address the comments you mentioned to prevent a similar experience in the future.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest at our hotel and allowing us the opportunity to improve the guest experience with the feedback you provided.

Summary Heading: FOR WHAT IT SHOULD BE AND WHAT IT IS I WOULD PASS ON ANOTHER STAY
Summary: Starting with the worst part.  Noisy neighbors kept me up and only got about 4hrs sleep on a night i needed to get up at 5AM.  They were nice enough to waive my $25 parking charge because of this and are quite nice.  But the room was just so-so and we HATED the fact that the bathroom literally has ZERO space to keep your bath items.  Fancy sink but with ZERO counter space and the sink is in the same area as toilet and shower so only one at a time here.  Maybe i am too picky, but on this trip we stayed at a few motels that had better rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Mark G,  Please accept our most sincere apologies other guests in the surrounding rooms were having too much fun late into the evening and it affected your overall experience.  We will be sure to share your feedback regarding our guest bathroom layout with our design team when we begin planning our next rooms renovation.  Our goal is to deliver a phenomenal night's sleep and exceed our guest's expectations and certainly hope to regain your confidence in our hotel on a future visit to Dana Point.

Summary: Great cocktails , pretty view  and what a fun staff!!  Our bartender, Evan,had great suggestions for us & he definitely made our night!!  We’ll be back tomorrow night for sure!!  Drinks and food were delicious!
Manager Response: Dear Suzi E,  Our Longboard rooftop lounge is definitely the hot spot in Dana Point to enjoy picturesque ocean view sunsets, phenomenal service and your favorite beverage of choice!  Thank you so very much for being a repeat guest and a raving fan of the Doubletree Doheny Beach!

Summary: Below standard for the amount of money we spent. AC in the room was noise. Breakfast staff was not very accommodating.  Felt like we were just not important.  Seated by the food and it was hot and noisy
Manager Response: Dear DOUGT891,  Our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations and that as a hotel team we fell short of our own high standards during your recent visit.  We will certainly utilize your feed back as a training opportunity for our food and beverage team to ensure we provide a best in class dining experience moving forward.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: We had a flood in our home and had to stay in a hotel for an extended period. We chose the DoubleTree in DP as it had a great location and accommodated pets. The staff was fantastic. Front Desk Erin, Joe, Jocelyn, Jac, John, Krizja were always there to greet you and offer anything you needed. The breakfast staff was wonderful! Jacqueln, Gloria, Gavin, Julia and Lisa were there everyday bright and early with the best coffee in town. The buffet was always tended well and the breakfast potatoes were the best. The housekeeping was team as well were very accommodating since we have a golden retriever to work around. The Valet guys always with a suggestion for dinner in the area... 3 weeks of dining out you needed some variety...  Great job to the entire DoubleTree DP Team.. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Joe M,  While we definitely our sorry to hear about the misfortunes with your home, we are elated the Doubletree Dana Point Team was able to lift your spirits given the circumstances of your visit with us and we were able to create a positive experience for you and your family!  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and your five bubble review, it is truly appreciated.

Summary Heading: Pleaseant stay and very nice staff
Summary: Jac at the front desk was extremely friendly and helpful and thoughtfully offered me a room upgrade with a ocean view.  In the restaurant, Evan Pugrad-Gonzalez went out of his way to make sur I was served dinner at closing time.  He even made a perfect recommendation.
Manager Response: Dear Robert T,  Thank you so very much for acknowledging our rock star associates and ecstatic you had a pleasant stay and were able to experience the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Dana has become known for over the years!  We will be sure to recognize our associates accordingly for their stellar service as a result of your feedback.

Summary: Evan Pugrad-Gonzales is a wonderful addition to your team. Attentive, enthusiastic, creative, and an excellent mixologist!    Beautiful hotel. Great location.  Nice beach view. Walk to the beach. Walk to dinner. Chill at the rooftop bar.
Manager Response: Dear Amy R,  What awesome news you were able to enjoy our relaunched Doheny Surf Restaurant, Longboard Rooftop Lounge as well as our all star mixologists!  The Doubletree Dana Point definitely has it all from our prime location, gorgeous Pacific Ocean views and our incredibly friendly team members making us the hotel of choice when visiting Orange County.  Thanks so much for being a raving fan and look forward to hanging out with you on your next visit.

Summary: This place has been a favorite for years but it is showing its age.  Great location just a short walk to the beach.  Small pool and no jacuzzi.  Downside is the restaurant was terrible.  We were told that it just reopened.   Had a tough undercooked steak for dinner.  Breakfast buffet was awful.  Tough eggs with no flavor etc.  Eat elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear kemcc,  We truly value you being a repeat guest over the years here at the Doubletree Dana Point and apologize we fell short of exceeding your  expectations on your most recent visit with us.  All of our guestroom suites and public corridors were refreshed a little over two years ago and and certainly apologize that was not reflected in your overall perception of the hotel as our team works diligently to maintain our appearance on a daily basis.  Your feedback regarding the restaurant is duly noted and has been shared with our executive chef to ensure an exceptional guest dining experience moving forward.  Thank you so much for sharing your vacation with us and we certainly hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to Dana Point.

Summary Heading: Right accross the street to the beach!
Summary: This was about a family tradition that started in the 60's and has keep going strong. Our family has been camping at Doheny Beach every August since the early 60's and this year was no exception, oh except for the fact that we stayed at the Double Tree while the rest of the family camped. And believe me, it was well worth it!
Manager Response: Dear therget,  What an unbelievable story and very cool family tradition to have vacationing year after year in gorgeous Dana Point, Orange County's best kept secret!  It is an absolute honor you added the Doubleree Doheny Beach into the mix this year and hopefully well into the future.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary Heading: Great Beach Location!  Smart Looking Hotel
Summary: Very nice little hotel right across from the beach.  Wonderful valet service greets you along with the traditional Double Tree chocolate chip cookies. This hotel has the 'beachy' feel with nice decor in the front.  The rooms are comfy and quiet.  Linens clean and bathroom was spotless.  Those are selling points for me.  The price is fair for a S. California beach location.  Parking is a premium but since you are on vacation in nice area, budget that in!  The breakfast in the restaurant is nothing to write home about so go out and explore beyond the hotel.  The hotel has a small breakfast buffet that is overpriced.  This hotel does not have a washer or dryer, so either plan on packing more clothes or go find a service that will accommodate your needs.  There are two elevators in
Manager Response: Dear DAndestravleler,  What an incredible rave review and elated we were able to exceed your expectations on your recent SoCal vacation with us!  We are thrilled you were able to enjoy the laid back beachy vibe, clean guestroom suites and friendly service the Doubletree Dana Point is known for here in Orange County.  Thank you so very much for staying with us and hope to welcome you back again in the very near future!

Summary Heading: just ok. thats pretty much sum it up --
Summary: food is mediocre, fitness room is sub par, bedrooms are ok but poorly designed so the end is right up against the bathroom door. location is great for walking to the beach and beach restaurants but that also means its right along the train line and sandwiched between 2 highways.I think I'd rather stay fewer nights and spend more for the marriott up the street
Manager Response: Dear bettelevine,  We are truly disappointed to hear we did not exceed your expectations on your most recent visit with us and truly apologize on behalf of our entire team.  Thank you so very much for providing such useful information and we will be sure to take action with our teams as a result of your feedback.  Our goal is to provide a best in class hotel for all of our valued guests and can assure you our team will deliver an enhanced experience on your next visit to Dana Point.

Summary: This hotel was a gem! Nice open design. Great staff. And the location across from the beach was wonderful. We got an upgrade to ocean view. From the moment we walked in we were well taken care of by every staff member.
Manager Response: Dear Steven S,  The Doubletree Dana Point team is absolutely ecstatic you had a wonderful vacation at our hotel and were able to experience the authentic hospitality and genuine care from all of our associates that you encountered.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest and we look forward to visiting with you again on a future visit to Orange County!

Summary: hotel is great; this reservation company on the other hand; presented a website showing breakfast included and yet it did not; they failed to mentioned the parking fee of $25 per day!  I called the hotel and they helped me upgrade the room, call reservations.com and they said basically, so sad, too bad, you clicked you agreed on line.! And...a girl with a VERY heavy Indian accent told me her name was "jane".
Manager Response: Dear dlctweedy09,  The Doubletree Dana Point Team is thrilled to hear you had a great overall experience at our hotel and you had a better guest interaction with our hotel associates than with the online third party that made your original reservation.  While we do our best to monitor information content on all websites, we strongly encourage everyone to "stop clicking around" and book directly on our hotel website for the most accurate and up to date hotel information.  Thank you so very much for staying with us at the Doubletree Dana Point and look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit!

Summary: Great bedrooms large enough to house my family plus bedroom balconies for us to watch the sunset at night while the baby slept inside. Plus Evan Pugrad at the restaurant was literally the kindest and most helpful and personable server I have ever met. When traveling with a young family, you often get "stuck" at the hotel restaurant and he made it a joy.
Manager Response: Dear Katelyn L,  We could not be more pleased that the Doubletree Dana Point exceeded your expectations during your family vacation and you were able to experience Doheny Surf Restaurant with our incredible food and beverage team.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review, it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel in an strategic location
Summary: I just wanted to say this Hilton property exceeded my expectations in nearly every way.  Its clean and well maintained and the staff is well trained at their jobs and very caring.  The location, across from the state beach can't be beat.  You're also 4 miles from Laguna beach and San Clement and an hour from Los Angeles and San Diego.  The newly opened restaurant is top notch; I recommend the poke bowl.  The views from the rooftop bar are spectacular and the drinks are strong and well made.  The valet attendants hustle their butts off and are very informative about the area.  The hotel also rents bikes, surf boards, boogie boards, and 4/6 person pedal cars.  The light colored decor and abundance of light throughout the hotel is pleasing to the eye. The 3 other rooftop lounges
Manager Response: Dear scottemick,  What a phenomenal review of our incredible hotel and you literally mentioned everything that makes the Doubletree Dana Point the ideal place to stay when visiting Orange County!  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and hope to see you again in the very near future!

Summary: Stayed for one night recently in a signature view 2 double bed suite with balcony. We found the room to be disappointing in its maintenance and the ocean view was not quite as expected because the palms in front of the balcony blocked much of the view, When we walked into the room, my wife and I found the towels on the bed instead of in the bathroom. The bathroom looked tired and worn - many scratches in the sink, poorly and sloppily installed shower door, and a few other dings and dents. The patio door was difficult to open and the seal on the bottom of the door was coming off. The bedroom and living room furniture was fine. Service and staff were excellent. Our car valet Scott was great and very helpful and knowledgeable about the area, Location - across from Doheny Beach and
Manager Response: Dear Mark S,  We definitely appreciate your kind words about our excellent team members and the incredible service you received during your visit with us.  Our most genuine apologies you were not extremely satisfied with the view from your guest room and our oversight regarding the maintenance issues you observed.  Our team will certainly add these items to their daily inspection checklists as a result of your valuable feedback.  Thank you so very much for staying with us at the Doubletree Doheny Beach and certainly hope to provide you with an award winning experience on a future visit.

Summary: Unfortunately, we were very disappointed with not only the condition of our room but the lack of value. The screen door on the slider was hanging off ready to fall. Also, we killed what looked to be small ants on the night stand. The was less than accommodating giving us a cursory "I'm sorry to hear that". I don't believe paying $250+ per night for this type of room is a good value.
Manager Response: Dear jerryk416,  Please accept our most sincere apologies for your overall value perception and maintenance issues you experienced during your recent visit.  We pride ourselves on delivering a memorable guest experience and have unfortunately fallen short of our own high expectations during your recent visit at the Doubletree Doheny Beach.  Our team will definitely utilize your feedback to enhance the overall guest experience moving forward and appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with our team.

Summary: I can't say enough about the location of this hotel.  the beach and marina are just a few steps away.  The rooftop bar is the best in the area.  Extremely friendly and accommodating staff.  this is my new go to hotel in Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear E5042KHdavidk,  What a phenomenal review and the team here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach is forever grateful for the compliment!  We definitely agree our Longboard rooftop lounge is the only spot in town to enjoy the magnificent ocean and Doheny Beach views.  Thank you so very much for making us your new favorite beach house in Orange County and look forward to visiting with you again in the near future.

Summary: First love seeing the kitchen is open full service again!  Gavin has been my service the last to days in the restaurant. Best service ever!!!!!!  His guy is great with the guests! Coffee is ready and following juice right there!!! He checks back time and time again!  Plus the mustache lol  Craziness!!!!!!  A second reach out to Erin and my main man Wesley! I alway feel at home at the DPD!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Joseph A,  Thank you so very much for the shout outs for all of our all star associates and recognizing the authentic hospitality provided by the Doubletree Dana Point Team!  We genuinely appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your five bubble experience with us.

Summary: I don't normally submit reviews.  Normally I expect to get what I pay for, and normally that exchange doesn't seem too far off.  I'm making an exception for this hotel.  It reminded me of a few airlines I've flown recently, where basic services are considered optional “upgrades”, the customer is seldom right and they seemingly have rules just for the sake of rules.  This should be a very quaint, friendly place, but it seems it may be owned by a bean-counter type who sees customers more as revenue sources than as human beings, & that feeling set us on edge the whole stay.  Can we check out 1 hour late on our last day (three night stay)?  No way. Are we on the list for breakfast?  No.  But we prepaid for it.  Oh okay, you can have bagels and cereal but not eggs, because you didn’t
Manager Response: Dear jdavidmurray,  Please allow me to to extend my sincerest apologies for the less than perfect experience you described during your recent visit with us.  We do our absolute very best to accommodate all guest requests for late checkouts as long as it does not impact another guest experience during busy summer sold out nights to allow our housekeeping team adequate time to prepare it for the next arriving guest.  Our food and beverage team is always willing to accommodate guest requests and apologize for the confusion you experienced during the reservation process in regards to the breakfast options and room types our hotel offers.  Our signature roof top bar offers a light fare food menu as transporting food from our lobby level impacts the overall food quality and guest experience.  The Doubletree Doheny Beach is definitely considered a value when comparable area hotels automatically add a $25 - $40 resort fee on top of the room rate to utilize additional hotel amenities whether the guest takes advantage of them or not, so our hotel is pricing is as advertised.  We certainly appreciate you sharing your guest experience with us and will definitely review it with our leadership team as a result of your feedback.

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY HERE- not as advertised
Summary: I have stayed at Hilton Properyies for over 20 years. This was the absolute worst hotel—especially with a $400/night room rate.   We reserved a room with a luxury bath months ago.  We called the morning of our arrival to see if there was availability to check-in early (about 12:30) We were advised it would be no problem. (We arrived on a week day).   When we arrived at 1:00pm our room was not ready  the front desk gal told us to go get lunch & that the room would be ready then. She also advised we would have an ocean view.  We went to lunch-  came back & room still wasn’t ready at 2:45pm. We were then directed to the beach (which is not really a beach - it is loaded with rocks & rip currents & steep drop offs- no lifeguard either). The ocean is across a busy street & a 6-8
Manager Response: Dear obtravelers2015,  Words cannot even begin to explain how sorry our team is for your arrival experience and will definitely utilize it as a development opportunity for both our front desk and housekeeping teams to prevent a similar guest experience in the future.  Although our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach did not exceed your expectations there are several other magnificent beaches within Dana Point and our friendly associates would have been more than happy to provide you with directions to alternative beach locations to enhance your overall Orange County experience.  Our hotel offers a variety of different guest room types to choose from with varying views and bathroom amenities and apologize for the confusion this may have caused you during the reservation process.  We certainly appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us and hope to have the opportunity to regain your confidence in the future

Summary Heading: Great location by the beach, and an even more amazing staff!
Summary: This is the second time our extended family of 12 spent almost a week at this hotel. I can’t recommend it enough! You can walk to the beach from the hotel very easily.  But location is only part of the reason that we returned this year.    The hotel has been updated and is new and modern, with all the conveniences you could want. But maybe the most important is the hotel staff, including the front desk personnel, the restaurant personnel, the bellmen, and the cleaning staff.  They were all exceptionally friendly, helpful, and cared about our well-being. I travel a lot, and don’t find this very often. This hotel is a gem! And the staff is spectacular.
Manager Response: Dear Lilian V,  Thank you so very much for being a repeat guest with your extended family here in Dana Point and genuinely appreciate your heart warming comments about our spectacular team members!  We are thrilled you are a fan of our latest hotel renovation since your last visit with us and now welcome all of you as honorary members of the Doubletree Doheny Beach family!

Summary Heading: Great location, but only passable hotel
Summary: This is a great location in Dana Point, but the prices are high (although many other local hotels are even higher), and the rooms have inconvenient bathrooms with no counter space, dim lighting and sinks that splash a lot.  The hotel overbooks, so check in early to make sure you get the room you want (or perhaps even a room).  They charge $20 for breakfast, but free to Diamond Hilton Honors members. Pool is small with a view of the parking lot, but nice lounges and some shade.
Manager Response: Dear Michael L,  We appreciate you acknowledging our incredible Dana Point  location and the overall value our hotel offers compared to other hotels in the area.  We promise you our team will have the appropriate discussions regarding the layout of the guestroom bathrooms when planning our next hotel renovation as a result of your feedback.  As with all hotels, sold out situations in the summer does reduce the supply of our most popular room types and assure you our front desk team does proactively manage the busy time periods accordingly to honor all reservations booked by our guests.   Thank you so much for staying with us here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach and appreciate you sharing your experience with us.

Summary: This is a wonderful hotel!  I cannot recommend it enough!    First the rooms were huge.  It made it easy to relax for the week.  They were updated and clean.
