There were a bunch of USB ports for charging your phone.  You can tell they take care of their hotel.  Add the fact that there is an awesome view of the Pacific and the location is right across the street and this place can't be beat.    Also, the staff needs credit too.  They made a nice hotel great.  There were always friendly and very helpful.  The valet was professional and fast.  The front desk was always caring.  The breakfast staff was great (not to mention breakfast was excellent, and open for a long time).  To top it off, after the stay I got the unuall Hilton survey emailed to me that I completed.  After I filled
Manager Response: Dear flyou,  You are so extremely kind and generous for your glowing review of the Doubletree Dana Point and forever grateful for you recommending our hotel to the Tripadvisor community!  We could not agree with you more that we are definitely a "Fantastic Hotel" with our spacious guest room suites, gorgeous panoramic Pacific Ocean views and the genuine authentic hospitality displayed by our phenomenal team members.  We can't wait to welcome you back to best beach house in Orange County and look forward to seeing you the sooner the better!

Summary Heading: A great hotel if you are in the Dana Point area
Summary: The hotel is located across the beach from Doheny Beach state park.  From a people perspective, this hotel rates a 5 star.  Everyone (and I mean everyone) goes out of their way to be friendly and helpful.  This isn't something I'm use to - and I travel a lot for business.  Whatever you need, whatever the issue, they do their best to resolve it. The hotel itself rates a 4.  It is very convenient to the beach, but the road to get there is tricky - not the fault of the hotel.  The rooms are nice, but the showers leak onto the floor. The water coming out of the faucet at times ran HOT even though the handle was on the cold setting. We had problems opening/closing our bathroom door slider - the door hinges eventually broke and fortunately the door didn't fall off the tracks..  Beds
Manager Response: Dear akirsch2018,  What a phenomenal compliment raving about our "friendly and helpful" associates especially coming from a hotel road warrior business traveler really makes our day that much brighter here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our team is 110% committed and working diligently on a daily basis to address the areas mentioned above and truly appreciate you sharing your recent visit with us.  We certainly hope to have the opportunity to deliver a five bubble experience on your next trip back to Orange County.

Summary: Double Tree Dana Point was a great location and facility for our management retreat recently. The staff here are very helpful, especially Jayna Prest, the Meeting Manager was very delightful to work with. Many of the hotel rooms have great views of the ocean. Perfect location to step out and take a walk on the sand after a daylong meeting. Their kitchen was under renovation but the food service through catering was top quality. I strongly recommend this place either for meeting or a vacation on the Beach.
Manager Response: Dear JRJ56,  Thank you so very much for hosting your recent management training with us here at the Doubletree Dana Point and thrilled you enjoyed your visit!  Our hotel is definitely the ideal location for both business groups and leisure guests offering convenient beach access and gorgeous ocean views.  We definitely hope to have the opportunity to host another event in the future

Summary: A little diamond in the rough! Well kept, clean, affordable rooms. Jaqueline and Lisa at Doheny Surf restaurant were awesome!! Very helpful with “things to do” in the area. Pleasantly surprised with friendliness of all staff!
Manager Response: Dear ndelgado3805,  What an incredible honor for us to be able to celebrate your "Anniversary Getaway" with you here at Orange County's best kept secret!  Our hotel mission here at the Doubletree Dana Point is to be the cleanest and friendliest hotel and elated you were able to experience both for yourself during your recent vist.  We truly appreciate you acknowledging our all star team members for their authentic hospitality and will be sure to recognize them as a result of your feedback.  Thank you so very much for sharing your five bubble experience and for being a valued guest at our hotel well into the future.

Summary: This property needs a huge overhaul. The plumbing has issues, HBO doesn’t work, kithchen under construction and its dirty. The staff are friendly and try to do their best but for the money they want I fon’t Think I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Homerhog,  Our most sincere apologies and please pardon the dust from our recently completed kitchen renovation and the impact it had on your overall experience.  Unfortunately in the hotel business there is never a good time to inconvenience our guests with any type of  improvement projects throughout the hotel as we finalized our kitchen make over.   We are currently researching options to upgrade all current televisions in all of our guestroom suites that will resolve the issues you experienced during your stay.  Our team is certainly excited to relaunch our restaurant and glad you were able to experience their friendly enthusiasm during your visit.  We certainly hope you will reconsider staying with us on a future visit to Orange County.

Summary: Dirty, bad service and did not make it right!  Many common areas had stained furniture. They do not know anything about custom service. Not anywhere near the Hilton Hotel experience we are used to. Go to the Hilton property in Huntington beach.
Manager Response: Dear kat143dan,  Please accept our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations during your recent visit and can personally assure you this was an isolated incident.  We pride ourselves on delivering a memorable experience and am truly sorry we fell short during your stay with us.  We certainly hope to have the opportunity to regain your confidence in the future.

Summary: Tried to avoid the crowd at Laguna Beach and choose this hotel instead.  Short few minutes drive to Dana point harbor to enjoy kayaking and SUP.  The hotel is basically on it's own area with 2 highway surrounding and an active train track at the back.  A reasonable size swimming pool located at the front section of the building means you will need to pass the hotel lobby to get back to your room with wet suits.  But hey, it's a beach resort so who cares!  If you think only the young female Front Desk Agent are nice then wait until you meet the waiting staff during breakfast, from the Host to the service staff to the kitchen staff they are all Super friendly and always have the greatest California smile on their face! Thank you for letting us to start our day with full, positive
Manager Response: Dear Mazda626,  Definitely one of the best decisions you've ever made selecting Dana Point over Laguna Beach since our California vibe has so much more to offer our visiting guests.  Thank you so very much for acknowledging our super friendly and million dollar team member smiles here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Receiving comments like yours truly makes our days even better knowing our associates had such a positive impact every day during your stay with us!  We look forward to welcoming you back to your favorite home away from home on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: I stayed at this Hotel because of location to Beach and was able to use my Hilton Honors point.  The staff was awesome.  The room had numerous issues from large gaps in doors which lead to outside balcony and interior hallway, this allowed a lot of noise.  The kitchen was broken at the hotel so all the food was stuff that could be microwaved.  The hotel is close the to the beach and well within walking distance,  I would be hesitant to walk there as we did.  There is a large population of homeless people and drug use which we witnessed (this is not the Hotels fault) but the path to get to the beach was riddled with this type of activity.  We where able to drive about ten minutes and found a very clean beach.  Overall I would not stay here again with my family.
Manager Response: Dear bensokoll,  We sincerely apologize for our shortfall of delivering you and your family an exceptional vacation experience due to the doors in your suite, although thrilled you enjoyed your interactions with our "awesome" team members!  This is the first incident the hotel has been made aware of since the state of California legalized recreational drugs and can personally assure you a majority of our team members including myself walk the path to the beach on regular basis and have not had similar experiences.  Not to mention both state campground and local officials frequently monitor surrounding access to the beach on a  consistent basis.  Thank you so very much for your valuable feedback and we hope to have the opportunity to change your perception on a future family visit.

Summary Heading: Hotel has great rooms and service, close to lots including free trolly, wifi does not work to count on it for anything
Summary: if the Internet worked at all, I would increase the rating to 4. Could not get on the network most of them time--and when you did, it dropped you and was unreliable. It did not work 95% of the time, 4 nights we stayed, and I had meetings I needed to run over the network for my job.   Breakfast was included, it was pretty inclusive for a free offering.  The room was large and clean and well appointed.  We enjoyed the facility.  The staff at the front desk were excellent.  The location, while it is not actually waterfront, it is close and you are close walking distance to a lot, plus easy to catch the free Trolly to get around most anywhere, ... or a bus if you chose.  We used the trolly.  We drove from AZ and they did charge $25 a day for parking, which I believe is excessive.
Manager Response: Dear dachrist,  Thank you so very much for mentioning all of the amazing features of the Doubletree Doheny Beach and please accept our sincere apologies regarding your challenges with the internet.  We completely understand how frustrating that must have been trying to complete work while on vacation.  All Hilton brands are currently researching hotel network solution upgrades to improve the overall guest internet experience.  We thrilled you were able to take advantage of the Dana Point Trolley to get around town and explore our gorgeous city and all of the splendor it has to offer.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: Enjoyed my stay at this hotel, which is just across the road from the beach. Within minutes, you can walk over and enjoy sticking your toes in the Pacific Ocean! They had entertainment at their rooftop bar, affording a great view of the beach. As far as restaurants, expect to drive to go find somewhere to eat. WiFi was spotty at best with the best reception I had was when I was sitting on the balcony. It appears breakfast is offered free to everyone, which really takes away from the perk of being a Gold member. Also, I have never been to a breakfast buffet where they did not offer any meat (sausage or bacon). I was truly disappointed with this but I guess they cut down on costs when they offer the breakfast free to everyone. Overall, I enjoyed my stay at this Doubletree (except
Manager Response: Dear Itsjustme47,  We are thrilled you enjoyed our prime location and close proximity to the Pacific ocean here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our kitchen is in the final stage of renovation and will be relaunched shortly and sincerely apologize our limited breakfast options impacted your overall experience with us as a result.  Thank you so very much for recommending our hotel to the TripAdvisor community and your four bubble review.

Summary: My stay at the Doubletree in Dana Point was comfortable and quiet. My room faced the highway but I never heard any noise. Staff was genuinely warm and friendly. Sadly, I didn't have time to go for a walk on the beach but it appeared to be easy to access from the front of the hotel. Hope to stay there again soon and catch the sunset & views of Catalina!
Manager Response: Dear HeatherPepper,  Extremely kind of you to acknowledge our warm and friendly associate all stars and elated you were able to experience all of the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Dana Point has to offer.  You definitely must visit us again in the near future to experience world famous Doheny Beach and take in all of the amazing views the local area has to offer.  Thank you so very much for sharing your guest experience with us, it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary: Nice enough property, but overall pretty average.  Staff was very accommodating and friendly.  Rooms were nice enough. Short walk to Doheney beach with lots of surfers to share the water with. Breakfast was bare minimum and just above continental as they put out some eggs each morning.   Ordered nachos at the rooftop bar for happy hour and we received the crushed bottom of a bag of chips drowned in cheese.  There was barely a chip that could be picked up.  We asked the waiter if he could bring some more chips and he said yes but never came back so we left after another 20 minutes.  Certainly was not going to order anything else there after that experience.
Manager Response: Dear Irishlife10,  Excellent to hear you found our hotel, guestroom suites and team members extremely friendly and accommodating here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach on your recent visit.  Please accept our most sincere apologies for our food and beverage shortfalls due to our kitchen renovation that is currently in the final stage of completion.  We have done our best to communicate and be as transparent as possible on our website and truly sorry it impacted your overall experience with us.  Thank you so very much for your feedback and we certainly hope to have the opportunity to better serve you on a future visit.

Summary Heading: I nice spot right near the beach
Summary: We booked this place as a quick 1 night staycation close to home. We arrived about a half hour before check in but the room wasn't ready so we waited at the rooftop bar. The bar was nice with a great view and friendly staff. Unfortunately we still could not check in until around 4:00pm but the bar tender made up for it with a complimentary round of drinks.  When we finally got in the room was nice but the wine I ordered prior to the stay wasn't delivered. I went down to reception and they were on top of it, not only did they deliver the wine, they also threw in some fruit and nuts. I thought this was a very nice gesture.  The pool area was small but nice, the only thing I didn't care for was the cleanliness of the pool. There was a lot of beach sand and it looked like the tiles
Manager Response: Dear SDEMT6,  You definitely picked the ideal spot in Orange County for your well deserved "staycation" and genuinely appreciate you being a valued guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for sharing your observations from your stay with us and we will be sure to address the training opportunities with the appropriate departments throughout the hotel as a result of your feedback.  Very considerate of you to call yourself out regarding your departure experience with our valet team and we will be sure to pass your message along.

Summary: Very nice hotel in a great location. Staff was great and very accommodating. Very good continental breakfast. Secure underground parking with valet service. Nice pool area that is well maintained. Very poor housekeeping service. Room not cleaned one night and poorly cleaned the next.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overall a great place to stay, beach out the door, ocean view rooms if you can get one. Breakfast so so but what do you you expect for free. Roof top bar is awesome in the afternoon. Room is nice but back rooms do look at the freeway so be warned.
Manager Response: Dear Austriahof,  We certainly agree with you that the Doubletree Doheny Beach has the absolute very best location in Dana Point and all of South Orange County!  Glad you were able to enjoy our gorgeous ocean view room suites, Longboard roof top lounge and easy access to Doheny Beach.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your guest experience with us and look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit.

Summary: The hotel and staff were outstanding! Everyone had a good attitude and the property was beautiful! We loved the location near the beach with ocean views and the roof top bar was awesome! Not only will we come back we will tell all of our friends!
Manager Response: Dear markmD9407YR,  You have no idea how much your glowing endorsement to all of your friends and five bubble review mean to us here at the Doubletree Dana Point........Thank You, Thank You, Thank You!

Summary: Very friendly employees but especially the two guys that worked 2nd shift went way above & beyond.  Heated pool.  Really nice suite w great lighting & layout.  Nice little patio that overlooks the beach.  You do have to cross the street to the beach.  Free trolly service within a short walking distance from hotel that takes you most places.  Free  upscale continental breakfast.  Free internet but difficult to get on.  To get a faster speed it cost $4.95 a day & was able to get on but still randomly kicked me off.  Internet sucked so dont waste money paying for it cuz free was about same.  Bathroom pocket type roller door ...ummm... they need to get rid of them.  First the opague window in it was too see-through for enough privacy.  Second is that there is about a 1” gap between
Manager Response: Dear Taz1027,  We are thrilled you enjoyed our large guestroom all suite hotel, "great views" and first class associates here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you for your feedback regarding the door in the bathroom and overall internet experience during your recent visit.  We will certainly have our engineering team research the items and be on the look out moving forward as a result of your review.

Summary: I was a nice area.  The staff was friendly and the room was clean.  We didn't care for the underground parking area.  It was hard to maneuver and parking places were small.  Our bathroom door lock was broken and we didn't like the glass door on the bathroom.  Our balcony view was limited, which was disappointing.  Overall it was fine, but I'm not sure if we'll stay there next time.   Traffic in the area was pretty bad too, but that's southern California.  It was confusing with the one way roads, but once we got the hang of things, it wasn't so bad.
Manager Response: Dear Brent M,  Our hotel mission is to be the cleanest and friendliest in Orange County and thrilled the Doubletree Dana Point team was able to exceed your expectations on your recent visit.  Parking is always at a premium up and down Pacific Coast Hwy and encourage guests to utilize the convenience of valet parking since it is the exact same price as self parking and let them do all of the vehicle maneuvering for our guests.  Thank you so very much for sharing your guest experience with us and hope you will reconsider staying with us again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: We love Dana Point and especially Doheney Beach. This beautiful hotel is right across the street from Doheney. Many of the rooms are ocean view. I have young children and they love being able to see the ocean all the time. The valet service is just amazing. The guys that work there are some of the nicest we’ve ever met. Housekeeping Is amazing as well, our rooms are just beautiful and clean. We love this place!
Manager Response: Dear Wendy A,  Words cannot even begin to explain how excited our team is to read your review knowing we were able to deliver on your "Best Family Vacation EVER!"  Dana Point and Doheny Beach are definitely Orange County's best kept secret with our peaceful tranquility compared to other beach cities up and down the Pacific Coast.  Thanks so much for the shout out for our housekeeping and valet parking teams, they are definitely some of the best in the hospitality business.  Welcome home to your family's new favorite beach house and we all look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: My wife and I were on a cross country trip and made a visit to the coast and decide on this property.  The food service was extremely slim but they gave us an upgraded room which was fantastic. However the front desk clerk that works in the AM needs a review from the manual if one exists.  She was unable to smile or make eye contact either day that I stopped by the desk and was yelling to another staffer who was on another floor something about a bathroom somewhere while I stood a few feet away with no acknowledgement on the day we left.  It left a bad taste on an otherwise great visit.
Manager Response: Dear sapptrain,  We certainly hope you thoroughly enjoyed your cross country road trip and glad you enjoyed the gorgeous views the Doubletree Dana Point has to offer!  Thank you for alerting us and truly apologize for your interaction with our front desk team as our mission is to be the friendliest beach side hotel in Orange County and we clearly fell short of our goal based on your feedback.  We appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your experience with us and wish you safe travels on the rest of your journey.

Summary: The hotel is certainly not of the quality deserving the point value or cash value placed on the room rates or days.  Air units are extremely loud in the two rooms we had (one on points for my son and family and one room we paid over $300 per night for).  Towel rod and a shelf behind the toilet were barely still attached to the wall in the bathroom.  The hotel restaurant was being renovated so only a very limited menu of sandwiches and small plates were available.  The hotel advertised as being close (walking distance) to the beach, true statement if one considers a 10-15 walk on the edge of the main highway as close.  We will never stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Tim C,  Our goal is to provide a world class experience for all of our valued guests and our genuine apologies we missed our mark with your recent visit with us.  There are several different short cuts to visit world famous Doheny Beach and sounds like you were not able to take advantage of the most efficient route as we hardly ever experience negative guest comments regarding our close proximity to the ocean.  Thank you very much for the feedback and appreciate all of the useful information you provided for us to take action with our hotel teams.

Summary Heading: The beach is right in front of you and the staff assist with amenities
Summary: The staff does a great job of keeping leftover items from previous guests to assist in your stay. From surf boards to beach chairs, they only charge a small fee. Bikes are also available. This makes it easy for travelers like myself to enjoy the trip without having to go to a rental store or buying and leaving items.
Manager Response: Dear Beautyexplorer1,  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and glad you were able to take advantage of our additional hotel amenities offered to all hotel guests.  We certainly enjoyed having you as our guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point and hope to welcome you back on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary: What a lovely surprise to drive up to DoubleTree in Dana Point located in a beautiful setting - across the street from the beach! This was a spur of the moment trip and we had a truly exceptional experience. We would not only highly recommend this property for location, but for the cleanliness, friendly atmosphere and value! We will be returning in the future, but will upgrade to an ocean view room. Thank you Hilton Honors program!
Manager Response: Dear robynnm2017,  The last minute get away trips are always the best and thrilled the exceptional team here at the Doubletree Dana Point was able to deliver on all aspects of your vacation!  There is no better location in Orange County to escape the desert heat and our ideal ocean front proximity by the beach keeps our guests returning all year long.   We are absolutely elated you enjoyed the value as well as the clean and friendly atmosphere of your new favorite beach house  Thank you so very much for being a valued Hilton Honors guest, it is genuinely appreciated!

Summary: Romantic Fireplace -Ocean View -private BaLcony . breakfast staff very attentive and they remembered returning guests very impressive . Would stay again and invite friends . Prime location . Loved the huge bathroom with separate tub.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica R,  You are absolutely right, the Doubletree Dana Point is a "prime location" for a couples get away to enjoy picturesque ocean view sunsets and long walks on world famous Doheny Beach!  Thank you so very much for your endorsement of all aspects of our hotel, especially recognizing the authentic hospitality of our attentive breakfast associates.  We cannot wait until you return with more friends to enjoy the best Orange County has to offer here in Dana Point.

Summary Heading: A PIT: ABANDON ALL HOPE YE WHO ENTER THERE
Summary: Zero benefits. The hotel is a "pit." Abandon all hope, ye who enter there." Lousy service, dirty rooms, horrible maid service (tried to pass off used towels from previous day if we hadn't caught them doing so). Unbearable noise from air conditioning, no food service, moldy air conditioning vent (possible serious health issue). Manager intolerable and totally uncooperative and caught in an intentional misstatement. DON'T GO THERE UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES
Manager Response: Dear syvdan13,  Please accept our most sincere apologies that your overall experience was less than excellent and our leadership team did everything they could and made it right for you based on your feedback and interactions they had with you throughout your stay.  We pride ourselves on delivering a memorable experience and truly sorry we fell short during your recent stay.

Summary: This is a very nice hotel across from the beach in Dana Point. The rooftop bar provides an excellent expansive view with excellent drinks. Overall, we were very pleased with almost everything.  However, 1) If you want to walk to the beach aware you have to cross the road & walk along the street without sidewalks for a ways before walking through the campground before getting to the sand. 2) If you don't opt for an ocean view room you may be backed up to the train tracks & be woken up at night a few times. 3) the complimentary breakfast can get very crowded & the hot entre is limited to scrambled eggs. not really gourmet.
Manager Response: Dear W7021LUdanielf,  You are absolutely right, the views from Longboard our signature rooftop bar is definitely something everyone needs to experience when visiting Dana Point and elated you were equally impressed.  It is worth mentioning that there are several different routes for easy beach and ocean access from the hotel that anyone of our friendly associates would have been more than willing to provide directions to the ideal beach destination during your visit.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest at the Doubletree Doheny Beach and hope to visit with you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here twice this year, once on business and once with family. Great beachside hotel and wonderful staff. Its near the highway but you wouldnt know it. Maybe the ocean waves cover the road noise? I love the location across from the beautiful Doheny beach. There is also a great trail across the street than parallels the beach park. We took the Catalina Island ferry from Dana Point and left our car in the Doubletree garage. Get the fish and chips at the fresh fish shop by the ferry terminal to catalina. Delicious!
Manager Response: Dear wsucoug,  Thank you so very much for sharing your phenomenal experience with us and elated we were able to exceed your expectations on both of your visits to the Doubletree Dana Point!  We appreciate you mentioning everything that makes our hotel the ideal destination with our unbelievable beach side location complete with ocean wave ambiance and close proximity to Doheny Beach and world famous Dana Point Harbor.  Looking forward to welcoming you back on your next visit the sooner the better.

Summary: I did a room block for my sons wedding and everyone was happy with the accommodations.  The breakfast included with your room is great and the staff in the restaurant could not have been nicer. The valet guys were always available for directions.  The staff at the check in were very helpful with making sure our guests got their welcome bags. Jayna and Wesley were great with keeping me updated on my room block, very easy to deal with. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear kgibbac,  We are absolutely honored to be a part of your family's wedding weekend here at the Doubletree Dana Point and celebrate this momentous occasion with all of you!    Thank you so very much for acknowledging the authentic hospitality your family and friends received from our breakfast associates, valet attendants, front desk and sales team members.  We are absolutely ecstatic you will be staying here again in the future and everyone enjoyed all of our hotel accommodations and look forward to welcoming you back to your new favorite ocean view beach house.

Summary Heading: Location was pretty good and staff was very friendly and accommodating!
Summary: The hotel is located directly across the road from the Doheny beach. It was an easy walk to gain access to the closest beach. The staff was very friendly and extremely accommodating!! It was our two young sons first experience at the ocean. They enjoyed exploring the beaches. The Salt Creek beach is about 2 miles away (we drove) and is worth the drive. That beach has softer, white sand. The beach at Doheny is full of tiny rocks, which hurt to walk on. The parking is only $1 per hour at Salt Creek State Beach. It is the beach directly below the Ritz Carlton. The Dana Point Pier is worth going to as well.
Manager Response: Dear mtfamily0f4,  Looks like you definitely made the most of your time here in Dana Point and found all of the best beach spots in South Orange County!  Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and kind words regarding our friendly and accommodating team members.  We look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit

Summary Heading: Cameron at Front Desk is amazing !
Summary: There was a problem and mistake with my reservation which I made for my friends, Cameron was so nice on the phone he helped us patiently and very professionally. I was very far from the location and my friends were about to arrive there and without Cameron's help they would not be able to fix the reservation and get a room.  I am so happy he was working that day because the first person who I talked to was not as awesome as him.   -Bahar
Manager Response: Dear Bahar20182018,  We are extremely pleased when our super star associates receive an incredible shout out and appreciate you recognizing Cameron for going above and beyond exhibiting true authentic hospitality.  We will be sure to recognize and reward Cameron as a result of your feedback.  Thanks so very much for your five bubble review, it is truly appreciated!

Summary Heading: Great location, excellent breakfast, but those rooms...
Summary: Short walk to the beach. Lobby is super So Cal beachy, and the 4th floor patio bar is amazing for afternoon drinks. The breakfast is the best continental breakfast I've seen in a while.   But the room remodel...our room had three available outlets. Three. For five people. Not enough.  And the bathroom remodel is so poorly designed it's hard to believe they went through with it. No counter space. Big splashy sink. And someone thought glass enclosure of the shower was a good idea. So you stand in the cold waiting on the water to heat because you have to get in the shower to turn it on.   It's a beach hotel but there's ONE hook in the bathroom and you have to knock the towels off the wall to open the shower door, so...  Just poorly thought out for the money. And $25/day to self
Manager Response: Dear msjen141,  We are thrilled you enjoyed our close proximity to Doheny Beach and incredible ocean views from Longboard roof top lounge.  The design team learned some valuable lessons during our recent rooms renovation and your feedback is definitely welcomed and will share it with our team accordingly.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest at the Doubletree Doheny Beach and taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: I booked a Signature Ocean View Suite for three friends to get together with a friend of 53 years. The staff was helpful and friendly in the service of a patio umbrella brought promptly; extra coffee packs, a well served complementary breakfast buffet. They made our visit very pleasant. The property is quirky as it was clearly designed to maximize ocean view rooms. It is a good spot to visit good friends.
Manager Response: Dear Michael G,  Sounds like you had an amazing reunion with your life long friends and we couldn't agree with you more about being the best spot in Orange County to visit with your alums.  We truly appreciate you sharing your kind words about the friendly and pleasant service you received from our incredible associates here at the Doubletree Dana Point and we look forward to welcoming you back on a future visit.

Summary Heading: I shall name you the noisiest hotel in all the land.
Summary: Dear humans who come to this hotel for weddings.  Guess what, you don’t have to be a total a-hole and ruin the experience for people visiting for a relaxing weekend.    I had the pleasure of be kept awake all night by a wedding party who called me names for asking them the please stop screaming by my door.  Had to call the front desk to have security come up.  Finally relaxed from that, when the wedding returned at 1am.  The guy in the room next to me felt it his duty to stand in his door way and scream to all the other attendees where their rooms were.  Now I know the room numbers and drunken status of every wedding party attendee on the 4th floor.  How fun.  But wait there’s more!  3 am is apparently not to late for door slamming and yelling !  Just when you think you can get
Manager Response: Dear Rachel B,  Our most heartfelt and genuine apologies the actions of the wedding guests in close proximity to your room affected your overall experience at our hotel.  We understand your frustration as we pride ourselves on delivering a relaxing and peaceful atmosphere to accommodate all of our guests during their well deserved vacation time here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Our team will use this as a training opportunity to address similar situations in the future as a result of your feedback.  Please let us know when your future travel plans are to Orange County so we can "Make it Right" during your next visit.

Summary: Great location and super comfortable bed. Must pay for parking if you have personal car.  We decided to rent one after making reservations not sure if it was told up front.  Deck is nice, bar quality food available
Manager Response: Dear kmb713,  We definitely could not agree with you more that it is all about "Location, Location, Location" and the Doubletree Dana Point definitely has it all!  Conveniently located just 8 miles south of Laguna Beach on world famous Pacific Coast Hwy, half way between LA and San Diego and our close proximity to everything that makes Dana Point a tourist's dream destination from ocean beach activities to whale watching tours.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your feedback with us, it is truly appreciated.

Summary Heading: Spacious and clean rooms, amazing staff
Summary: The rooms are well kept, spacious and clean. The entire staff were friendly and professional, from housekeeping to breakfast staff to front desk, everyone is accommodating and amazing! The location is great, with a wonderful view of the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Y6955LKdonnam,  Reading your rave review of the Doubletree Dana Point definitely made our day and genuinely appreciate you sharing your experience with us!  Our stunning ocean and Doheny Beach views, clean and spacious guest room suites and our phenomenal team members make us the ideal hotel when visiting Orange County for leisure or business.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and truly appreciate you being a valued guest at our hotel.

Summary Heading: Charming Hotel Tucked Away with Beautiful Ocean View
Summary: Hotel is nestled up against a cove overlooking Doheny Beach.  The architecture is very unique and creative, and the design was thoughtfully planned out to afford excellent views from the rooms facing the ocean, as well as several romantic lounging decks with expansive, panoramic views of the sea.  No Jacuzzi, and the pool is small, but it is kept pleasantly warm.  The rooms are very comfortable and the staff is excellent.  The breakfast does not include meat, but it is otherwise delightful with hot potatoes, eggs, fresh fruit and delicious pastries.  We were very happy with our stay and would certainly consider returning.
Manager Response: Dear valerierichswift,  We are forever grateful for your five bubble review and simply elated the Doubletree Dana Point exceeded all of your expectations during your recent summer vacation with us!  Thank you so very much for all of your kind words about our phenomenal ocean views overlooking world famous Doheny Beach, our comfortable guestroom suites and our fantastic team members.  We look forward to welcoming you back to your new favorite beach house on your next visit to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Not a great advert for the Hilton Group
Summary: A very disappointing experience. We needed a overnight room ahead of taking the ferry in the morning to Santa Catalina.  Why.?  1)The a/c pump was poorly serviced and knocked like a piston on a cycle every three seconds. We turned up whilst out to cool room and then switched off.  2) There are two security lights that were on all night outside our back window. The curtain did not draw properly so left a shaft of light entering. I had to resort to my BA night sleeper Google’s to cut out the light. That’s not right for a US$ 285 room a night. Do not stay in 257.
Manager Response: Dear aholyman,  Our most sincere apologies we did not exceed your expectations during your recent overnight visit with us.  We share your frustration in regards to the issues you experienced with the air conditioning unit in your room since we just recently replaced every air conditioning unit in all of our guest rooms.   We will have our engineering team address it immediately based on your feedback and truly appreciate you bringing it to our attention.  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and hopeful you will give us another chance on a future visit to Dana Point.

Summary: My wife and 3 kids ages 4, 9, and 12 shared a 1 King bed with Sofabed in seperate living area.   The room  was confortable with a descent view of the ocean from the second floor.   I recommend requesting a floors 3 or 4.     The only complate I had with the room was the smell.  It may be time for the hotel to replace the carpet, sofa or bed itself.   Something in the room had a distinct odor.   Other than that, we enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear vladamson,  We are glad you and your family enjoyed our comfortable guestroom suite and magnificent ocean views during your recent vacation with us here at the Doubletree Dana Point!    On behalf of all of our associates, please accept our most genuine apologies your guest room did not have a fresh ocean breeze scent and impacted your overall experience with us.  Our housekeeping team has been made aware as a result of your feedback and we can assure you our carpets and furniture are professionally cleaned as needed.  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and hope to welcome you back on a future visit to Orange County.

Summary: After recent update this property looks better than ever. The staff are universally professional, friendly and accommodating. Only subtracted a star because while the room rate is only fairly expensive, the add on resort fee and high parking fee add significantly to the nightly rate.
Manager Response: Dear QuartzSand,  So glad to hear you thoroughly enjoyed our all guestroom suite renovation since your last visit and truly appreciate you being a repeat guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Thank you so very much for your four bubble review and look forward to welcoming you back to your favorite beach house in the future.

Summary: We came for the Blues Festival.  We really enjoyed the location.  I was a bit worried that it would be loud at night due to the location on Highway 1, but with the sliding doors closed, it was very quiet and I slept very well.  I definitely recommend this hotel and its stellar location.
Manager Response: Dear LaFollette,  We certainly hope you enjoyed the annual Doheny Blues Festival as much we appreciate you staying with us here at the Doubletree Dana Point during your recent visit!  Our "stellar location", immaculate Pacific Ocean views and our close proximity to world famous Doheny Beach make us the ideal vacation spot in Orange County.  Thank you so very much for sharing your feedback with us, it is genuinely appreciated.

Summary Heading: Great staff but a little pricey
Summary: The hotel staff here is very welcoming and accommodating. Overall the deluxe room was a good size but the bathroom was small.  Sleeping was interrupted several times from the guests next door as they were in and out constantly and the door would slam shut very loudly.
Manager Response: Dear CaliBluesCat,  Outstanding news to hear you enjoyed our all suite hotel deluxe guest room and experienced the authentic hospitality that the Doubletree Dana Point has become known for over the years!  Please accept our sincere apologies for the disturbance you experienced from the adjacent guest room.  We do our absolute best to address those concerns as they occur to minimize the impact on your overall experience.  Thank you so very much for being a valued guest here at the Doubletree Dana Point

Summary: The staff was amazing an dmade us feel welcomed from check in to check out. Pool is heated at about 85F which was great for the kids since the weather was not really cooperating . Hotel s also across from the beach and about 15 minutes from Laguna. We will be visiting again - Thank you very much for the great service.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony P,  We are simply elated you and your family were able to experience the authentic hospitality from all of our incredible team members here at the Doubletree Dana Point and found it to be a great hotel and ideal location for your well deserved family vacation!  You are always welcome at the best beach house in Orange County for all of your future visits to Southern California.  On behalf of all of our team members, thank you so very much for staying with us and we truly value your loyalty to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Not on the beach, but close
Summary: Stayed one night for work and was disappointed to see that the hotel is actuallly across two streets from the beach. My room overlooked the parking lot and train tracks. Not ideal. Parking is a bit expensive (it always bugs me when hotels charge for self parking on their own property). I may return, and ask for a water view, and see if my opions change.
Manager Response: Dear ColleenQD,  Our most sincere apologies you were not extremely satisfied with the room view during your recent trip to Dana Point and definitely encourage you to check out our amazing ocean view rooms on your next visit to Orange County and your opinion will be sure to change.    Beach proximity parking is always at a premium up and down Pacific Coast Hwy and we also offer valet parking at the same price as self parking as an additional level of service for our guests to minimize the hassle of searching for a parking spot.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us.

Summary: We had such a wonderful experience at this hotel, it exceeded our expectations in every way. The hotel, location, the staff, and the room were very impressive. Plus it was walking distance to the beach, which is where we spent our entire day. I would absolutely recommend this hotel .
Manager Response: Dear Imsamiam,  We are simply elated the Doubletree Dana Point exceeded your expectations in every way possible during your recent vacation with us.  Our hotel offers the best of all worlds with our super close proximity to the ocean at Doheny Beach, convenient location on Pacific Coast Hwy with breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean, our impressive guestroom suites and phenomenal associates.   Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and truly appreciate you spending your vacation with us!

Summary: It has been a few years since I was last here.  The rooms are updated and looks better.  Decent breakfast, and check in was easy and there was plenty of parking.   The surrounding streets are busy but not too bad.  The viggest issue is that the hotel is right in between roads that are busy and lots of traffic so it can get noisy with all kinds of vehicles passing through.  I guess unless you really need to be in this area i.e. beach or work, the hotel is out of the way.  At night the they shut down some elevators and so you might have to walk all the way around the parking to get up. They usually have great rates so for me coming from cold weather to warm I do not mind.  Also they have a decent breakfast with ready made sandwiches and things that you can take on the go which I
Manager Response: Dear DKO1K,  We truly value you being a repeat guest at the Doubletree Dana Point and thrilled you enjoyed our extensive hotel renovation since your last visit with us!  Pacific Coast Hwy is one of the most pristine stretches of roadways in the country running up and down the California Coast. Due to the enhanced scenic ocean views around our hotel our location sometimes experiences a spike in activity as a result of these breathtaking scenic overlooks from Pacific Coast Hwy.  Thank you so very much for your detailed review and we look forward to welcoming you back to the best kept secret in Orange County in the near future!

Summary: They did not honor my requests at checkin. Advertised a room with a view but the view was of the highway. The room was noisy, poorly maintained and dirty. Parking was expensive and $25 per day + tip for valet.
Manager Response: Dear kennethg347,  Please allow me the opportunity to extend my sincerest apologies for the less than perfect experience you described and our hotel team is disappointed we did not exceed your expectations.  We do our absolute very best to accommodate all guest requests when it comes to certain room types, but unfortunately guest demand exceeds the supply with some of our ocean view rooms.  It is our mission to be the cleanest and friendliest hotel in Orange County and truly hope you will be kind enough to allow us another opportunity to demonstrate our best in class hospitality during a future visit.   Thank you so very much for sharing your valuable feedback with us

Summary: Stopped here on my way down to San Diego.  Property definitely has a great location.  Close to beach and shops and only minutes from San Juan Capistrano.  Restaurant was under renovation a nice continental breakfast was provided.  Definitely a nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Royston S,  We can not agree with you more that our "great location" right on Pacific Coast Hwy, seconds off highway I 5, close proximity to Laguna Beach/San Juan Capistrano, adjacent to Doheny Beach and half way in between LA and San Diego is why the Doubletree Dana Point is the ideal place to stay when visiting Southern California.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your feedback and your four bubble review!

Summary: Stayed here two weeks ago for work. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I had the 4th floor suite, very cute little suite, clean and very much updated.   I was not that far from the rooftop bar and my stay was quiet and had no disturbance. Enjoyed my little patio, walk to the beach was a plus.   One thing I didn’t care for is the parking situation for guests. There are no street parking and no guest parking. The hotel itself is smacked in the middle of the roads so that itself was rather awkward. Other than that, can’t complain.
Manager Response: Dear happygolucky813,  Our daily goal revolves around being the cleanest and friendliest beach front property in Orange County and thrilled we were able to deliver that promise during your recent work visit here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Thank you so very much for sharing your experience with us and appreciate your feedback regarding the parking options here at our hotel.

Summary: Just wanted to give a huge shout out to Sergio our Banquet Captain and Rita!!!!! Super friendly and helped with everything we needed for our event. Every request was responded with a smile and a solution. Josh in valet was super nice and welcoming. Fun property with lots of room decks and great views! Thank you Double Tree our event went great!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Nichole T,  It was an absolute honor to be part of such a momentous occasion and celebration with your family and friends!  It truly is one of the best aspects of our daily lives when we get to be a part of such phenomenal events like the 50th wedding anniversary you attended here at the Doubletree Dana Point.  We appreciate you acknowledging our banquet and valet teams and the authentic hospitality they provided during your event!  We will be sure to recognize all of the associates you mentioned and share your comments with the entire hotel team.  Thank you so very much for allowing us to host and be a part of the celebration!

Summary: Beautiful place to stay. Many excellent restaurants and interesting shops near by, even a Costo! Hahaha. The beach across the street from the hotel is very nice. The hotel staff was very nice and courteous. Parking fee was quite high... same for self or valet. Do valet, the attendant very nice and offers good recommendation. Over all a very nice stay.
Manager Response: Dear 280waynet,  We are absolutely delighted to hear you thought the Doubletree Dana Point was a "cool place" to just kick it and hang out for a few days!  Your shout out for our "nice and courteous" hotel team is genuinely appreciated as they bring personality to the hotel creating that cool vibe you experienced.  Beach front parking is always at a premium up and down the Orange County Coast.  The parking fee guarantees every guest has a parking spot or our amazing valets will take care it for our guests.  Thank you so very much for your five bubble review and hope to hang out with you again in the very near future!

Summary Heading: Not perfect, but I'm coming back
Summary: This isn't your typical Hilton, but I really like it. The location is great! A quick walk from the beach and close to the highway. A 10 minute Uber from Laguna Beach. A fantastic view of the ocean. A rooftop lounge with an ocean view. One of the best free breakfasts I've found anywhere. I found the valets, front desk staff and roof top bar staff very friendly.  Our room had a certain smell I can't describe, maybe age. The second night our AC went out. It was late and with the open window it was ok so I didn't call maintenance.  While checking out I mentioned the AC to the desk clerk who apologized but also took  $20 off of drinks we had credited to the room.  Definitely staying here next time I have business in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Mark M,  One of our motto's here at the Doubletree Dana is point is, "if we strive for perfection, we will definitely achieve greatness!"  We appreciate you mentioning all of the AMAZING attributes our hotel offers from our breath taking ocean views, close proximity to Laguna Beach and our best in class authentic hospitality from our associates.  Our most sincere apologies for the AC issues you experienced during your stay and can definitely assure you our team will continue to "make it right" between now and your next visit.  Thank you so very much for taking your valuable time to share your vacation experience with us!

Summary: Very dated rooms. And don't get next to the construction or trash bins. No rest.  I had stains in my carpet. Hair in my shower. The tun had a had time draining. Which meant that I had to be in standing water while taking a shower.  Not again.
Manager Response: Dear ericvbeard,  Please accept our most sincere apologies for your recent visit and can assure you this was an isolated experience.  Unfortunately there is never a good time to perform a kitchen renovation and truly sorry it affected your stay with us.  Thank you for sharing your valuable observations regarding your guest room as it allows us the opportunity to address valuable retraining topics with our team to improve the guest experience moving forward.  We truly value you being a guest at the Doubletree Doheny Beach and hope you will reconsider us for your future vacation plans.

Summary: Absolutely perfect, the service was cruise ship quality, staff was perfect. Would recommend to large group, A+++.... We had about 175 people in our conference, best dinner, service, and food. Thanks to all at Doheny Beach DoubleTree!  Scott
Manager Response: Dear cbsoa,  We are forever grateful for the A+++ grade and Trip Advisor five bubble review!  Thank you a million times over for recommending the Doubletree Dana Point Doheny Beach for large business groups with our hotel offering both indoor and flexible outdoor meeting space.  The recognition and acknowledgement of the amazing service offered by our award winning associates is truly appreciated and will be sure to share your comments with our entire hotel team.

Summary Heading: Great room, great location and excellent staff!
Summary: Ocean view with an easy walk to the beach and park.  The hotel had guest parking and the check in process was quick and efficient.    I was there attending a conference and the conference accommodations were large and well kept  I can’t say enough about the friendly staff.  I would stay again with no hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear Mark F,  Wonderful to hear you enjoyed your group conference visit with us here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our spacious suite guest rooms, ideal location and friendly associates make us the perfect hotel for both group and leisure guests.  Thank you so much for your raving review of our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Great location - amenities were good - breakfast, surprisingly good.  Fire pit, roof top bar, great views, and super close to Doheny beach! We just walked across the street! Valet  - SUPER NICE DUDES! Hotel is dated, but was very clean.  Other staff - just meh....but I would totally go back.
Manager Response: Dear Creecy U,  Was awesome hanging out with you during your recent visit and thanks for all of the shout outs that make Doubletree Dana Point the ideal Orange County beach vacation spot!  Thrilled to hear you will definitely be coming back and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: One of our favorite Hilton hotels! The ocean view room was our happy place. We would love to wake up with that view every day! Rooftop bar was great. Very clean property. Bicycle friendly. If you don’t bring a bike, rent one. We’ll be back here for sure!!!
Manager Response: Dear dslarson1983,  What an incredible and rewarding compliment to be rated as one of your favorite Hilton Hotels!  We consider the Doubletree Dana Point everyone's "happy place" with our ideal proximity to the beach, phenomenal ocean views from Longboard roof top lounge and our amazing friendly associates providing exceptional service to all of our guests.  Thank you so very much for your five circle review and we can't wait to visit with you again in the future.

Summary: We spent 4 nights here for spring break.  It was lovely.  The room was clean, beds were comfortable, nice ocean views, friendly helpful staff, they have bikes and boogie boards to rent, heated pool, and a short walk to the beach make this a wonderful place to stay.  The Rooftop lounge has a great view and has a cozy fire pit for chilly evenings.  The rooms have a sofa bed and mini refrigerator (no microwave).  The hotel has to be approached by going South on the 1, which can be a bit tricky, but totally worth it.
Manager Response: Dear lablonde14,  No better way to spend your lovely Spring Break 2018 then ocean side at the Doubletree Dana Point in tropical Orange County.   You undoubtedly acknowledged all of our hotel's key attributes that make us the ideal vacation spot from our friendly associates, incredible ocean views, clean and comfortable guestroom suites, Longboard roof top lounge and several cozy fire pits throughout the property.  Thank you so very much for your five circle review and we look forward to hosting your next vacation get away!

Summary: This hotel is in a great location across from Doheny Beach.  The hotel has been newly renovated and is very clean.  The staff were very attentive and professional.  They advertise the breakfast as continental but much more than that.
Manager Response: Dear EngergeticTraveler9,  We truly value your feedback of the Doubletree Dana Point and appreciate your kind words regarding our team members here at the hotel.  Our associates give our gorgeous beach front location personality, so thank you for giving them a shout out!  We certainly hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: This is an older hotel but it is very nice. The rooms are larger suites with a pull out sofa. The front of the hotel faces the ocean and there is a roof top bar that has great views. Rooms have been renovated in a modern style. The kitchen is still being remodeled so you may hear some construction noise. On the plus side they are offering free breakfast while the kitchen is being remodeled. Getting in and out of the parking lot is a bit tricky because of a one way street. All in all nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Dale R,  Thank you so very much for your detailed review of the Doubletree Dana Point!    Our phenomenal roof top bar, all suite hotel and limited time complimentary breakfast make our hotel the perfect Spring Break choice for both business or leisure travel.  Doheny Surf Restaurant will be re-opening to guests in May 2018.   We will be unveiling our new menu and super excited for our guests to try our Chef's delicious menu items.

Summary: Celebrated a big birthday at Double Tree Suites by Hilton Doheny Beach!  Wonderful suite, incredible view!  Great access to beach!  Team members were all excellent from check in to check out!  Recommending to all my family and friends!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear rodis58,  You recommending and endorsing our hotel to all of your family friends is one of the most incredible compliments we could ever hope to receive!  We truly hope everyone enjoyed the birthday celebration and truly appreciate you taking your valuable time to share your vacation with us.  Definitely looking forward to hosting you and all of your family and friends visits in the future!

Summary Heading: Snowed-out of NJ at the Doubletree in Dana Point!
Summary: My family and I got stuck in SoCal for a few extra days thanks to a major snow storm that hit the East Coast. We were stranded at LAX and the earliest flight we could home was out of SNA today so we rented a car and drove to the Doubletree in Dana Point. I travel extensively for work, so I know a good hotel when I see one and this property is top notch. The rooms are large, beach themed, very comfortable and spotless, and the complimentary breakfast is fantastic (and much appreciated). But the best part of the experience is the staff - every single person we interacted with seems to genuinely love their job and care about the customer’s experience. We’re so lucky to have found this place and can’t wait to return for a longer stay. Thank you Sofiane and team for making all our
Manager Response: Dear 29747Anna_W,  While we certainly wish the circumstances were better for initially discovering the Doubletree Dana Point due to your travel disruptions, we are simply elated our team was able to make the most of it for you and your family.    There is no better area to be snowed in at then a gorgeous all guestroom suite hotel, phenomenal ocean views, close proximity to Doheny Beach and all of the other wonderful places Laguna Beach/Orange County have to offer all of our guests.   Thank you so very much for your gracious comments regarding our outstanding associates and hope your travels back home went off without a hitch.  We sincerely hope to welcome you back to your new beach house on your future visits to Southern California.

Summary: I brought my family along on a business trip and had the best time ever! The staff was so attentive, patient, and caring in every facet of our experience! Yeah Doubletree! What an awesome experience! I wish I could post pictures of our experiences interacting with this awesome property and staff!
Manager Response: It truly was an honor to host your "AWESOME" recent visit with us here at the Doubetree Dana Point and glad you were able to mix business and leisure family time during your stay!  Thank you so very much for your glowing endorsement of our incredible associates and we all certainly hope to see you again on your next family vacation.

Summary: Bright and clean — across the road from Doheny State Beach. Easy walk.  Gracious staff.  Only bad mark would be their sliding bathroom doors with gaps and are not soundproof. Shower also awkward. You have to get in the shower to start the shower.
Manager Response: Dear milcosta2015,  We truly value you spending your vacation with us and elated you enjoyed our phenomenal proximity to Doheny Beach and gracious associates.  Thank you for sharing your comments regarding the bath area and we will be sure to address it during our next scheduled renovation and appreciate you providing us with this valuable feedback.

Summary: This is a newly rennovated hotel with an excellent location. Love the view from the rooftop lounge and recommend that you pay the extra to have at least a partial ocean view. However, even if you do not want to pay the extra, you won't be disappointed. The rooms are a nice size and definitely cater to the business client. The valet service was excellent, as well as the rooftop lounge service. But, the reception desk staff definitely needs improvement. They are the ones who set the first impression of the hotel and my four to five different interactions with them, over the phone as well as in person, did not produce a positive image. They are curt, condescending, impatient in their tone of voice and rude. There was only one nice young man that seemed to understand the meaning of
Manager Response: Dear JO92373,  Thank you for sharing all of the positive attributes our gorgeous hotel offers our guests from our recently renovated suites and the panoramic ocean views from our Longboard rooftop lounge.  Our most genuine apologies for the service encounters you experienced with our team and truly value your feedback.  We assure you this was an isolated experience and will utilize it as a training opportunity to improve the overall guest experience moving forward.  We certainly hope this encounter does not deter you from future visits to Dana Point and would be so grateful for another opportunity to win you over with the authentic hospitality culture the Doubletree Doheny Beach is known for in Orange County.

Summary: This hotel is a gem.  Beautiful design, the beach ambience, Great location, staff and amenities all make it a treasure.  Will definately stay again.  They have bike rentals and a crosswalk with traffic light to get from the hotel to the beach easily.
Manager Response: Dear Shelly R,  Thank you so very much for your raving "Gem by the Ocean" review of the Doubletree Dana Point and we agree whole heartily!  We definitely look forward to welcoming you back to your new beach house treasure on your next visit to Orange County.

Summary Heading: Amazing Pacific Ocean views and beautiful hotel
Summary: Our room was ocean-facing on the 3rd floor and the view was spectacular!  The room had two double beds and a pull out sofa with a small fridge.  The bathroom and decor were both nice.  Very comfortable beds.  We especially enjoyed the service in the restaurant; complimentary breakfast is included.  Gloria, Lisa, and Jacqueline were friendly and helpful and made our stay that much better!
Manager Response: Dear Benjamin K,  That is awesome you enjoyed the spectacular ocean views and our beautiful hotel here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  Our breakfast service team is definitely some of the best in the business providing authentic hospitality and genuine care to all guests we encounter.  We will be sure to recognize our associates as a result of your feedback for going above and beyond during your stay with us.  Thank you so very much for your five circle review and hope to see you again in the very near future.

Summary: Stayed here while attending a wedding at the Ritz. This hotel checked all the boxes and we had a great time here despite not using the pool.  Location is close enough to the beach and the staff/service was top notch.  Gym is a little small, but functional.
Manager Response: Dear davidcaptain,  Sounds like you thoroughly enjoyed your weekend visit to Dana Point and were able to experience everything our phenomenal coastal location has to offer!  Thank you for the shout out regarding our top notch guest service and all star associates exemplifying authentic hospitality  It was an absolute honor to have you as our guest and truly value you staying with us!

Summary: We went to the roof top bar and the view was pretty good. There was some kind of pre wedding party going on and was busy but Luis was great in attending to us, kids pizza was a bit small but edible. The room on second floor was as described. View from third floor may be better.
Manager Response: Dear aneyeforyou,  Thank you for hanging out and spending your weekend with us here at Doheny Beach in beautiful Dana Point!  Our Longboard rooftop bar is by far one of the best spots in Orange County to chill-ax at and take in the gorgeous Pacific Ocean views  We look forward to welcoming you back as our guest on your next visit to Southern California!

Summary: We wanted to get a hotel for the weekend with a great view and the DoubleTree certainly delivered.   Hosting a gorgeous beach view and cozy rooms, this place is a fantastic getaway!   Best of all were the employees! We were checked in by the manager, Sofiane, who welcomed us warmly and when we went to check out the rooftop bar (a must do!) he even came up to wish my friends a happy birthday.   It was great to have someone remember even the smallest details in passing conversation and every other employee was just as welcoming. We went downstairs to the breakfast they were offering and every worker wished us a good morning and asked how we were doing.   If you’re down in Dana Point, then I would recommend the DoubleTree as your go to hotel the view and the service can’t be beat!
Manager Response: Dear Rinn_MG,  Such a wonderful experience you shared with us and elated you enjoyed your weekend getaway here at the Doubletree Dana Point!  By far our ideal location to Doheny Beach, gorgeous ocean views and over the top guest service makes us the hotel of choice when enjoying everything Orange County has to offer.  Thank you so much for taking your valuable time to share your visit with us!

Summary Heading: They did an Amazing Job at Listening to Your Feedback
Summary: After seeing many complaints about this location, I was a little nervous about staying here.  The hotel has really put in a lot of effort to create a more positive experience and listened to past guests reviews.  In the last 6 months, DoubleTree took the initiative to make this place really worth staying at and I can contend to that.  Our stay was very pleasant and we would do it again!
Manager Response: Dear 149king,  By far this is one of our top 10 favorite reviews ever!    We are over the moon with joy and excitement that you were kind enough to overlook the one off reviews and had a phenomenal experience at the Doubletree Dana Point.  Our team is extremely diligent and focused to providing the best possible guest experience and we are only going to continue to exceed all guest expectations in the future.  Thank you so very much for your five circle review and look forward to welcoming you back to your new favorite Orange County beach house.

Summary: A very unique hotel, with a boutique feel to it. Clean large suites, some with balconies and many with ocean view. And what a view!! Kitchen to the restaurant is closed for Reno after a fire so they are serving a continental breakfast for free to make up. Literally the nicest continental breakfast we have seen, and we have seen a lot! The women that work in there are very hard workers and really sweet. Front desk  supervisor was also great and sent us on our way with a couple of bottles of water. The most amazing thing about this place outside the people is the incredible roof top lounge/bar. Wow!! Also Beach is right across the street, a 3 minute walk onto Doheny Beach State Beach.
Manager Response: Dear 1056trooper,  We truly value your raving five circle review of the Doubletree Dana Point and appreciate the compliments regarding the amazing guest service you received during your recent stay with us.  Our ideal Pacific Coast Hwy address close to the ocean and location near Interstate 5 makes us the ideal hotel of choice when visiting Orange County.  We genuinely hope to see you again in the very near future and welcome you back as our guests.

Summary: If you are even considering this hotel for your stay in beautiful Dana Point...book now.  We shopped around and considered all our options for a dog-friendly hotel with ocean views and this lovely place had everything we wanted.  What we didn't know at the time was that the service would put this Hilton over the top for us, ensuring that we would be back in the future.  Erin arranged for an early check-in which started our weekend off perfectly.  We were celebrating my husband's 40th birthday and getting in early was an excellent start for our celebration.  She happily provided us with one of the better rooms as a birthday present; we did not ask for this, the room was available and she is thoughtful and we were grateful.  Thank you so much, Erin!   We were looking for a
Manager Response: Without a doubt we are the best dog friendly hotel in Orange County and thrilled you had a phenomenal experience!  Our ideal location to the beach and ocean is perfect for both our four legged guests and their owners.  Thank you for sharing your extremely valuable feedback and your kind words regarding our super star associates.  We will be sure to recognize them for providing you with the authentic hospitality the Doubletree Doheny Beach is known for here in the Laguna Beach/Dana Point area.  We look forward to welcoming you back to your new favorite beach house in the future!

Summary: Comfortable rooms. The hotel is a bit outdated, but not bad.  It was clean. The continental breakfast was really good and the staff is friendly. Some rooms require a bit of a hike to get to and one can get lost looking for an elevator. Also, its a bit of a hike to get to the Ocean and to any restaurants, but if your up for some Ocean air, the walk is good for you.   All in all it was a pleasant experience.
Manager Response: We are extremely pleased to hear you had a pleasant experience and positive service interactions with our friendly associates here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach.  It is a pleasant walk to the beach and harbor, but once you are there it is well worth it to see all the splendor that Dana Point has to offer our visiting guests.  Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your experience with us, it is truly appreciated!

Summary: Staff was very helpful, and the outdoor space was nice. Unfortunately a fire eliminated food service during our visit, but they managed to bring in good catering. Conference rooms are very nice, however hallway spaces crowd quickly for large groups. Oh, and the elevators are painfully slow, even for the staff :).
Manager Response: Dear Cory F,  Our outdoor space is an excellent way to break up the downtime in between conference meetings and the beach is also close by to revitalize in between sessions.  The Doheny Surf kitchen renovation is currently under way and making progress every day towards our grand reopening.  Thank you for your kind words regarding the helpfulness of our associates and truly appreciate your comments.

Summary: The breakfast was terrible. Might as well offer nothing. I had booked last minute and didn't see that the kitchen was broken and tried to cancel but couldn't. Good location but not worth the money and time
Manager Response: Dear Astroteam5,  We are so terribly sorry you were inconvenienced by our kitchen renovation and were not a fan of the complimentary breakfast options we are currently providing our guests.  Please know we are frequently testing new breakfast menu items to offer in the mean time given our current limitations of not having full use of our kitchen equipment.  We genuinely hope to welcome you back in the future once our kitchen renovation is complete.  Thank you for sharing your experience with us

Summary Heading: Hotel upgrades are good but no resteraunt.
Summary: Hotel is improved since a few months ago. New a/c is a big improvement. However, the location makes it a must to have an operable resteraunt. The fourth floor lounge offered some food but very little for a week stay. Breakfast was disappointing. Do not eat the sauage/egg biscuits. Not good. There is some fresh fruit so stick to that. Again they need their resteraunt back.
Manager Response: Dear royd873,  Thank you so very much for being a return guest to the Doubletree Dana Point and appreciate you acknowledging the hotel improvements since your last visit.  We completely understand your frustration due to temporarily not having an operable restaurant while our kitchen restaurant renovation is in progress.  Our restaurant grand reopening date is getting closer and closer every day and our goal is to have it open by your next visit for your enjoyment.  We look forward to seeing you again soon and truly appreciate your patience and understanding during the renovation process.

Summary: This hotel was great from arrival to check-out! Staff was very personable to the people at the front desk, to the service staff at the bar/lounge area. Loved the location, view, and the room was very comfortable.!
Manager Response: Dear Matthew S,  We are forever grateful for your enthusiastic review of the Doubletree Dana Point and truly value you sharing your phenomenal experience with us!  Thank You, Thank You, Thank You!

Summary: All staff are amazing!  From the Valet to the front desk to the complimentary breakfast hostess!  Highly recommend!!  Manager, Sofiane Lahouasnia on duty was incredible and made us feel at home.  LOVE IT! We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear kristybrothers,  Thank you for your rave review of our hotel team and elated you were extremely satisfied with the authentic hospitality service you received from our amazing associates during your stay!  We strive to make the Doubletree Dana Point a vacation home for all of our guests and thrilled you were able to experience it first hand!  Can't wait to welcome you back home during your next vacation to Dana Point/Laguna Beach!

Summary Heading: Convenient, Friendly place to stay in OC
Summary: We spent a nice few days in this hotel recently.  The staff were all very helpful and accomodating.  We used the beach cruiser bikes that the hotel owns which worked out well.  The breakfast was pretty good and well organized.
Manager Response: Dear babyfishmouth77,  You genuinely brightened our day sharing your feedback about your recent visit with us and truly value your top notch review of the gorgeous Doubletree Dana Point!  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orange County!

Summary Heading: Great location, staff, and overall stay
Summary: The hotel made the stay here even better then expected. we were greeted atthe door and immediately asked if we wasnted a free upgrade. The staff, no matter what time was friendly and helpful. A speical thank you to Erin and JAC for making my first time to California a great time! when i come back I will stay here!
Manager Response: Dear Devin S,  That is awesome you had such an amazing first time visit to Orange County California and we were thrilled to be a part of the experience with you!  Out of all of the options you had to choose from the Doubletree Dana Point is the best location close to Laguna Beach, Disneyland and located halfway between Los Angeles and San Diego.  Thank you for acknowledging our outgoing and friendly associates you encountered and appreciate you taking your valuable to share your feedback with us.

Summary: The view from the hotel is great. There is a road and an RV park between the hotel and the ocean, but the visibility to the ocean is still really good. The higher floors have less road noise, so choose that if possible. Surely some of the rooms have better views than others, but we specifically booked a room that guaranteed a view. The bathrooms could use a few other amenities, like towel hook/bars, and some counter space. While the bathroom is modern and looks very sleek, the practicality of it is mostly useless if you want to hang up a towel or robe, and use the sink area for any counter space at all. There are 2 small shelves that can store things nicely, but if you travel with a lot of bathroom stuff there's really nowhere to put it all. Again, minor details compared to the
Manager Response: Dear Kristin R,  We are thrilled you enjoyed the gorgeous sunset views from your guestroom balcony as well as Longboard our family friendly rooftop lounge.  Thank you for your comments regarding the bathroom design and lay out and will be sure to address these items when we begin planning our next room renovation.  Our leadership team will definitely recognize and reward our all star associate based on the guest service you received and very much appreciate your compliment.   It was an absolute honor to host your family vacation and already looking forward to welcoming you back as our guest in the future.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel as a family of 4 people during a road trip. The breakfast was handy and well organized. Standard but good quality items. Room was clean and big.
