Thank you so much for staying with us!   We are all at your service, feel free to reach out any time.   Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: This is the 6th event our company has held at this hotel. The service is always outstanding and you can't beat the location! Since the hotel has been updated, the exeperience is even better. The rooms are very clean and modern. The meeting space is great. We are big fans of the food. It is not "hotel food." The staff is very accomodating and responsive- very important to me when choosing a vendor for a company gathering. I highly recommend Doubletree Doheny Beach.
Manager Response: Greetings,  I am delighted to read that your event went well. Your recognition of our service and food quality have been properly shared, we are so happy to know that you are completely satisfied!   We all look forward to your next event, thank you very much for your loyalty!  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Stayed in the 4th floor. The hotel just went through a makeover. They did a good job with what they had to work with........., The rooftop bar was a great place to spend evenings. The food on the rooftop bar was very good. No real reason to leave. Great drinks, Great food. Also had a ping pong table that provided some great evening entertainment. Breakfast in the morning was also very good.
Manager Response: Hello,  I am glad to know you enjoyed your stay with us, thank you very much for sharing your review. Our refresh was extensive and we are so proud to have completed it.   Your recognition of the efforts of the team members at Moquila Agave Bar and in our restaurant Doheny Surf are appreciated very much and have been shared. Thank you!  We all look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: We didn't know what to expect since we booked last minute for a room here.  Af first sight, the hotel is right out of central casting from a '60's beach movie and in truth, is a bit frayed around the edges.  But the place is really nice!  The amenities are not modern by today's standards, but the STAFF!  The staff are over the top friendly and this makes any travel experience memorable.  Pamela at the front desk was very helpful and charming.  If you are a Hilton Honors member, you get breakfast vouchers as well. The hotel itself is a bit hard to find in Dana Point; hint to travelers, stay to the right side of the road as you come in and then the hotel is on your left.  You can easily go whizzing by. We suggest the hotel place more conspicuous signs on the way in.
Manager Response: Dear Tony,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. We all appreciate your recognition of our efforts, thank you!!!  Thank you very much for your suggestion related to signage as well as for your hint to others, very helpful and appreciated.   We all appreciate you staying with us and look forward to welcoming you back now that you know about us.   Best regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: This is a dumpy hotel for the money. Not at all a typical Double Tree hotel. The standard rooms are like a cheap motel. The color scheme is cheeses. The pool is small. Parking is $22/day.  Rooftop bar is nice but overall this property disappoints.
Manager Response: Dear Eric,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. I sincerely appreciate your mention related to Moquila, our roof top bar, than you very much!  I am truly sorry to read that our hotel did not meet your expectations and hope to have the opportunity to discuss the particulars with you in the event you have a few minutes. Your complete satisfaction is very important to me and to our team. My contact information is below, I look forward to the opportunity of speaking to you.   We do our very best at communicating our fees in our website as well as in the websites of our third party partners. I am sorry you were not aware of our parking fees.   Thank you very much for staying with us, I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Dana Point.   With warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Turned out more then we expected... The staff was over the top helpful from car check in to front desk ! We ended up renting two rooms and the front desk was more then   Accommodating Had a great weekend thank you
Manager Response: Dear Blake,  Thank you so very much for sharing your review. I am delighted to read that the highlight of your stay was our team members, this makes me so proud to read. I have shared your kind recognition with the team members as I visited their areas this week. Thank you!   We all look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard,uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: My associates and I recently attended a business luncheon here.  While I had been here several years ago to enjoy the rooftop lounge, I had not been back since the remodel was completed.  The entire facility is light and bright and is quintessential of Southern California coastal chic, which is expected as it is literally directly across the street from the beach.  The modern restaurant provided us with with a great meal, service, and overall presentation.  I also took notice of the abundant buffet area used for the continental breakfast.  At the conclusion of our lunch we were treated to a tour of the property by the sales manager, Judith Serrato.  Judith explained that the property was once apartments, which would explain the spacious suites and bathrooms.  The rooms we saw
Manager Response: Dear Jason,  Thank you very much for sharing your review, your comments are so important to us all here at the hotel. We are all so glad our refresh has come to a conclusion, our hotel looks and feels like new :)   I have personally shared your recognition with Judith, I completely agree with you, she is GREAT! Thank  you very much.  We are all at your service, please feel free to reach out any time.   Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Had a great stay at this hotel. The hotel staff is awesome! This is a great location, right on Doheny Beach! It is a perfect hotel for business or leisure! An easy walk to the harbor area where there is plenty of places to eat and the Catalina Express boat that can take you to Catalina Island.
Manager Response: Dear Johnny,  Thank you so much for sharing your review. I have shared your recognition with our team members as I visited their areas this week, thank you very much for making time to share your comments.   We are all at your service today and in the future, please feel free to reach out any time.   With warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: My son got married and we had our rehearsal dinner and guests stay at this venue.  They could not have been more helpful.  Heather went above and beyond to make sure our experience and event went very smooth.  Which it did, thanks to her and the staff.  Definitely a weekend we will forever remember.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you very much for your review. I am so glad to read that your son's wedding went so well and that our team members took great care of you all during the course of your stay. Your kind recognition of Heather's efforts has been shared, thank you!!!   We all look forward to welcoming you back as the valued guests that you are to us here at the hotel.  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: I stayed at the doublee tree from may 6th and checked out on may 11th. I am slso a hilton diamond member. I was here for a conference and decided to come early for the weekend.  I could have stayed at the St.Regis but chose this hotel because of my loyality to hilton.    Pros: clean, nice rooftop bar, great breakfast, very nice rooms and friendly staff  Cons: noisy.  I stayed in room 382 and i could here everything above me.  I'm not going to complain about the highway noise because the hotel is on a highway. But I didn't like the fact that I could hear the person above me stomp around every night and morning.  On Friday night, someone tried to get in my room.  I'm positive they were drunk and confused, but as a woman traveling alone,  it's scary.  I called security and they
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. Thank you very much for your recognition related to our bar, breakfast, cleanliness, and friendly staff. It has been shared, thank you!  I can understand your frustration with the noise some of our guests were making during the hours of the evening. As well for the guest confusing your room with theirs. Please accept my most sincere apologies for not having reached out to you during the course of your stay. I am very interested in connecting with you so we can review the particulars, your complete satisfaction is very important to me. My contact information is below, I look forward to hearing from you.    Your DIAMOND Status with HHonors means very much to us all here at the hotel, thank you very much for your loyalty to our brand.   I am at your service today and in the future,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: well I always expect good service in a double tree hilton hotel and this one was a great disappointment. Both TVs in the room had bad screen and too over an hour for the technician to show up and fix it. The the AC did not work and I called front desk for over 15min to get an answer and the problem could not be fixed even though they offer me to change rooms but my daughter was soundly asleep. Be aware that the trail is right in front of the hotel too and beach access is thought out the camp site. so nothing is easy there even though the staff acted polite with "1.000 sorry sir" every time.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. I can understand your frustration with the AC unit and the TV's not working in your room. I have shared your valuable feedback with our Chief Engineer so that the proper steps are taken in an effort to prevent reoccurrence. Please accept my most sincere apologies for the inconveniences you experienced with these.  I truly hope that you will stay with us again during your next trip to Dana Point, I am at your service today and in the future, please feel free to reach out to me any time.  Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard,uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: After a long day of travelling with my family of 5 from the east coast, we expected to be welcomed in a clean and warm hotel.  The location was not condusive to tweens and young adults to move about.  The pool was in the parking lot.  The halls were musty.  The suite was terribly small.  And, there were silverfish in the tub!  NOT ACCEPTABLE AND WE HAD TO MOVE!!!
Manager Response: Dear Joe,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. I have had the opportunity to review the details of your stay, please accept my most sincere apologies for the inconvenience you experience with the silverfish in the bath tub. The room has been properly treated since your departure.  I can understand your frustration with the limited space for the 5 of you in your suite with the two double beds as well as the pull out sofa bed. We have recently made our rooms more spacious as part of our renovation with much smaller and space efficient furniture. I am truly sorry the room was not spacious enough for you and your family.   I trust that our efforts in providing compensation during your stay were to your satisfaction, we are all at your service today and in the future.   I look forward to being of service to you during your next trip to Dana Point.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary Heading: Location, relaxing, stress free, and great service!
Summary: We had such an amazing experience at this hotel. We used it as wedding central. All our guests had such a great time. From the front desk to the wait staff, everyone was so friendly. Heather was so accommodating and was always there to answer questions. She took care of everything. We kept the rooftop bar open after the wedding and we had many food and drink options! It was a great place to have an after party to continue the celebrating. The hotel was walking distance to the venue and to the beach. Great location and with great views.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly,  Thank you very much for sharing your review! CONGRATULATIONS on your wedding!!!! I am delighted to rad that Heather was there for you during such important time in your life. Your kind recognition has been shared, thank you!   Thank you for your mention related to our location and our great views :)   I look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary Heading: Relaxing, Clean great service and location
Summary: We used this hotel as Wedding central for my daughters wedding.  The accommodations were very nice and everyone had a great time.  The location gives people many options for activities.  The staff was very attentive  and helpful.  A great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Clark,  I am so glad to read that your daughter's special event was successful during your stay with us! Thank you very much for your kind recognition of the efforts of our team members, they have been shared :)   Thank you very much for choosing our hotel for such special time of your life, it means very much to us all here at the hotel. I look forward to welcoming you back soon.   With warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Very nice hotel! Very clean.  Super nice staff.  Food is great too.  Room was upgraded and comfortable.  Killer views and easy parking in the garage.  Noticed lots of dogs and parking was a little pricey but other than that, great hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  I sincerely appreciate you making time to share your review. I have shared your kind recognition with the associates in the departments you have mentioned, thank you very much!   We are all very excited to have recently completed our redesign project. Thank you very much for staying with us, I look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel and it was wonderful in all aspects.  Caution if this matters at all "This is a 3 Star hotel". Which is not bad just saying.  You will get that experience nothing more or less.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. I am delighted to read that you found our hotel to be wonderful in all aspects, thank you!!!   Thank you very much for staying with us, we all look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary Heading: We love it, & you will too..
Summary: I will start off by saying, I'm a bit high maintenance when sleeping away from home, and this hotel kept me happy and comfortable.  I've been to many doubletree hotels, and this one is my favorite! The staff is fantastic and they treat you well. I don't say that about most hotels, because a lot won't go out of their way to help like these people do. Our rooms and bathrooms were clean, beautifully themed and decorated, each had a balcony with beach views, beds and the sectional couch are super comfortable, and the breakfast... Oh the breakfast! (Dont skip out on the breakfast) We will definitely continue to stay here, and recommend you do too.
Manager Response: Dear PC,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. I'm delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. Your kind feedback and recognition have been shared with the team members as I visited their areas, thank you so very much for making time to share.   From all of us here at the hotel, THANK YOU for your review and for staying with us and we all look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary Heading: Love the proximity to the Beach
Summary: We really enjoy staying at the Doheny Beach Double Tree.  It is not a giant hotel so it feel cozy.  We love the roof top terrace.  Great for a quick get away. The only draw back is the cost of parking.  The parking is owned by a third party and we think $22 is excessive for overnight parking.  However there are no other options around the hotel so you are forced to pay the fee unless you take a taxi or have a friend drop you off.
Manager Response: Dear Patricia,  I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. The roof top lounge is certainly one of my favorite places here at the hotel, thank you very much for sharing.   I completely understand your frustration with our parking fees, I must say however that we try hard at being the full service hotel here in town with the lowest parking fees. I truly hope you understand our position with this important matter. Thank you so very much for not letting this affect your overall score, this means very much to me and to our entire team.   We all appreciate your decision to stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: The room we had,105, was so loud we couldn't sleep and the air didn't work correctly. At first we were concerned about the trains going by our sliding glass door but it was nothing compared to the amount of noise that was going on in the room. It sounded like the elevator maintenance room was above us. Every time the elevators were used you could hear them, then another loud buzzing woukd start. We never figured out what all the noises were but between being too hot and the noise we did get much sleep
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you very much for your review. I can understand your dissatisfaction with your most recent stay with us.  The cause of the noise and the AC unit in room 105 are being addressed promptly, please accept my most sincere apologies for having experienced these inconveniences. I truly appreciate you bringing these to our attention.    I hope you can visit us again next time your travels bring you to Dana Point, please reach out to me directly as I would like to be of personal assistance with the reservation process. My contact information is below. Thank you in advance.   I look forward to hearing from you and to welcoming you back soon.   Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Nice clean hotel walking distance to beach & harbor so we could catch the ferry to Catalina Island. We had room 349 which the view is the freeway back of the hotel. The rooms with balconies are in the front with a ocean view.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you very much for sharing your feedback. I am glad you enjoyed your stay and truly appreciate your participation in posting your review.   I have shared your recognition with our housekeeping department, thank you very much!  I hope to welcome you next time you during your next trip to Catalina.   At your service,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Great place to escape to when you don't want to leave California. Gives you the illusion that you're in a different state with beautiful scenery as well as gorgeous rooms since the remodel. Awesome views for ocean view rooms and the bar on the roof is awesome!
Manager Response: Hello,  I must admit that our area is very different form most cities in our lovely state. Thank you very much for your kind recognition. We are all very excited to be finished with our re design year-long project.   We all appreciate you staying with us and we also look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Please feel free to reach out anytime in the event I may be of service.  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Staff is very attentive, rooms and hotel were clean and location is great for those who want beach access.  Also very close to the Marina, laundry and grocery.  Parking is a little pricey and it would definitely be much better if it were included in the price of the room. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  I sincerely appreciate your kind recognition of the efforts of our team members. I wanted to let you know that I have shared your comments with the associates in the various departments as I have visited them this week.   I hope you understand our position with having to charge for parking, however it continues to be very important to us that our fees are lower than those of our full service competitors here in town. Thank you very much for your high ranks, they mean so much to us all here at the hotel.   Please feel free to reach out any time, I am at your service. Thank you very much for staying with us.   Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: I'm a Marriott Platinum Elite Lifetime member.  I stayed at the Double Tree as part of a company group meeting.  This is an impressive property with an attentive staff.  The rooftop Manager's Reception was enjoyable.  The ocean and beach view added to the experience.
Manager Response: Dear Gregory,  I am delighted to read that you have enjoyed your stay with us as a member of one of our key competitors. I look forward to welcoming you back next time your travels bring you to Dana Point.   I also hope your next trip is on a Tuesday so you can join us again at our welcome reception. I look forward to it.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager  Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Great location, friendly staff, safe and the remodel came out very nice. Nice vibe as well. I stay here every other month on average. Great views from the roof top bar and patios. Being a female traveler, I feel very safe here. Greeted immediately by the great valet crew. Check in is a breeze and off to the room. Everything I need for my business travels. Beds are comfy too.
Manager Response: Dear Marcie,  Thank you so very much for your continued loyalty, it truly means very much to me as well as to our entire team. Your kind recognition has been shared, thank you for making time to mention the efforts of the guys at the valet podium as well as the folks at the front desk. Thank you!   Please feel free to reach out to me any time, I am at your service today and in the future.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Heather Brebner, the Sales Manager, and her staff provided excellent services for our recent bridal party's stay and after party at their hotel.  They were very accommodating and helpful with the room arrangements which are spacious, well decorated, and clean.  The hotel is across the street from Doheny Beach and is close to other Dana Point Restaurants and sites.  We had our wedding at The Chart House and the rehearsal dinner at Luciana's Ristorante that are only a short distance from the hotel.  Heather and her staff are very knowledgeable about arranging for special events, providing prompt and helpful suggestions for locations at their hotel as well as the food selection and how much to order.  Their outdoor lounge with a view of the Pacific Ocean and Doheny Beach was
Manager Response: Dear Judy,  It was a true pleasure to be the host hotel for your bridal group, we feel honored and certainly appreciate your decision to stay with us.   I have shared your kind recognition with Heather, thank you so much for your mention.   Form all of us here at the Doubletree Doheny Beach, what an honor to be recognized as the best hotel in Dana Point. This truly means so much to us all and we all appreciate your words.   Please feel free to reach out to us any time, we are all at your service today and in the future.   With warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: While this is an older property, Doubletree has done alot to spruce it up.  Lobby is nice.  Rooms are not luxurious, but they are clean & comfortable.  Everyone I encountered was friendly & accomodating.  Location was central to the beach or anywhere else in the area.
Manager Response: Greetings,  I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are all very excited to have completed our redesign project just this past month. Your kind recognition of the efforts of the team members are appreciated very much and will continue to be shared  as I visit their areas, thank you!  Thank you for sharing your review, we all look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary Heading: Great Location.Close to Harbor and Lantern section!
Summary: The Charthouse is close by if you are staying here for a special celebration! We were lucky to be placed in a room facing the Ocean. There is also a bar with great views. Sadly I wish it was open longer hours.
Manager Response: Dear Angela,  Thank you very much for your review! I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay!   I have shared your kind comments with the team members as I visited their areas, thank you very much for your recognition.   I look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Richard Uribe General Manager  Richard.uribe@Hilton.com

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel for over 5 years.  They recently completed an amazing remodel.  The rooms are modern and spacious. I was there for business and they have a great computer area in the spacious lobby. Highly recommend for business or pleasure.  The location is great as well.  Staff is very helpful and will try best to accommodate your needs. You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you so very much for your review! I am delighted o read that you enjoyed your stay and that our team members showed you our appreciation for being our guest.   Thank you very much for your loyalty to our hotel.  We are all at your service and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best Regards,  Richard Uribe Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 235 4500

Summary Heading: Loved my stay!!! Will be back.
Summary: I stayed at the DoubleTree for one week in March. When I arrived, I was greeted by friendly valet service that offered to take my one carry-on bag to my room. I declined as I just don't know how to deal with that level of service. AMAZING!! When I got to the counter to check in, they were clearly having computer issues, but you would never know it. Come to find out they had just switched systems and they were completely down. This did not stop them from getting me a room key and a warm cookie in no time flat. I admire how they handled that stressful situation. I got to my room and it was nice and clean. All the rooms are very updated. There are a number of nice meeting rooms, recreation room and a rooftop eating area. There is a railway that goes by the hotel so I would request
Manager Response: Dear Anna,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. I am delighted to read your kind recognition of our associates during our computer refresh, they all worked very hard the night before and that morning. Your recognition related to that is a breath of fresh air, I have shared it with them, thank you!  I can understand your frustration with having to wait for your car when you are ready to get going. I have also shared your feedback with our Front Office Manager so that more attention is given to this matter going forward. Please accept my most sincere apologies for the inconvenience you experienced with that.  We all appreciate you making time to post your review, thank you very much for staying with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com

Summary: Being a fellow hotelier myself and having the opportunity to stay with numerous hotels, it is rare to find an all around great hotel!   I've had the opportunity to stay here for a quick get-away, as well as family staying for a quick business trip. It is evident that the General Manager of this hotel places pride and empowerment with his team members, as each service related item was exceeded with not only a joyful demeanor, but surpassed expectations!   The staff has graciously welcomed myself and family on a few occasions, offered upgrades, ensured all amenities in room were plenty for the stay, offered local attraction ideas - or even better, delicious drink options at their roof top bar!   Aside from excellent service, this hotel offers a clean, safe and fun room to enjoy! I
Manager Response: Greetings!  Thank you so very much for your kind recognition, you have made our day.   Your kind comments have been shared with the associates as I have visited their areas this week. We have a fantastic team here at the hotel, being recognized just makes us want to continue working together in an effort to exceed our guests' expectations. Thank you very much for making time to share your feedback.  We all look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon!  Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: The only drawback of this hotel was the bathroom. It's so small there isn't room to keep toiletries on the vanity or anyplace in the bathroom. There is also some discoloration (mold?) in the tub where the glass door meets the tub.   Overall we found the room to be bright & pleasant. The hotel staff was super friendly and went out of their way to make sure we had everything we needed.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you very much for your review and valuable feedback. I am so glad to read that our team members made you feel appreciated as the valued guest that you are to us all. Your recognition has been shared with the team members, thank you very much for mentioning their efforts in ensuring your complete satisfaction.   Your feedback related to the bathroom discoloration has been shared with our Director of Housekeeping so that we work on addressing any issue that requires immediate attention. Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention.   We look forward to welcoming you back next time your travels bring you to Dana Point. Thank you very much for your review and for staying with us!  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: We checked in very late into the morning.  The reception was very friendly and courteous, she was not tired or sleepy like how you would experience when you check in the motels :-).  They ran out of bottled water inside the vending machine and front desk provided us two bottles of water, no charge.  Nice and clean hotel room! Beach front location!
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth,  I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay. Stacey is a great performer, no matter what time of day as she works various shifts. Thank you very much for recognizing her. I have shared your kind comments with her, she was very glad to hear! Thank you.  I have also mentioned your review in our morning huddle in housekeeping, thank you for your mention related to cleanliness!   We all appreciate you staying with us, your loyalty to our hotel is valuable and important to us all. We all look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Best regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: I have recently stayed here twice for business.  I was impressed by the cleanliness and spaciousness of the rooms!  While some rooms do have an ocean view, just be advised this hotel is across the street from Doheny Beach campground, so yes you will see some water, but also the campers and tents.  There is no way to walk to the beach.  The bathroom is updated, but was surprised there was not one single hook in the entire bathroom.  ??  No place whatsoever to hang your robe or pj's or toiletry bag.  First hotel I've ever stayed in that did not have any wall or door hooks in the bathroom.  Rooms are modern though, and the climate control worked very well.  I would definitely stay here again, but would ask staff why there are no bathroom hooks:)
Manager Response: Dear LB,  Thank you very much for your review. I am glad to red that you would return to our hotel during your next trip to our city. Your loyalty is appreciated by us all here at the hotel, thank you!  I can understand your frustration with not having a hook in the bathroom. Each room should have one at a minimum, I am truly sorry your room did not. I have asked our housekeeping team to identify the room so that we can address this matter promptly. I appreciate you bringing this to our attention.   We are all at your service today and in the future and look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: I stayed at the Doubletree for our Wedding on April 1, 2016.  The hotel staff was very friendly and accommodating. We arrived two days before the wedding, we stayed in a room with an ocean view on the first night. The next day I was moving into the bridal suite which had been in use the night before. The hotel worked promptly and I was able to switch rooms by noon instead of 3pm. I would stay with them again and recommend the hotel to friends or family.
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Franco,  CONGRATULATIONS on your recent wedding!!! I am delighted to read that our team members worked together in making sure your room was ready early, it is a big day for you and we want to make sure we do all we can to be part of it and of assistance. Thank you very much for your mention!  Your willingness to recommend us to friends and family means the world to us, thank you!   We all look forward to welcoming you back soon, thank you very much for your loyalty to our hotel!  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Great hotel, reasonable rates!  Great breakfast.  Across street from Doheny beach!  Have been coming here 12 yrs-love this place!  Dogs welcome -first floor access to pet area.  Big rooms and living area separate from sleep.
Manager Response: Greetings!  Thank you so much for your loyalty, 12 years coming to our hotel means so much to me and I can tell you it means a lot to our associates as well. I look forward to your return in the years to come. Thank you!  Your kind feedback as been shared in the various departments of the hotel. Please feel free to reach out to us in the event we may be of any assistance in preparation to your next visit.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager richard.uribe@Hilton.com 949 234 4500

Summary: Stayed here 3 days and was treated very well by the staff.  They are very attentive and provided recommendations when asked for local restaurants. Breakfast was great.  Much variety in selection. Work out facilities were private and machines in perfect working order.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent location and possible to have a great view. We received a floor 3 for Hilton Honor room in the back along the highway and railroad tracks.  Mid-80's building refurbished in lovely decor except for the telling outdoor railings. All staff encountered were friendly except the overall experience as were leaving on a Friday morning was they were greatly understaffed. One server and one support on the floor for a busy buffet in the restaurant. They were doing their best, but families and people needing to get going were left seating themselves out of frustration and finding utensils and other needed items asking the busser at the kitchen door. A young man was bellman AND valet...by himself...on a busy morning. So clear management failures here.  Lastly, room service - food
Manager Response: none

Summary: My stay was business related but what a great location!  My room was on the 3rd floor facing the Pacific Ocean... Room was extremely nice with transitional furnishings.  The roof top bar was a fantastic touch.  I had dinner there and enjoyed the views. Having valet parking was a nice touch.  Third time I have stayed there and it won't b th last!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Surprisingly nice facility near waterfront. Much better deal than other properties in the area. I grew up nearby and this was my first time back in many years. I snagged a great deal, but my best compliment is that I would return and pay the normal asking price!! Very nice staff. Location somewhat odd for driving purposes even for someone quite familiar with the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Really enjoyed our " camping " experience across the street from the historic and famous Doheny Beach. The hotel is modern and clean a nice pool and great access to the beach. Stayed at the hotel with teenagers who had surfboards and enjoyed the staffs recommendations of where to surf.  Pool is compact and very clean - beautiful area to watch the sunsets.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Double Tree in Dana Point, Ca. provide the best beach location in the state! Check in to your room slip on your swim suit leave your room and a very short walk across the street and your on the beach. No driving, no parking meters, no out door showers, just fun. The staff at this location is the best part of the stay, always helpful and ready to serve. A day at the beach with none of the downside, out of the ocean back in your room in just minutes.
Manager Response: Dear James,  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, thank you very much for your review.  I have shared your kind recognition with the team members as I visited their areas, this means so much to us all! Thank you.   We look forward to your next visit as the valued guest that you are to us!  Richard Uribe General Manager  949 234 4500

Summary: The staff and valet are always on point. The restaurant menu was over priced for the quality.  Nice new deco. I have stayed  at the DP DT many time it's always a great family vacation. Close to harbor, restaurants and shopping are in walking distance.
Manager Response: Hello Samantha,  Thank you very much for sharing your review!  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay, I have shared your kind recognition with our valet team, thank you!  As well, I shared your valuable feedback related to our menu with our leaders in F&B, I appreciate your participation!  I hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back next time your travels bring you to our beautiful city!   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights over the Easter holiday. The Pros: Staff is very friendly and seems eager to please. You are within walking distance of Doheny Beach which is very convenient.  Parking is convenient as well with great valet service. The breakfast is second to none with excellent food. The Cons: Our room (105) was in bad need of an overhaul. We had them to fix the air conditioning and it still did  not work properly. We reported that the tub did not drain. Never fixed. The partition for the tub/shower leaks profusely on the floor. The screen sliding door to the outside would not lock. I will most likely stay here again, but will go through my next room thoroughly to ensure the stay is better. Still, some of the rooms need to be overhauled for a better customer experience.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you so much for your candid review. Your feedback is valuable and certainly greatly appreciated by us all. I have requested a full inspection of room 105 so that the items identified are promptly addressed, thank you very much for sharing. Please accept my most sincere apologies for the inconveniences you experienced.   I am at your service, and look forward to your return. Please feel free to reach out any time I may be of assistance.  With warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com

Summary: I booked this room for my friend and I to enjoy a trip north, and though the trip was nice, the room was sub par. The lobby was full of noisy wet kids, our room had bugs in the shower, and the sink leaked causing our towels to get all wet.
Manager Response: Dear Melody,  Thank you for your review!    It has been a true pleasure communicating with you following your departure from the hotel. I appreciate the opportunity to make things better and look forward to your return. Please feel free to reach out to me once your next reservation is made as I would like to say hello in person.  Have a great weekend!  Richard 949 234 4500

Summary: We stayed here for a night and the room was very clean and modern. They gave us chocolate chip cookies when we arrived which was especially nice since it was late. The service was amazing because they really care about making sure your stay is as good as it can be. Definitely recommend!!
Manager Response: Dear Evonee,  Thank you so much for sharing your review! I am glad you enjoyed your room and more importantly our cookies :) Your kind recognition of the efforts of our team members has been shared, especially in Housekeeping, your complete satisfaction means very much to us all.   We al look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Dana Point. Thank you very much for staying with us.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager 949 234 4500

Summary: Visited the hotel with my family..at first i thought  my family may not enjoy it because they didn't like the room we stayed in..but Alea came to the rescue and gave us an upgrade which my family loved and enjoy..kudos to Alea who really took care of us..and also kids really enjoy the easter bunny and the egg hunting experience.. really surprise that the hotel made sure that the children celebrate the easter home away from home..
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you very much for your review. We had such great participation in our Easter egg hunt that we already look forward to next year! Thank you very much for your mention!  I have shared your recognition with Alea who is here on duty today, she was very happy to hear. Thank you!  We al look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon!  Richard Uribe General Manager

Summary: Our family of five had a great time at this DoubleTree; the location is ideal (across from a beach) and the renovations were fantastic. The staff, especially George at valet, was very helpful.  He gave us really good restaurant recommendations (we walked to all of them).
Manager Response: Hello Ann,  I am very glad to read that you and your family enjoyed your stay! I have shared your kind words with George, thank you very much for your recognition!   Thank you very much for sharing your review, I look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon!   Best,  Richard Uribe General Manager 949 234 4500

Summary: From the moment we entered the property we were greeted by the staff they made us feel very welcoming. The hotel is newly renovated and the rooms are beautiful. The views of the ocean are breath taking!!
Manager Response: Dear Mary,  We are all so very excited for our recent renovation, our hotel looks and feels great! It is very refreshing to read your comments. Thank you!  Please feel free to reach out to us any time, we are all at your service and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Richard Uribe General Manager  949 234 4500

Summary Heading: You are not Honored at the Double Tree Doheny Beach
Summary: This hotel is a rip off.  It does not honor its guests and prearranged reservations via its digital reservations system. For the price, you can find something way better.  Avoid this hotel like the plague.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you very much for your review. I can understand your frustration and commit to you that I will be working side by side with the associates involved with the allocation of your room. Please accept my most sincere apologies for this inconvenience.   I truly hope you give us an opportunity to make things better next time you visit Dana Point. I am at your service, please feel free to reach out any time.   Richard Uribe General Manager 949 234 4500

Summary: Quick getaway from SD.  The distance from SD as well as the hotel location was very nice.  The ocean view room had a nice view of the ocean (although the trees at the campground across the road blocked some of the view).  Staff were very friendly and helpful.  The remodeled room was also very clean and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Young C,  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay! I have shared your kind recognition with the team members, thank you very much!  We are all very excited with our recent renovation, thank you very much for mentioning it! I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Richard

Summary: Hotel was recently renovated, the rooms were nice, and the views from the 4th floor Patio bar were awesome. Parking was either self or valet for the same price which made it convenient. All the staff I came in contact with were friendly and always looking to help. My only concern was that the AC Unit in the room was a bit loud. Overall a really good stay!
Manager Response: Dear Ryan,  Thank you very much for your review! I am glad to read that our team members showed you our appreciation for being our guest. I am sorry that your AC unit was loud, I have shared your comments with our Chief Engineer so that the unit is properly inspected. Thank you very much for staying with us. I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Richard

Summary: We had a broken sink, a broken A/C unit, had to move room with our kids at 11pm , the new room had dirty pillows, stains on the carpet and the coffee machine didi not work.  Were we offered any compensation?  NO!  I finally told them to give me the overnight parking fee ($22) for free.  Never again!
Manager Response: Dear Danielle,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. I am truly sorry for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay, I can understand your frustration with having to move your family late at night. I have spoken to the individuals responsible for the areas you've mentioned so that we improve our operation and be better prepared with these rooms moving forward. Thank you very much for letting us know.   I truly hope you can visit us again during  your next trip to Dana point. I am at your service today and in the future.   Best,  Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com

Summary: Chose another hotel if you want a pleasant stay. The rooms are poorly maintained. Staff is uncooperative and indifferent Parking is very inconvenient for in/out. Okay if you just park and leave there for duration of stay Beautiful location if you don't mind the train and PCH noise. Beautiful View from some room and roof.
Manager Response: Dear Gabriel,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. Thank you very much for complimenting our location and views, I appreciate it.   Your comments have been shared with the members of our management team. I am truly sorry that we did not make you feel our appreciation for staying with us. Please feel free to reach out to me directly if you would like to further discuss, I am at your service.   Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@Hilton.com

Summary: I stayed here while visiting my family in California in Dana point.  I was with my fiance who was int he military.  This hotel thanked him for his service, gave him a discount, treated him very nice.  With the utmost respect for serving his country.  You can go some places and no one says a word to him about his service. This hotel was clean, professional, and was very respectful to my Fiance.  We enjoyed our time in Dana Point, we enjoyed the restaurant and the Lounge, the fitness center, and the pool.  I come to Dana point every year to see my family, I know where I will stay from here on out!  This hotel met all of my expectations and exceeded all of them.  Awesome Home away from home.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon,  I am delighted to read your review, thank you very much for sharing! I have shared your comments with the team members as I visited their areas today and will continue sharing over the week.   I am very glad to know you and your fiancé are coming back next year, please feel free to reach out in the event we may be of service to you in preparation to your arrival. Thank you for staying with us!  Best,  Richard Uribe General Manager

Summary: We had two suites on the 4th floor which was freshly renovated. There were a few small issues but the staff took care of them. We were able to take the quick walk to the beach and enjoy the ocean. The rooms were spacious and the restaurant was great.
Manager Response: Dear Don,  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. Your recognition has been shared with the team members as I visited their areas, particularly in the restaurant, THANK YOU.   We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Richard Uribe 949 234 4500

Summary: Excellent property with superior customer service. Visited the area for a business function, the rooms were well maintained and the staff was warm and inviting to any questions I had. Workout facility and public restrooms were clean throughout my entire stay. Highly recommend this property and will stay again .
Manager Response: Greetings,  I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and that you will highly recommend us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!   Your recognition will be shared with the team members in all areas this week, especially housekeeping. Thank you very much for your comments.   Thank you very much for staying with us, we all appreciate it here at the hotel.   Richard Uribe General Manager Richard.uribe@hilton.com

Summary: Hotel location is near the beach but not quite at the beach as described by the website.  still have some room for improvement as far as amenities.  Great friendly staff made it easier to deal with all the short comings.  it was bit difficult to find.
Manager Response: Dear Albert,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. Your kind recognition related to the efforts of our team members as well as their friendliness is greatly appreciated! I have shared your comments with the various teams as I visited their areas. Thank you!  I can understand your dissatisfaction related to our geographic position with relation to the beach. We truly pay particular attention to our descriptions on line as it is very important to us that we provide our guests with as detailed information as possible. I am truly sorry about the disconnect with this matter. Thank you very much for your comment.   We all look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Dana Point as the valued guest that you are to us all.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager 949 234 4500

Summary: Close to the beach. Just walk across the street. Affordable Nice Rooms. The staff is Attentive and courteous. The rooftop bar (and one by the pool) are nice hangouts. We enjoyed fireworks on the 4th of July and it was such a good stay, we have gone back now a couple of times, just to enjoy an affordable and comfortable getaway. Jordan at the front desk and Manager Tim, Really a Cut Above, made our stay the next step above great. They were Exceptional!  Food is good too
Manager Response: Dear Phillip,  Thank you very much for your review. I am so glad you have returned since your original visit, thank you very much for your loyalty! Please stop by the desk and ask for me during your next visit so we can say hello in person.   I look forward to your next visit!  Richard Uribe General Manager 949 234 4500

Summary: Given the location, cramped quarters, distance from ocean and age of facility, this hotel was definitely overpriced.  AND the parking is NOT free.  I did enjoy the breakfast buffet, though and service was excellent.  All staff I encountered were pleasant.  The rooms are not sound proof.  People talking and whatever else they were doing in the hallway woke me up several times.  The traffic on the road also woke me up in the morning; quite noisey.  Lots of restaurant choices in town, but you have to drive there.
Manager Response: Dear Amber,  I am glad to read that our team members showed you our appreciation for being our guest. Thank you very much for your kind recognition, it will be shared this week with the team members as I visit their areas, especially in the Food and Beverage Departments.   I can understand your frustration with the noise other guests made as they went past your room, please accept my apologies for the inconvenience.   I hope to have the opportunity of welcoming you back next time your travels bring you to Dana Point.  Richard Uribe General Manager  Richard.uribe@hilton.com

Summary Heading: Save money go some other place
Summary: We stayed on the 2nd floor next to the ice machine.  Sounds like a machine gun going off.  The door does not shut tight, light comes in all night long.  You can hear people walking down the halls.  Parking cost $22 for self park and $27 for them to park for youi.  Surrounded by highway on and off ramps.  Train is 30 feet from the window.  They did give you a cookie, that was nice but didn't make up for the $22 a day parking fee.
Manager Response: Dear Gary,  Thank you very much for sharing your review, your feedback is valuable to us all here at the hotel. I can understand your frustration with the noise coming from the ice machine as well as with the door not completely blocking the light from coming in at night. We have inspected both and have addressed the needs appropriately. Please accept my most sincere apologies for the inconveniences.   I reviewed your folio to ensure we only charged you $22 for parking as this is our standard fee for self as well as for valet parking. I have also double checked with our third party partner used for your reservation to ensure this fee is listed within their informational packets.   I hope you visit us again during your next trip to Dana Point. Thank you very much for staying with us!  Richard Uribe General Manager  949 234 4500

Summary: Dana point is a beautiful coastal city and this Doubletree is its hidden gem. We love everything about this property.   The staff is amazing. The rooms are perfect. The location is ideal. The views are breathtaking.   We can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Dear Zully,  I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and that our associates showed you our appreciation for being our guest! Your kind feedback will be shared this week. I sincerely appreciate your recognition.   Thank you so much for your willingness to return to our hotel, we all look forward to it.   Please reach out in the event I may be of any assistance, I am at your service.  Richard Uribe General Manager  Richard.uribe@Hilton.com

Summary: Great Place to stay! Price to stay was great especially for it being not even a 5 min drive to the Marina.  Great view at the Roof Top bar as well. We will definitely be staying again when time permits.
Manager Response: Dear Kacie,  Thank you very much for sharing your review! I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your stay. I will continue to share your kind recognition with the team members as I visit their areas this week.   We all look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager  949 234 4500

Summary: We stayed at this hotel due to last-minute change of plans during a Southern California trip last week.  We decided a hotel close to the beach would fit our needs best with the little time that we had.  The hotel's location fit our requirements quite nicely, as it is situated right across from Doheney State Park (the campground and nearby beach, particularly).  We were able to safely cross surface the road at a stoplight crosswalk, which made the beach much more accessible than we first thought it would be.  We did have to walk through the campground to get to the beach itself, but the walk was fine.  The view of the sea from our private balcony was also special.  We were able to enjoy the sun set over sailboats on the Pacific right from the comfort of our room.  Magical.
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you so very much for your detailed review. I am so glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us! Your kind recognition has been shared with the associates in the various departments of our operation, particularly the valet team. Thank you very much!   I look forward to welcoming you back soon and am at your service today and in the future. Please feel free to reach out.   Best Regards,  Richard Uribe

Summary: Clean hotel, great location. Beautiful views, great service, clean rooms. Traffic noise is something to contend with, but not a deal breaker. I travel many nights a year, and this beach location is one of the best I have enjoyed. I will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Dean,  I am delighted to read that you enjoyed our hotel! Your kind recognition will be shared with the various departments this week, particularly Housekeeping. Thank you for highlighting cleanliness and service!   We all look forward to welcoming you back soon.  At your service,  Richard Uribe

Summary: Spent a lovely couple of days at the DoubleTree Doheny Beach.  Great room and excellent service. In particular, Tri, who served us breakfast both mornings, was fantastic - extremely welcoming and friendly.  A great trip!
Manager Response: Dear Hannah,  Thank you so much for sharing your review! Your kind comments have been shared with the team members. I could not agree with you more, Tri IS FANTASTIC and was very happy to hear about your review! Your kind recognition means so much to us all.   I hope you can visit us again soon!  Best,  Richard Uribe General Manager  949 234 4500

Summary: Great View, Great Staff, Great Experience.  I stayed here 3 weeks for business and I was very happy with the value I received. The room was recently remodeled, and the view was beautiful to wake up to.
Manager Response: Dear Corey,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. I am delighted to read that you enjoyed your 3 week long stay with us. It was a true pleasure meeting you and certainly look forward to welcoming you back next time your travels bring you to Dana Point.   Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager 949 234 4500

Summary: all i can say is that my kids and i enjoyed our stay at this hotel. from valet parking, staff, room service, and especially our suite... everything was great!!! we will definitely come back. totally recommend this place to others and will definitely come back soon!
Manager Response: Dear Claudia,  Thank you very much for your review. I am so glad to read that you and your family had a great time during your stay and that our team members showed you our appreciation for being our guests.   I look forward to your return visit!  Warm regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice and peaceful Dana Point hotel
Summary: The Doubletree in Doheny Beach, Dana Point California had a very nice and peaceful atmosphere with a great decor designed like a beach resort.  Service was excellent, rooms very comfortable and nicely arranged with a living area separated from sleeping area.  Close to Dana Point Harbor for a nice stroll on the boardwalk and just across the street from the ocean.  Beautiful views from up above and front situated rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Victoria,  Thank you so very much for your review. We are all so excited to have completed our renovation as we now have a brand new hotel! I am glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us, thank you very much for staying! Your kind feedback and recognition have been shared with the team members as I visited their areas, thank you!  I look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Richard

Summary Heading: a great place for comfort, safety and fun
Summary: Because of your caring attributes, our business event was very successful. I would do it again.  Love Double Tree at Dana Point. I wouldn't hesitate to try other Double Tree Hilton Hotels in other places around the globe.
Manager Response: Dear Maria,  I am glad to read that your meeting went well and that our team members showed you that we CARE (which at Doubletree stands for Creating A Rewarding Experience)  thank you very much for your kind recognition, it has been appropriately shared with the team members.   We all appreciate your business and look forward to being of service to you again in the near future.   Best,  Richard Uribe

Summary: I have stayed at this Double Tree many times over the years. They just went through a renovation.... the good points about this Hotel.  The staff, from Valet to Front Desk to Maintainence and House Keeping, are always so friendly and helpful. The Hotel is just steps away from the beach. Most of the renovations in the rooms are nice.... the bad points are Room 404, which is one of their upgraded suites, is right by the freeway and the Hotel did not make any provisions to cut down that noise. Cars go by till the wee hours of the morning so if you are a light sleeper beware to me not worth the pricey room if I can't sleep.  However the staff did go out of their way to find me another room which was away from freeway and VERY QUITE. This is a non smoking Hotel but there were quit a
Manager Response: Greetings,  Thank you very much for sharing your review. Your recognition of the efforts of our team members in Valet, Front Desk, Maintenance and Housekeeping have been shared. Your recognition means very much to us all, thank you!   I am glad to read as well that our team members were able to provide a course of action with relation to the road noise, I appreciate your kind mention.   We are all at  your service and look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best regards,  Richard Uribe General Manager 949 234 4500

Summary: I planned a meeting for about 17 executives at this hotel and the process was very easy and the team was a pleasure to work with. My event manager was Heather B. and she did a fantastic job communicating the options for catering, the room layout, and offering a space on the patio to have lunch on the sunny deck. My team loved their rooms and location of the hotel.  Many commented how great it was to be able to go out for a nice run and how enjoyable their stay was. We supplied our own projector so we just had to add a screen and projector package. The catering packages offered all kinds of themed food such as Italian, Southwest, healthy and so on. I heard no complaints from my team and would highly recommend this hotel when looking for an option in Dana Point. The billing was
Manager Response: Hello,  I am delighted to read that your event went well, thank you very much for your recognition of Heather's efforts. I am so happy to have her as part of our team, thank you very much for making time to recognize her!    I have shared your comments with our Culinary and Accounting teams as well, thank you very much for sharing.  We are all at your service and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best,  Richard Uribe General Manager 949 234 4500
